Discussion => Off topic => Topic started by: Marlon Brando on March 25, 2013, 10:08 pm

Title: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on March 25, 2013, 10:08 pm
Hey everyone, I thought since a lot of us like to partake in the joys of cocaine and all the wonderful things it brings.. such as TALKING!


So I thought instead of users clogging up the review thread with banal small talk, I would create a space for all of us currently partaking in such cocaine related activities so we have a place to rant, rave, talk about anything.

Up late? only one home? need someone to talk too?

Hopefully you'll find all of that and more, right here in nose candy land.





*Please understand this is a thread to chat, if you want to review/discuss vendors that is in the cocaine review thread over at the Rumor Mill*
http://dkn255hz262ypmii.onion/index.php?topic=27925.0 ---- Keep reviews there.

Haha yeah that episode is great.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on March 25, 2013, 11:00 pm
"And our third guest on tonights Late Cocaine Talk Show is Johnny Nemonic, long time lover of white fluffy rocks, golden snorters, ambered colored vials and cant stand the sight of a rusted razor blades."   'APPLAUSE FROM CROWD'

Marlon Brando-"So Johnny,(sniff) you have traveled a long way here to the USA to help us sample our wares..we cant thank you enough for joining us on our opening night!"

JM-"No thank you Marlon, i mean who gets flown halfway across the world for a late night cocaine talk show? (sniff)  'APPLAUSE FROM CROWD'

MB-"Well we all know your nose johnny, and the purpose of your trip here is to help us,(sniff) and the community out there....and of course our lovely audience members...which is currently the finest, smoothest, and fluffiest coca available right now.    'WILD APPLAUSE FROM CROWD'

JM-This will be my pleasure Marlon, (sniff) theres nothing i enjoy better than keeping everyone well informed of the best quality batches available from some of our favorite and most trusted farmers."

MB-"Well thats why your here JM...
Oh before i forget...our audience members..(sniff) and viewers at home can live Tweet all your thoughts and answers..correct answers will be rewarded by free samples of our wares.

"Now, who else do we have for tonights Late Night Cocaine Show..?"

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on March 26, 2013, 12:23 am
You're right! it's my show! haha well every show starts of a bit rocky.

And yes, I tell myself "I will stay off amazon, I will stay off ebay" I'm not a huge purchase on a whim kind of guy I just ended buying 5 books without realizing that they all add up. I can honestly say there are a quarter of books in my library I have bought while high and when they come in the mail I completely forgot that I had made the purchase.

Though at least with cocaine I tend to make calculated decisions about what books to buy instead of when I was an alcoholic and just clicked "buy with 1 click" on anything that looked shiny.

Along with vendors I will be looking at certain members who are well respected and knowledgeable to partake in an AMA if they would like. for now I'll just make it an open forum for suggestions of vendors/members that you'd like to see on MY MOTHERFUCKING TALK SHOW!

lines lines lines.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on March 26, 2013, 02:09 am
What is this cocaine you speak of? I feel like I've heard of it but it was explained like a lightning bolt of godliness that makes you shoot straight and speak the truth. A current of strength and clarity unlike anything experienced before.

It also costs a lot
Can make you feel like crap
And tends to make you regrettably start friendships with people you'd rather not have in your life.


But besides all that nasty stuff it's still GREAT GREAT



PS. you lol'ing the prez or is there a vendor Obama...I am not well versed in every vendor.

I'm off to do some shopping...couldnt help but top up my vial again and so 'm feeling rather splendid right now. :P

Is it just me or do i use more tongue smileys than anyone else?

Princess if you were here i'd show you the city, drive you around, and you'd be the highest princess down under.

Has anyone done coke with just MDA? Have to say its rather interesting, gives your batteries a little glow i must say. :P

But not today, that was on the weekend. MDA ruins appetite. :P

Well i'm off...oh i just bought some nasal decongestant...awesome, now i'm ready for a top up and will breeze through that shopping crowd. ;D 8)

Although an hour after my 2 small lines i'm still flying...specially now knowing i'm having another.. :P

Have a great day late night show viewers. :)




MB-"Well Johnny, its been great having you on our opening night. Be sure to come back when we have a cannabis cup style competition, but of course its for the finest coca, and every audience member will be given a free sample to take home to share amongst their loved ones...   'WILD APPLAUSE'

Yes, I totes forgot about alcohol sponsors. That's a good fit, I'm trying to think of other things I'd be tempted to click on or look at if I saw something high...I should just watch TV and see which adds do it for me. I can probs say not many food companies. Maybe a chewing gum sponsor, everybody likes a little bit of gum.

Oh and tobacco, so Tobacco, Alcohol, Firearms. Plus things to spend money on when you're holed up in your house.

Post by: Marlon Brando on March 26, 2013, 09:00 am
Totally I know how it can be if you're out and about drinking with friends..

I have got a lot more numbers from the ladies whilst high as fuck on the ole cocaine than I thought possible.. Did all of them work out? no but the fact that I was able to just say fuck it, "what's up? Isn't life awesome?!"

I think it made them a bit more comfortable, but if I was right out of my gord messed than girls would be "uhhhhh no, get away from me creep"


But in the end, it didn't matter because I was having a super awesome time just living in the moment.

SQUIRREL!


*That's me on cocaine at a bar or after last call trying to pick up the straglers*

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on March 29, 2013, 01:48 am
Yeah me!

Third bloody night at it which I don't like doing as I think it's a waste of coke!

I have a new plan to cut down on doing too much of the stuff which is to keep it in a place I can't access it during evenings at home. Once it's not near me I'm OK but if it's in the house, it calls me! :-)

I put my stash away in it's hiding place this week but had a small bit put by for the bro and tricked myself into believing I'd do a line or two and leave it at that but if I don't go to bed soon the whole lot will be gone!!! :-)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on March 29, 2013, 01:58 am

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: beastpiss77 on March 29, 2013, 02:31 am
Quote from: Studio54 on March 29, 2013, 12:31 am
so i am just now joining in this late night cocaine talk show thread... am i the only one on a thursday night doing bumps.. LOL> ? come on, there's gotta be more out there enjoying the snow flakes other than just me :o :o

I'm partaking on this early Thursday evening. Had an unexpected day off and been bored all day, finally decided to delve into my stash.

As a recluse, I'm wondering if perhaps cocaine is not the right drug for me. I mean, it's irrefutably a social drug, right? So why am I doing it by myself 95% of the time? I'll even do some and then attempt to go out and socialize, but then I just get bored and go home. And then I'm high and bored at home and I feel like I should be out doing something! I mean, I definitely have fun when doing it with friends, but it's so rare. I thought maybe it would help me be more social, but no, I'm just a reclusive cokehead now.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on March 29, 2013, 02:46 am
I'm the same. I'd rather be at home on my own or with someone else doing it but if I start on my own I'd rather keep it that way!

I also find if I go out, I'd rather be at home where you can comfortably do lines instead of going in and out of the toilets all night.

Expensive form of home alone partying!
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on March 29, 2013, 02:48 am
Quote from: Marlon Brando on March 29, 2013, 01:52 am
Ever tried benzo's to help you sleep/stop the "more" feeling?

always dude... i take a 2mg xanax bar to shut down at night, its the only thing that does it for me. usually about an hour after my last bump i take it, then 30 min later im sleepy and sleep fine

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: KandyKidd on March 29, 2013, 03:18 am
Quote from: Studio54 on March 29, 2013, 02:48 am
Quote from: Marlon Brando on March 29, 2013, 01:52 am
Ever tried benzo's to help you sleep/stop the "more" feeling?

always dude... i take a 2mg xanax bar to shut down at night, its the only thing that does it for me. usually about an hour after my last bump i take it, then 30 min later im sleepy and sleep fine

I usually just take half or a full bar(it's usually very hard to just stop at 1 bar) when sniffin. They mix great together and doesn't cancel each other out. but the only thing bad about eating bars when sniffin for me is, I'll be like "where the fuck all my bars at?" you'll be dead serious too. This is how fights start with my friends ;)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: b0lixtrader on March 29, 2013, 09:52 am
The reason benzos go so well together with coke is that your technically speed balling.  Any downer and an upper is basically speed balling.

A red bull and vodka is technically speedballing lol.

However, obviously benzos are very sedating with anti-anxiety and relaxing properties mixing extra well with the euphoria of the coke.  Drooling just thinking about it.

I'm a recovered benzo addict though, use to do 12-16mg of xanax through out a day or 6-8mg of klonopin...and at least 200+mg of valium to feel good.  Fun days but not worth the dope sickness.

Nothing like a few benzos while doing coke or even smoking some pot. Pot goes well with almost everything for me ha

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on March 29, 2013, 11:45 pm
Quote from: b0lixtrader on March 29, 2013, 09:52 am
The reason benzos go so well together with coke is that your technically speed balling.  Any downer and an upper is basically speed balling.

A red bull and vodka is technically speedballing lol.

However, obviously benzos are very sedating with anti-anxiety and relaxing properties mixing extra well with the euphoria of the coke.  Drooling just thinking about it.

I'm a recovered benzo addict though, use to do 12-16mg of xanax through out a day or 6-8mg of klonopin...and at least 200+mg of valium to feel good.  Fun days but not worth the dope sickness.

Nothing like a few benzos while doing coke or even smoking some pot. Pot goes well with almost everything for me ha

wow man, you got me way beat... if i took even half a bar during the day, i couldnt function normally... the only time i do take xanax is when im doing a few lines and thats usually late at night i'll drop a 2mg bar, maybe a bar and a half, if im pushing it hard core on the coke ... but after about an hour, and a nice shower, im ready for bed... i have a script from my doc for xanax so i do have legit reasons i take them for anxiety ---

but sometimes at the beginning of the evening,  what i do is break off .25 off a bar, swallow that, have a few drinks, then do some lines, and from there on ---- its smooth sailing until i have to shut down... so yeah, kinda speed balling, i cant do red bull and vodka anymore, shit tears up my stomach and i cant sleep at night. so i just mix vodka with sprite... i dont do energy drinks anymore cause i use to be hooked on sugar free rockstar drinks..

10 years ago i would drink alcohol all night, then take 2 tylenol pm's to try and go to sleep but all that did was make my body tired, my mind wouldnt shut down and i just laid there for hours in bed tying to sleep .... all that until a friend told me about xanax and gave me a bar to try one night,,, since then, its the only thing that i can and will take to shut down at night... i hated those nights laying there in bed, and its 3am, then its 7am, and the sun is coming up and you still havent slept yet ... wow those days sucked..  i wont do cocaine at night unless i have some xanax bars on hand to shut down at night..

i use to love smoking pot at night but still never helped with coming down off the coke, it would just make me more of a space cadet ya know?

damn bro, really, 12-16mg of xanax a day?
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on March 30, 2013, 12:30 am
Quote from: Marlon Brando on March 29, 2013, 01:43 am
I had too much fun in the afternoon, sadly my late night was more of a late afternoon. There HAS to be others going strong though.

"Geoff....who do we have for our next guest this evening?"

"We have Johnny Nemonic on the line....who has just risen from a lovely session of cocaine and mda, which he enjoyed yesterday."      'WILD APLAUSE'

MB-"Johnny...welcome back!"

JM-"Good to be back Marlon, although not there in person, i thought i'd call in and see how you late talk show addicts are doing..

MB-"Well Johnny...i think you know how we're doing....right audience!!  'THUNDEROUS APPLAUSE!!'

JM-"Ha ha, damn you americans never sleep...well i've just risen from a great day yesterday...MDA combined with a line of cocaine here and there through the many hours we were rolling..
Driving home was interesting...although still ridiculously high...there were others on the road who must have been fried...i saw one car doing 20kmh under the limit in the right hand lane, i couldnt help but laugh as i drove past...i thought their off their heads... I love driving while high, i dont make a habit out of it, but when i do i really enjoy it.

MB-"So Johnny, had you ever had that amount of mda with cocaine before?"

JM-"No Marlon, my friend and i had around 115mg of MDA followed by bumps on the nose all through the afternoon and evening. I was so high after 9 hours rolling, i could have gone out and wanted to touch down on a dance floor after returning home...but i made it home and didnt want to push my luck by driving into the city, police were everywhere last night."

MB-"Smart move Johnny, nothing those cops hate more is seeing you in your ride with your eyes popping out of your head while they have to work."

JM-"Well you cant blame the police, i mean chemical enlightenment and drunkenness, they treat it all the same, and unless they all become like Barry Cooper, they will never know what the real danger to the community is..."     'APPLAUSE FROM CROWD'

MB-"Well Johnny, we are about to lose the live feed, its been great having you here, although only in voice...it has been a pleasure."

JM-"Till next time Marlon...i hope you all have a fan-fucking-tastic day today!"

MB-"Get on that train Johnny....tranzcentral station...3am."

JM-"Will see you there..got my ticket and everything..."

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on March 31, 2013, 12:47 am
Well i have enough for tonight and tomorrow. Seeing that i've given so much away, i'll be having the rest.

Molly, MDA, a Nitendo bean and Coke, around 400mg left, i swear happytimezz weighed it extra heavy, it was a nice bag.
He said he would weigh me extra when i declined his sample offer and bought a gram from him instead.  ;D

MDA and coke alone has me very high and buzzing for hours. The molly i have is the best i've ever had on the road, and in the last 5 months i've bought quite a lot.
But the crystals are the whitest and cleanest i've seen in a long time so will be buying again sometime in the near future.. :P

I might finish everything..but i always like to keep a little something on the side...but if i dont end up going out, then i wont be having everything, will just rack up here and there... 8)

One thing I've noticed from the higher end pills from the Netherlands in comparison to the mid range ones is that they have that known MDMA smell but with a hint of sweetness to it that distinguishes them from the others!

Maybe a superior MDMA synth!

Quote from: jnemonic on March 31, 2013, 01:41 am
I never snort molly, only charlie....i cap my mdma/mda.  ;)

gotcha.. i have a local hookup for molly's he caps em, usually 100mg each... i havent rolled in about a year, i just cant ever find the right occasion ya know? i use to love rolling back in the late 90's early 2000's .. those Mitsubishi double stacks were the shiz it..........im a regular charlie consumer/dealer so i always have it on hand, so for me thats my drug of choice daily / weekly, whatever... 

Those were the days, those Mitsi's were an insane bean thats for sure.

I want to buy a little capping machine, a little manual one would be great. But yeah i have always loved my charlie, when i once had a disposable income and good quality around, i didnt mind paying for it, but where i live, and since finding SR, well the quality i can get for the price is just ridiculous here, i can save $900 on an 8-ball. 8)

And I also had an idea that we should create a semi annual buyers guide to cocaine. like a consumers report. Now this would have to be culled from the top snorters and then collaborated on to give only ONE cocaine consumer report out there. We would ultimately judge everything on a scale of 10, and give an end report of "Buy or Stay clear"

We can recommend top picks, economic picks, worst picks, anything really. Just read some consumer reports and get the gist and then convert it to SR.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Wadozo on April 03, 2013, 07:22 am
I need some Technical advise please Marlon or Johnny. I for the life of me, cannot find the channel that your show is supposed to be on? I plugged the aerial in to the toaster and scanned my TV for the show and got nothing! Obviously, I'm capable of setting up a TV to watch TV. I know my shit.
Here's my set-up if anyone has any ideas.

34cm High Def CRT TV - Full Hi-Def 640 x 480 - one of the best you can get.
New RCA cable.
Sleek VHS Player (I refuse to chuck out my favorite movies and "cough" home "cough" movies!).
New aerial running from my full stereo VHS into my new toaster. I saw a show on SBS last Saturday night around 2am, where this bloke from NZ discovered how to get a great picture on his TV. I'm sure he was putting one end into a toaster. Makes complete sense to me, especially the more I think about it. What ever it was, it was in the Kitchen.  ???

As you guys can see, my set up is second to none. It's probably one of the best in Oz and should be producing Hi-Def pictures that blow my mind! This TV is capable of displaying the content in 640 x 480 full Hi-Def.  ::) :P

Please help Marlon or Johnny. It must be something so small that I'm missing here!!  :P :P :P :P :P :P

One last thing Marlon, you're singing a song from the Wiggles. "Oh me oh my, he barks all day and night." That's the song about Wag's the Dog. :P  Maybe you could have them on your show?  ::)

Ah but WA-DO-ZO....did you turn the dial on your toaster to setting number 3? This is one of the things that has been greatly troubling our viewers of late....   'MURMURS FROM CROWD'

All your gear is fine..maybe a little high tech than most..maybe even overkill, but life is short and a good toaster is a damn good investment if you ask me.

Its also timing Wadozo, its a very late night channel....you must turn to setting 3 at precisely 3AM. At that time only can you begin to view the late night show.

But at least your here!

"VIEWERS! Although not here live in the Studio..we have a very special guest, like JM, he is also from that crazy land those aussies call...'Down Under', he's a  well established forum member from that smooth silky virtual aural exciter and........oh....it seems we have a few members obviously on LSD.....for we have Wadozo's avatar shown on the 3 large HD screens we have here..."please excuse me a moment Wadozo..."can you guys....just..turn that off please for the sake of the audience...? Ok thank you. Thought we only had coke heads here tonight, but it seems not..."

Ok....Wadozo, my many apologies for that, but yeah your avatar is out there isnt it? Might be worth popping a flip just to eye ball that sucker!"

"Well Wads at least your on the right bandwidth, you can speak to any one of us here and share your late night tales".

Welcome once again, and we look forward to having you on the show.

Just remember, 3AM and board that train...

WADOZO everybody!   "WILD APPLAUSE'

yeah, but is he flying from the middle east all the way to Peru or is he from the states somewhere going to Peru? that would be a very costly trip and long ass flight to fly from middle east to south america...i might as well just pay $200 a /gram on SR and have it delivered to me.. LOL and save myself 18 hour flight. Peru is a beautiful place, but there's some places i wouldnt go.. Lima is a great town, and friendly... many smaller towns outside Lima can be pretty dangerous, lot of poor people, gangs, its hard to get around if you cant speak good spanish...  La Paz, Bolivia is beautiful / and you can get really good coke there.... but ive gotten some bad shit there too, so i cant always say that everything you buy is 90% pure just b/c it comes from local producers....

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on April 11, 2013, 01:12 am
P.S. I know some of you guys use helpers to get asleep off coke and am wondering is using valium straight after coke safe enough to use or do you know of any issues regarding it?

Not sure about it and might be over worrying myself about it for no reason but my worry is taking downers while high on uppers. Is it a bad combo?

Cheers for any replies/info.!
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: beastpiss77 on April 11, 2013, 04:09 am
Quote from: HitTheRoad on April 11, 2013, 01:12 am
P.S. I know some of you guys use helpers to get asleep off coke and am wondering is using valium straight after coke safe enough to use or do you know of any issues regarding it?

Not sure about it and might be over worrying myself about it for no reason but my worry is taking downers while high on uppers. Is it a bad combo?

Cheers for any replies/info.!

No, it's a perfect combo! I don't know of any safety issue with it, and I pretty much always take a little Xanax to power down after doing coke at night. Valium should be fine too.

And P.S. I am a paranoid hypochondriac, so if I think it's okay, it must be!  ;)
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on April 12, 2013, 12:51 am
Quote from: HitTheRoad on April 11, 2013, 01:12 am
P.S. I know some of you guys use helpers to get asleep off coke and am wondering is using valium straight after coke safe enough to use or do you know of any issues regarding it?

Not sure about it and might be over worrying myself about it for no reason but my worry is taking downers while high on uppers. Is it a bad combo?

Cheers for any replies/info.!

absolutely... anything in the Benzodiazepine family will be a huge help with coming down safely after a night of hitting a few, or a lot of white lines....Valium's are good, but the best would be the 2mg xanax bars, you can always break em in half or 1/4 which ever you need.. just make sure you dont overdue it and take too many.. for me i take 1 full bar and that's enough for me (that would be 2mg xanax) and helps me go right to sleep.... what ever you do dont mix pills.. like mixing vicodin's with xanax, its a bad combo. dont take sleeping pills like ambien or lunesta to come down off coke, it wont have the same effect as Valiums or Xanax

depending on where you live, there are many great vendors on SR that can get you plenty of benzo's if you dont have a valid prescription.......

It's fine, the only thing about valium for me is I'm super lethargic the next day. With 1/4 to 1/2 a Xanax bar I'm alright in the morning. Pretty good mood too actually haha.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Strickland Cocaine on April 14, 2013, 05:58 am
I know this is general discussion, but is it okay to discuss cocaine a little here? not in the sense of reviews etc, but types we've seen, heard about, experienced, etc. hope this is cool  Marlo.

So the stuff I have been seeing around has been a few types....

I experienced my first holy grail of coke the other night. Bolivian Flake. I did a line and immediately thought that I had a billion dollars and a helicopter full of naked women. Well you get the idea. It had thin flakes, was white, was really greasy, and was very light almost like lava when it hardens is less dense that normal rocks. It broke up really finely into an even powder with a little pressure. I was told an ounce of this stuff was available, so I jumped on that opportunity. The very sad thing is, that the ounce that what i received was a pile of doo doo. We got baited and switched. For a pile of fake flake full of speed and who knows what else at a price that one would pay for bolivian flake. what a headache....literally... I did some of the stuff that we got and I got a headache.

Not all fake flake is all bad though. There is a cut that people are using in my area that has the appearance of being fishscale, but is not. You see the shine and are immediately like damn! I have definitely been wooed by the sparkle. The fake flake cocaine can be okay though. The stuff that you got marlo was that rerock fake flake that I list as hq street or good. It tests clean, meaning no active cuts, but doesn't give me that HUGE kick in the basal ganglia if you know what i mean. It's decent okay though. I would do more of it. People really like it too, because it comes in solid chunks and has that shiny appearance, with decent effects to boot. If I were a street dealer, I would probably sell this stuff.

Some fake flake is not good though. Like the pile we received when promised a oz a bolivian. I ez tested it and within 30 seconds the test indicated a strong presence of ephedrine. We told our source who is a close friend to the other half of trill that we didn't want this oz and because he merely middlemanned the deal for gas money, he is working on a refund by peddling it himself. I feel bad for him. WE should have done a little more homework tho too. I guess that some people actually like it though. As well, I read up on lejunks purification method, but don't have the time nor resources to handle that right now... and would only work if the product had real coke in it lol. so who knows on that one.

The other type I have been seeing right now is what is listed as premium. My favorite part about it is that it has tiny crystals all over it. No big orphan flakes floating around. It still isn't straight off the brick, but its clean and it gets me on a good one. It may be that this is the bolivian with an extra cut in it. It has similar qualities, yet would be less pure when held side to side. We are getting it from mexicans in the barrio. I just sent out an order and got a complaint about it. So I am curious to see what b0lix and murder have to say about it. Be honest guys. I like it.

What has been rumored to be around....

Peruvian Pink... apparently this shit is pink and you can only get it if you are linked up to I forget which cartel. Apparently we know someone who knows someone that knows when it comes around.

Coconut flavored coke? Yea sounds crazy right. I don't know about it but it is rumored to exist and I would jump on the chance to try it at least.

What are you guys seeing? have you seen similar stuff to what I am talking about or is it local phenomenon?

wow.. up at 5am, then at 7am the wife and kids are up and off to school.. 7:15am your bumping?? is that before or after breakfast? or is the cola your breakfast? idk, maybe your not a breakfast eater, me personally i gotta eat first thing i do when i get up in the am..... when im on vacation in central and south america, i get up around 10-11am, have coffee / breakfast, then i'll hit a line or two, or three.... its a great way to start the day, but then again i dont do shit when im on vacation so i can be high all day ...... aint gotta be anywhere at any specific time ya know? 

i use to be a big weed smoker every evening for years and years i smoked in the evenings after work to relax, but my asthma got so bad i had to quit. so now i only smoke ever now and again, but just a few puffs... cant be hitting big ass bongs like i use to in my 20's but xanax and a few lines every evening is pretty normal for me..

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on April 20, 2013, 07:36 am
Late night lives on.

I am sorry for my absence but I needed to clear up some things and figure out some hodge podge and this thread fell by the wayside of my mind. Do not fear though, unlike your father, I will never forget you. I have let this thread become its on entity and take off on it's own two thread legs,  it's got a set of wings after emerging from the cucoon hell that is thread infancy and is marching to its own beat now.........what I really want is to take this time to thank everyone that contributes to the thread by posting in a consistent manner and not letting it fall to the dark side.

J
Murder
Studio

And the others who have chimed in.

I would also like to give a big shout out to KotT for being a hell of a vendor on SR and coming on and giving his two btc's of info. Anyone reading this and thinking of a vendor to try? Do NOT hesitate with KotT as you will be hard pressed to find a better or more honest/straight up vendor than KotT.



*lastly, and I think most importantly, I want to take this opportunity to have a moment of thread silence. I want the anonymous faces of SR and this thread who have been impacted by any of the events that have unfolded in the past week to know that though we may be faceless does not mean we can't support one another. Our world is not easy or easy to understand. Evil will happen, and it's at our worst that we see the best. I implore you all to search on google to find Patton Oswalts paragraph on this, it was touching and heartfelt and he was able to articulate it better than I ever will.


Shine on you crazy diamonds.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

so i'm wondering whether the coke is better here on SR because there seem to be a lot of hags out there.
And I AM NOT willing to pay more than 100 euros for a gram, considering local it's 50.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Strickland Cocaine on April 25, 2013, 11:00 pm
my friend recommended a coca grinder thingy for a snuff bullet to really get that powder as fine as possible. and utilize the bullet to the full potential. He has one. its cylindrical metal thing with a crank on it. rocks go in and fine.. fine powder comes out. i don't know what they are called in the non-coke world... maybe a pill grinder. idk. not my most informative post ever.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on April 25, 2013, 11:40 pm
Just doing a bit of coke with friends tonight and one of them used a method to crush the little rocks that I hadn't seen in years.

He stretched a currency note over the little pile and rubbed a credit card end over the note backwards and forwards a few times hard enough to break the rocks and then chopped it up with a blade.

Any of you ever use this little method?

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on April 27, 2013, 07:03 am
Just dropping in to give a little love to all my late night cohorts. Hoping everyone has something to do this week and enjoy the weather if it's nice out. Take a break from the rails if you can and smell the roses. You'll always remember the little stuff in life.

And onion, heed the advice of others and don't let our hypocritical nature make you tune us out. It's best to leave the great white for times of special occasion or when wanting to enjoy a night with friends, it gets the mood and words flowing like a tap. And I can speak from experience that sometimes this isn't the best thing. You don't want to regret anything you said or did.
So please respect the power that lays in the line.


A great line from a great comic.

"With great power comes great responsibility"

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on April 30, 2013, 12:15 am
Quote from: Suidone on April 25, 2013, 12:02 pm
ow yeah forgot : does anyone here sometimes uses a snuff bullet ?
could be handy for when I'm out. I just don't know what the amount of a dose is in those things.

usually they are around 50mg per hit.. i use those small little bullets when i go out in public places, like if i need to hit the casino and i want to bring some coke with me, those are usually the best way to transport coke, plus when you hit the bathroom, its easy to use, vs keeping it in a plastic bag, then trying to open it and scoop it out with a pen cap... with the snuff bullet, all you do is turn and sniff.. easy and quick... you just cant expect a lot in 1 hit ya know? so if you have to, do 2 or 3 hits to get that *buzz*
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on April 30, 2013, 12:19 am
Quote from: Strickland Cocaine on April 25, 2013, 11:00 pm
my friend recommended a coca grinder thingy for a snuff bullet to really get that powder as fine as possible. and utilize the bullet to the full potential. He has one. its cylindrical metal thing with a crank on it. rocks go in and fine.. fine powder comes out. i don't know what they are called in the non-coke world... maybe a pill grinder. idk. not my most informative post ever.

dude, the best way to grind up rocks is by using a plain ol juice strainer
http://www.finest-spirits.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/strainer.jpg

just drop the rocks in there, and use your 2 fingers to scrape it down into a fine powder..takes a little bit of effort but you will certainly grind rocks down to a very very fine powder... years ago i would use a razor blade to chop up rocks, shit took me a long ass time and i still couldnt grind it down to a fine powder.. then one day someone showed me this 'juice strainer' trick.. works like a charm... and they are like $5 at your local grocery store.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on April 30, 2013, 12:28 am
Quote from: murderface2012 on April 29, 2013, 07:24 am
you just beat me to it!!  ;)  and yes, it does!!
day 3 no cola for me.. no worries!! it's en route!!
just maaaaaaad chronic baby!! lol

Bro, i was traveling Europe for a week... no coke for 9 days!!!!! we'd go out to bars and drink every night, but shit, drinking just isnt the same without a few bumps ya know? places i was visiting they were dry, no supply of good product anywhere. a friend gave me a "bump" of some local stuff .. i was like, "wtf is that"? he said "its coke" .. im like, uh, thats like speed and baby powder .... so i just stuck with alcohol every night, seems to be pretty common in Europe that people can drink beer openly in the streets at 10am......

i got back home after traveling Europe... first thing i did was go to my box, and grind down a big ol rock, and hit 2 massive lines... WOAH, talk about Fuck yeah, now we are talking!!!! nice buzzzzzzzz ::) ::) ::) ::) ::) ::) ::)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: PuretyAboveAll on April 30, 2013, 07:33 am
Quote from: Studio54 on April 30, 2013, 12:28 am
Quote from: murderface2012 on April 29, 2013, 07:24 am
you just beat me to it!!  ;)  and yes, it does!!
day 3 no cola for me.. no worries!! it's en route!!
just maaaaaaad chronic baby!! lol

Bro, i was traveling Europe for a week... no coke for 9 days!!!!! we'd go out to bars and drink every night, but shit, drinking just isnt the same without a few bumps ya know? places i was visiting they were dry, no supply of good product anywhere. a friend gave me a "bump" of some local stuff .. i was like, "wtf is that"? he said "its coke" .. im like, uh, thats like speed and baby powder .... so i just stuck with alcohol every night, seems to be pretty common in Europe that people can drink beer openly in the streets at 10am......

i got back home after traveling Europe... first thing i did was go to my box, and grind down a big ol rock, and hit 2 massive lines... WOAH, talk about Fuck yeah, now we are talking!!!! nice buzzzzzzzz ::) ::) ::) ::) ::) ::) ::)

Yeah the street coke here in the EU, especially in the northern parts. Are cut up beyond recognition sadly. The 70% is around, but not from street vendors. The +80% is more and more rare the past 3 years. And the price on that in Scandinavia is 160-290 Euro a G.

In Spain and Portugal though. Sooo much cheaper.

It's all about patience when looking for good coke abroad. Even when I was working in China, I managed to find a decent quality of cocaine. Took me a long time. With a lot of hit n' misses. But finally I found my 65-70% coke. And yes damnit! I am kinda proud that I was able to get that in a country where trafficers/dealers get the death sentence if they have 20 grams or more on them.
I shouldn't be proud of that, I know.
But keep this in mind: Having the best quality coke around, can open doors for ya at any business lunch ;)
Network network network!!

well..

chop chop chop.. lol

under normal circumstances, i can rarely afford to buy more than a g on SR.. the only cola available IRL is hella cheap, but utter shit!! so i rarely get to 'indulge' like i truly desire!!  :P

haha..
my last hoorah was with the misses in las vegas.. literally a hop, skip, and jump away from my abode.. we had 7 g's, a ball of reg and a ball of 'bomb'.. this is A LOT for me/ us!! she rarely uses, and i'm a broke joke!! lol
well..
i wake up total 'fear and loathing' style.. all dressed up, slumped over on an unreclined chair, holding our key card.. my iphone playing some WAY too intense dnb.. and no misses to be found!! when i finally gain center, i find a wad of fucking atm receipts literally showing my balance going negative!! realized that it had been two days, and my cola was no where to be found!! hahaha i remember doing fatty bo datty's.. but was pretty sure i lost it at some point.. dumbass!!
even when i caught up with my squeeze box, her and i couldn't even peice together the events..

damn vegas!!
and damn coke!!  ;)
why does it have to be so spectacularly wonderful!!  :P

fuck man, i been to vegas so many times i cant even remember most of what happened except flying into town and catching the red eye flight back to the east coast... we were all wrecked, after discovering certain places in central america, i swore i would never go back to Vegas and i havent been since 2003... but I miss Club Ra at the Luxor --- talk about a fucking party... wow..  wild times..

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 04, 2013, 02:06 pm
Quote from: Studio54 on May 03, 2013, 11:42 pm
Quote from: Suidone on May 03, 2013, 09:39 am

who did you order thru? and is the street quality in your area good / bad / shit ??

Bungee54, but the letter arrived after all at in 2 days, so that's OK.
Well, I can't really comment on the quality of any cocaine product lately, although I'm still trying to get a decent high. For some reason I don't respond like I should at cocaine nor amphetamines. I have been on wellbutrin (some sort of antidepresant) for a year untill 3 weeks ago, and maybe the culprit is there. I hope this changes quickly because I'm not experiencing that much fun on those drugs. And still I've bought for like 600 euro's last couple of 3 weeks  :-[ After this weekend I'm gonna wait a couple of weeks and see if it's better than. If not, than I'm fucked.

But, I don't think the quality is that bad where I live. Wish I could compare it to Bungee54s. But next week I will bring bungee54s coke to a lab and have it tested. then we'll know for certain if it's quality product or not.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on May 04, 2013, 07:36 pm
Quote from: Suidone on May 04, 2013, 02:06 pm
I have been on wellbutrin (some sort of antidepresant) for a year untill 3 weeks ago, and maybe the culprit is there. I hope this changes quickly because I'm not experiencing that much fun on those drugs. And still I've bought for like 600 euro's last couple of 3 weeks  :-[ After this weekend I'm gonna wait a couple of weeks and see if it's better than. If not, than I'm fucked.

totally know what your going through bro, i had same issue where for about a year and half i was on antidepressant meds.. believe me, it does effect your ability to enjoy things like coke so your not alone here... Wellbutrin is different because it isnt an SSRI it is an aminoketone. It is believed to balance the levels of dopamine and norepinephrine in the brain. It is frequently is prescribed to people with ADHD as well as depression. It has a stimulant effect so thats why it is also used to treat ADHD and why it is different from other SSRIs. and this is really why when your doing things like coke along with your meds, your brains chemistry is already being regulated by the Wellbutrin...

it took me about 2-3 months totally off med's before i could get that "feel good" high from Cocaine again... so best advice just be patient

true story.. i hope this doesn't reveal anything  ???

quite a while ago.. a main highway, but seasonly used.. there's a small po dunk town, and around some farms and misc. houses there was this huge barn.. completely inconspicuous!! well, one day this barn caught fire.. and what did those brave firefighters find in that barn you ask?? tons of cached cola!! i'm talking stacks of kilos on pallets!! i saw the pics!! but was that shit on the news?? oh helllll no!! my pops told me (since he's buddy buddy with the sherriffs) that the odds of most of it being pablo's was very likely!! fuuuuuuuck!! where was i?!?!?!?!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: onionologist on May 06, 2013, 01:50 pm
Hey all y'all peeps! MONDAY morning here. Woot woot!

Been tootin on some 10toes cola over the weekend. Have a bunch of comments towards it, but I am not experienced enough in the field to give an accurate review. Maybe y'all can probe the quality out of my with various questions. I dunno!

It has a bitter taste, it doesn't burn going down. Uhm. It gives me some goobers the next day, even after good nasal rinses. It dissolves between my fingers into an oily film, although I noticed a couple clear shards lingering about afterwards...

But ya! This isn't a review, just a spew! :)

Hope you guys are good. My spacewranger, btcltd, and one other that passes my mind at the moment should be coming this week! ha!

-onion-

On a conversational note--------------------------
I am curious how people consume their cola...by that I mean...how often during the day, the week, the month.
I know there are a lot of functional people here, and we all partake in our favorite substances to some extent or the other.
I am just curious how everybody else goes about their cola habit.
Are you able to store it for long periods without touching it?
That kinda thing!

Word-  8)

-onion-
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: ozymandias2013 on May 07, 2013, 01:47 am
I used to be a binger way back when. And mixed a lot--booze, weed, coke, benzos, etc.

Now I'm much more of a moderate user of all of the above :) I can't find any decent coke on the streets where I'm from (we're known more for being a methtown than anything... and I've never tried nor do I intend to try meth unless it's Desoxyn) so it's only recently that I started having it around again after years of not touching it.

My favorite way to have it is as a social lubricant, to be honest, something other than weed and booze when friends come over before going out. I don't drink with it anymore even though it feels amazing because drinking and coke leads to me binging on both :) I never do more than 200mg in one session and that amount is taken over a course of 3 hours or so. I find that this allows me to sleep fine at night without any downers... I like sharing... so I actually love being around my gakked out friends but being the least gakked out. Does that make any sense?

I've learned to stop chasing that elusive first euphoric high and enjoy coke for the feelings it gives me now. I'm a big fan of less is more... I used to love feeling gakked out but now I absolutely hate hate hate it. I find that lines, depending on quality of coke, of 30-50mg have me chatty and feeling great but when it wears off there's no sudden fall-off, just a transition into another part of the day/night.

Lately I've been tooting more than I usually do :) Not in terms of amount but in terms of frequency. I'm not averse on a super busy day to having a small line during a break and then getting back to work. I've had coke use creep up on me before so I find that, at the end of the day (or the next morning), i always have to ask myself whether or not I'd do it again. Years ago during my binging it would always surely be a NO I WOUDLNT because I'd be near-catatonic during the awful crashes after a night of doing a few grams. Whereas coke used to be the main event for me,  now coke is merely an enhancer of things that are already fun/meaningful.

So, I guess to answer your question, I don't like hard and fast rules like "never do it back to back days" "even doing it once a week will get you addicted." The thing is: I HAVE been addicted to coke before, and I've gotten off it. Other than being lethargic and having a fucked up sleep schedule for a week or so, there haven't been any ill side effects. The last half year that I've had coke around, sometimes I'll go a month without it, sometimes I'll do it 3 times in one week. As long as it sort of goes with how I'm feeling at the moment instead of taking over the moment, that's the way I like it  :D

edit: dunno whether ur from the US; I hope not cuz i'm only in for EU/UK vendors

On a separate note: I really need to take a break for a few days cuz last thursday until now I never have gone to sleep before 4-5 am. I do take couple of mg clonazepam, but always only at 4-5 lol. It hasn't been coke all the time though (6apb, coke and mdma)

And my clonazepam is almost to its end so i have to source it via SR, which kinda sucks because at the pharmacist it costs about 5 euro and on SR about 60 :D but my psychiatrist nor doctors will give me a prescription this soon again as they know that I abuse everything :)

aye dios mio!! tranquilo, tranquilo.. sorry to vent!! if weed don't help, you KNOW something's wrong!! yea, sobriety may be clarifying.. but it sure as shit isn't benefficial!!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 07, 2013, 08:46 pm
 :o damn, did I have a fucking shitty day.

Typed a long story but edited and made it shorter to prevent revealing too much

So I wanted to get Bungee54 coke tested as well as some local coke. the latter I still had to buy before I left. My main guy didn't respond and my second neither at first. The second did came through after an hour and a half (I only had three hours before my train left). Had my scale with me as only 100mg is required to hand in. The remain of the gram I just snorted where I was and on the train. An hour before I was to leave my first guy responds so I thought what the hell, I'll buy another and save it for tonight when I go home. As you probably know, dealers aren't known for their punctuality. Then some other things happened which I can't reveal but I didn't want to cross the border with a whole gram so I hid it somewhere (from my main guy). A lot went wrong and I had really no fucking luck today. I arrived two hours later than expected so I couldn't get to the second test centre (as they only allow one sample). I had to freaking run my ass off and was my whole body was sweating like a motherfucker. The guy almost didn't wanted to let me in because I arrived exactly at closing hour. Luckily he did take my sample. Else all this shit would've been for nothing.

When I travel back, MY FUCKING COKE IS GONE. can't really imagine how anyone could've found it  :-\
Was kinda pissed so just ordered another gram before going home.

Then the good part came because when I opened my mailbox my package from bcpltd arrived.

djezusssssssssssss wasted some money.

edit: just did a line of bcpltd coke and although my brains still aren't functioning as they should, I can pretty much tell that this is quality gear. Great consistency and the smell and taste are exactly as they are supposed to be. If I manage to save 100mg of it, i will probably bring in to the lab somewhere in the near future.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on May 07, 2013, 10:01 pm
Quote from: onionologist on May 07, 2013, 12:54 am
Quote from: Studio54 on May 07, 2013, 12:02 am
Quote from: onionologist on May 06, 2013, 10:53 pm
*Cricket...Cricket....Cricket*

Monday night peeps... long ass day, time for a cocktail and a few rails!!!! teeth already numb ::) ::) ::)

Studio. Glad you made it through the Monday my friend!!  8)

On a conversational note--------------------------
I am curious how people consume their cola...by that I mean...how often during the day, the week, the month.
I know there are a lot of functional people here, and we all partake in our favorite substances to some extent or the other.
I am just curious how everybody else goes about their cola habit.
Are you able to store it for long periods without touching it?
That kinda thing!

Word-  8)

-onion-

I snort using a straw after crushing it and chopping with a bohemian blade. I don't share notes or straws if I'm with others. I enjoy doing it on my own but have 2 friends I would be happy to do it with but I find if I start on my own I'll happily stay on my own doing it which although enjoyable is a bit of a waste in a social way.

I have grown to like it more over the last couple of years and since using SR, the quality of what I do is a massive change! I kind of always thought there had to be more to coke than the shitty buzz from the local shit but the very odd time it was OK.

I'm trying to control the amount I do or time I do it as I find if I have it around I'll trick myself into "trying it out to see what it's like" and then I can't stop. So, I'm a fiend when I get started.

I'm currently reading David Lee's Cocaine Handbook and my new plan of putting my stash into an inaccessible area until I want to remove it to use seems to be working at the moment unless my SR order arrives and I don't get it to the stash area in time! I'm trying to control my fiending and to learn to take .25 for a night and leave it at that for a couple of weeks or even month if possible but that's easier said than done because as you know yourself, it's a beautiful thing snorting a juicy white glistening line of goodness!!!  :)

P.S. Just to add, I'm always thinking of the bloody stuff too!!!  ;D Love it  :)
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 07, 2013, 10:12 pm
In the past I always used my own notes, however since I started again we practically all share the same note (and it's always mine :p) and we're with a group of 5-8, so that's a lot of noses ! quite unsanitary actually. And there's this one guy whos ocassionally there and after snorting with my note, he also puts it into his mouth ::)

As for the type user I am; I'm a binger and CANNOT stay off it; never could. Normally I only do it in the weekends starting Friday evening and I always end up ordering 3-4 grams which I use throughout the weekend. About two grams on the friday evening but that's also because I share quite a lot with my friends.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 07, 2013, 11:24 pm
I also contemplated buying such a snorter; However the most part of my cocaine use is not at home and I'm not going to run around with a special made cocaine snorter in my pockets.

The fun thing about a note that is continually used by lots of people who do not unroll it afterwards is that at some point you can snort a decent amount. This happened this morning; I unrolled it at home before leaving and luckily this was above my table and a bunch of coke fell out. I weighted it and it was a good 80mg :D

Word-  8)

me personally.. im totally functional during the day, i work 10 hr days then later in the evening, i relax, have cocktail then draw a line or two.. kick back and relax, i feel the coke, but i can still perform normal tasks and act the same as i do when im sober, so if someone comes over, they dont know any different....

i could do a few lines every night, still hit the bed by 11pm, sleep just fine, up at 8am and at work by 9am, totally normal routine for me amigo.... but the weekends i can push it kinda late, maybe 2-3am?

but again, ive had 2-3 Ounces on hand, stored away and not touched it for a few weeks... guess i was just busy and not in the mood for it ya know? i just had other shit to do so i was busy and didnt dig in at night......

but then again, ive done coke for over 10 years so to me, i can be totally normal while im using....
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: murderface2012 on May 08, 2013, 12:18 am
hello hello my lovely droogies!!

Quote from: Studio54 on May 07, 2013, 04:02 pm
Quote from: murderface2012 on May 07, 2013, 02:33 am

wednesday is gonna be a much better day amigo :)

oh yeaaa!! can't wait!!

@onion
haha damn cola.. hate to love it, and love to hate it!!
if the shit wasn't regional (as far as botanically) i'd be burying my face in it!!
under 'normal' circumstances, i have about a G that i bump on..
a little in the morning to jump start my ass, and a little at night to give me that ahhhhhhh feeling.. i only get to truly indulge when either, i have more than a G or it's party time..
and for me, it's crazy straws baby!! jk

truth be told.. i'm a stoner to the core!! i personally toke every hour on the hour untill i pass the fuck out!! i'm buried in hash and herb.. but my IRL cola connects are whack, so hence my cola cola cola talk.. lol
i'm on SR soley for the coke!!
thank buddha i found it!!

When the pills were all consumed. I started a three month every day whole day binge on GHB. It's really a shame, because being able to control your drug use is a gift and it gives much more joy.

something else: the baggie from bcpltd is already empty :( (but I safed 100mg and I ordered only half a gram. Still very good shit. Really happy about this, can't say it enough.

This morning a big chunk of one of my teeth broke off. I guess the coke is to be blamed for this. anyone else had this issue before ( I did in the past and it caused the worst pain I ever felt. Someone the cocaine got in/under/or whatever the tooth and got infected with an abscess or something alike. Djezus couldn't sleep for days and dentist wasn't available right away. But back than I always put the empty seal/bag in my mouth for the cocaine taste; i think that's the culprit.

The guy walks in with the bacpac, and he says "I need a $100 bill.... :P The other guy replies "Well i dont have a $100 bill, will a $20 bill be ok?

Funny how the higher currency is the nicest to draw through, ha ha. ;)

Oh, when i said gold plated, it wasnt gold, should have been more specific.. " I love gold!" (goldmember) :P

Post by: onionologist on May 09, 2013, 02:09 am
I've always tooted stuff....so I've always had a method. I like to use a good ol bic pen. Pull the guts out...Tube on one end, (nose end), and narrow tube on the other end(line tooter end). You can disassemble it, and scrap it out...and reclaim some goodness!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Intraterrestrial on May 09, 2013, 03:19 pm
Wow, am amazed at all these functional cocaine users around these parts!

My usage is strictly party time only. I wouldn't even entertain using without having at least a gram of hq to myself. A line or two is neither here nor there to me, unfortunately perhaps I don't see coke as a functional drug at all, no sir. I couldn't go to work on it or anything remotely like that, the good stuff is far too euphoric for me to be in a mundane situation on it.

Love to party on my own, with a mate or two, or ideally with a sexy lady (me and the ex were mad for it). Only roa's for me are insufflated or freebased and smoked, mmm. Been using around 25 years, tis just a monthly thing thesedays due to the longer age-related recovery times.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: onionologist on May 09, 2013, 04:22 pm
We need to define : Jittery.

What do you all feel is "Jittery". To me...having no more than .250 in a 8 hour period, and stopping at 6pm...not being able to sleep until 12 is jittery to me. Waking up still feeling like my teeth hurt because my fucking jaw has been clenched. That's jittery to me. Jittery is uncomfortable amount of energy that I feel should not be felt for the duration it is.

If I wanted speed, or meth I would have bought that. I realize cocaine is a stimulant as well, but from what people say it shouldn't keep you up for hours and hours. Not complaining, just getting a feel for everyone's use of their vocabulary word.

Today's post is brought you you by the letter J. J is for Jittery.

-onion-

MB-"Ah....Johnny....like where the fuck you at?"
You just, waltz onto the show, say hi...and then bye?"

JM-"Pssst! (JM gives MB the look)

MB-"Audience..please excuse me for just one moment..(cough..sniff)

MB-(speaks in com...."go to commercial break!")

MB-"Johnny, whats up...?

JM-"it%$ened0(

MB-"Ah...ha ha, you motherfucker i see...how the fuck you even drive here?"

JM-'I dunnnahowthge890yfuck$3man..buzzzzz.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: CallmeBruce on May 12, 2013, 01:25 pm
My Cocaine Plugging Odyssey.
Subtitled: Guide to plugging for the anally retentive.

I have to share this weird journey with someone and the late night cocaine thread seems the perfect place.

SR supplied me with amazing cola, its Saturday afternoon and tonight I am planning to rock.
Problem. I've got really bad hay-fever at the moment. Just the thought of putting anything up my nose is making me sneeze.

I vomit at the sight of blood and injecting is just not me.  So I trawl the forums for advice and come across the idea of plugging the cocaine.  PUT IT UP MY ARSE????? YOU'VE GOT TO BE JOKING!!!!!!

After the initial panic wears off I figure, that I am abusing my body anyway, I really want to get high,  and maybe I should get over it and give it a try. I go on the hunt for appropriate equipment.

Attempt #1 Dental Irrigating Syringe. You know the ones with the wicked long curved plastic end that you use to flush out cavities? Had it lying around from my wisdom teeth operation a few years back. I figured that the tapered end would be good for inserting...... OUCH.... WRONG! IS THAT BLOOD? ??????(vomits).

Read some more from forums

Attempt #2 5mm Syringe. I go to the store and ask for one.... make up some immense story about needing it to oil a door hinge. I don't know why I bothered. No one in that store believes I am anything other than a drug addict from now on. And they would not be wrong. Hmm it looks thin enough, certainly I pass stools bigger than that. OK here we go.... NOPE. Rectum clamps shut like an oyster possessed.

Conversation between me and my rectum

Bruce: CMON just open up, I've lubed it and all.
Rectum: Piss off Bruce, this is a one way street. I'm not opening for anyone except Angelina Jolee.
Bruce: Don't you mean Brad Pitt.
Rectum: If I meant Brad Pitt we wouldn't be having this conversation.... OUCH... Forget it Bruce NO means NO.

Read some more from forums. Figured that Rectum is going to play hard to get and need some heavy equipment. Return to drug store for an enema kit. I told Rectum I was not kidding around any more. But while I was there saw my salvation.
Micro-enemas.
These are 5mm single dose enema solutions for people with severe constipation. The applicator is designed for plugging. One look at it and I knew that Rectum would be unable to stop me.

Attempt #3   Micro-enema. Break of seal, empty contents and thoroughly rise out the container. Refill with dissolved solution by squeezing it flat, inserting it into dissolved cocaine solution in glass then expanding it to suck up the solution.

Conversation between me and my rectum

Rectum: You again? I thought I told you to piss off.....
Bruce: Shaddap and take this
Rectum: Ha,  I will stop you.... wait..... NOOOO...
Bruce:  ;D
Rectum: You Bastard.

So there you have it. The effects were as good as the forums said and it seemed to last much longer than snorting/bumping.  I also made up another one for later that evening and resealed it with a few drops of wax. Though slipping into the bathroom with it provided another interesting story for another time. I'm still going strong hence this long winded journal.

Micro enemas. Several brands are available. Microlax, Micolette, Colance.

Plugging for the anally retentive.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

i always enjoy a good rectum to owner conversation!!  :P

have you considered 'bombing'?? where you just wrap some up in a little tissue paper ball and swallow it.. seems a little easier, but hey, i ain't gonna stop you  ;)
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Intraterrestrial on May 12, 2013, 05:19 pm
^^^The problem with bombing is that the bioavailability of cocaine is extremely low when eaten, whereas when plugged it is greater than snorting even.

Otherwise we'd all just be munching coke on toast instead of sniffing it!
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 12, 2013, 05:24 pm
Quote from: CallmeBruce on May 12, 2013, 01:25 pm

Problem. I've got really bad hay-fever at the moment. Just the thought of putting anything up my nose is making me sneeze.


I snorted about 8-9 grams through my nose this week and I also have hay-fever which is just starting to get worse !
My nose is totally fucked up, hurts like hell but didn't really bled yet. However, good that you post this cuz I never thought of plugging cocaine ! I've only done it with 2c-x compounds. I don't have any problems though to get a normal 5 cc syringe up my ass :D

So you just mixed the cocaine with water ?

Although I'm gonna stay low next week and only consume the products that enter the mailbox(SR), i'm just gonna plug it too. Good idea mate  ;) It's always a little awkward though, especially getting the syringe back out, cus ur arse kinda wants to flop it out.

I'm also out of benzo's so can't keep snorting at night anymore !

In the weekends I still live at my parents and they kinda suspect that i'm back on drugs cuz well you know you can look weird when ur on cocaine. Furthermore when you're running around the house late a night with a giant kitchen knife cuz you're freaking paranoid that doesn't really help :p

EDIT: 5 min after posting this I started bleeding  :-[
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: CallmeBruce on May 13, 2013, 02:54 am
Quote from: murderface2012 on May 12, 2013, 03:07 pm
have you considered 'bombing'?? where you just wrap some up in a little tissue paper ball and swallow it.. seems a little easier, but hey, i ain't gonna stop you  ;)

Doah! No never heard if it before. LOL don't tell Rectum because he still mightily pissed with me.

Quote from: Suidone on May 12, 2013, 05:24 pm
I don't have any problems though to get a normal 5 cc syringe up my ass :D

Lucky you. Must be a more relaxed person than me.

Quote from: Suidone on May 12, 2013, 05:24 pm
So you just mixed the cocaine with water ?

Yeah, I filled the micro-enema container with water then emptied it into a glass, so I knew there would be little wastage. I then added the cocaine and mixed it well. The good part of this is that some impurities and cuts don't dissolve as well as cocaine does so you can fish them out.

The other plus is that if you get caught with the container. its just constipation medicine.

Thanks for listening to my story. I honestly cant share it with anyone IRL.

lol shelf life of cocaine. that's one thing I never should worry over.
Maybe if I had over a kg of stash, but the i probably snort myself to death before it expires.

well you would want to make sure that you have the kg triple vac sealed, so that its not exposed to any kind of moisture or humidity in the air
ive seen a brick go bad b/c of horrible packing methods when transporting large quantities, shit was exposed way too long and upon arrival it was just a
bag of mush... so sad it had to be wasted like that...

you could try and go through a kilo by your self.... but its gonna take you a good long while,
1 kilo = 1000 grams
1 gram per day, for 365 days
would take you 2.7 years

that would be if it was just you and yourself banging down on the brick.. it sounds good, but prob by the 4th month you'd be like "i am so sick of this i cant even touch it anymore" and take a 2-3 month break.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 14, 2013, 03:48 pm
I've gotta comment on my earlier statement bout ItalianMaffiaBrussels cocaine. I bought some local cocaine today and it seems that i'm also feeling much less than usual. So any implications from my earlier statement bout IBMs new coke should be disregarded. dunnno what's going on.

It should be getting better over time as the wellbutrins effects should stop fucking up my high.
Maybe i used to much nose spray which has constricted my blood vessels and as a result blocks the absorption of the cocaine. Anyone familiar with adverse effects of certain nose sprays (avamys or dexarhinospray(Tramazoline).

Ow yeah, it's freaking difficult to wake up last couple of days when i'm out of coke or stimulants.
I did receive my klonopins today so i can finally get in bed on time.

btw thanks for the support guys  :-*
