btw thanks for the support guys  :-*

Is your tolerance shattered from the 9 grams you said you did over a week was it? I find that after a couple of nights in a row doing it, by the 3rd night it's hard to see the good from it and I regret wasting it by binging!

I find the same with pills/mdma, second night your chasing the great feeling of the 1st night and on the 3rd night I might as well throw the stuff away as there is no affect.

Hope you have a good healthy diet mate with  vitamins etc.included to go with your coke diet! Makes a difference for me with the lifestyle of clubbing and cokeing!  :)
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: ozymandias2013 on May 14, 2013, 09:14 pm
Quote from: HitTheRoad on May 14, 2013, 08:50 pm

Is your tolerance shattered from the 9 grams you said you did over a week was it? I find that after a couple of nights in a row doing it, by the 3rd night it's hard to see the good from it and I regret wasting it by binging!

I find the same with pills/mdma, second night your chasing the great feeling of the 1st night and on the 3rd night I might as well throw the stuff away as there is no affect.

Hope you have a good healthy diet mate with  vitamins etc.included to go with your coke diet! Makes a difference for me with the lifestyle of clubbing and cokeing!  :)

I feel the same way. Years ago I used to use everyday and spent a LOT of $ doing that. Now I find it's so much more enjoyable if I do it occasionally... A good diet and exercise in between sessions of any drug that affects dopamine (or serotonin like molly) does WONDERS. The brain adapts to stims and down-regulates your dopamine production... I find that tolerance builds quick as fuck w/ coke. But a good few days of rest and exercise seem to jump start the dopamine production again--I get high as fuck off of even a tiny amount of coke after a week of being healthy. Is it bad that most of the time I exercise with one of the goals being that I'll get that much higher when I do drugs over the weekend? :)

Don't get me wrong :) Sometimes if I get some goooood stuff, I'll still toot on consecutive days until it's gone, but more often than not to save $$ I tend to be moderate about it.

Take care of yourself Suidone!!!
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on May 14, 2013, 09:38 pm
^^^
"I get high as fuck off of even a tiny amount of coke after a week of being healthy. Is it bad that most of the time I exercise with one of the goals being that I'll get that much higher when I do drugs over the weekend? :)"

Sounds like a good idea to me! Double bonus. Getting fit for the purpose of getting higher. If you ever stopped with drugs you'd probably keep up with the exercise anyway because I believe that's addictive enough in itself.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: ozymandias2013 on May 14, 2013, 10:28 pm
Quote from: HitTheRoad on May 14, 2013, 09:38 pm
Sounds like a good idea to me! Double bonus. Getting fit for the purpose of getting higher. If you ever stopped with drugs you'd probably keep up with the exercise anyway because I believe that's addictive enough in itself.

Exercise is addictive for sure! Endorphins ('til recently, I never knew that it actually stood for endogenous morphine) are god's gift to us. So when I'm asked whether or not I do opiates usually I answer... Yes, yes, I do, a few times a year BUT technically, each time I work out or run, the point is precisely to mine my own body for its natural opiates =D You should see me the month before a music festival. I lay the foundation for my future getting-high-as-fuck by exercising like a maniac, veggies/fruits up the wazoo... and come time for game time... holy shiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiet... Makes comedowns a lot less rough, too.

I'm not a natural exerciser though. Used to be obese, had a lot of problems with daytime fatigue... loved sugar and salt and fast food, smoked a pack a day, 4-5 joints a day etc. Also have dealt with (still dealing with) depression. But after my first acid trip a few years ago... I realized in this can't-put-into-words way how much more amazing drugs--or anything, for that matter--would be if I took care of precisely the things which interact with the drugs to produce the high--my body and my brain. That drugs are an enhancement of life, not an escape from it.

Anyhow--I'm going to shut the fuck up now. Any time I start talking about this I always fear that I'm going to turn out sounding like some evangelizing health fanatic that's trying to get everybody to get in shape and "feel better about themselves". You know those people... the ones that spend their lives in the gym and look down on anyone that DARES to eat fast food. fuck those hypocrites, who obsess over their health at the expense of everything else. Nah, that's not the point... it's more that I truly and deeply believe in responsible drug use and everybody's right to it... and I realized years ago that responsible drug use, in my personal worldview, doesn't only involve the drugs themselves, but what I do with myself precisely when I'm not getting high... Life is fucking beautiful because of the variety of experiences and sensations available to us. I enjoy being sober the next day as much as I enjoy getting high as fuck today. It's all about enjoying the contrasts between the two states.

Peace out y'all! Hope you're all having a wonderful week.

~ozy
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: ozymandias2013 on May 14, 2013, 10:34 pm
On another note, had many friends in town this past weekend to ski. Finished almost all of my stash... Taking into consideration everybody's opinions, their faves were KotT, bcpltd, and SW (in that order). I also had stuff from Nod, Marlo, and SuperTrips on hand.

Now I am SO out of coke and SO happy to see KotT working on reupping =D Also going to try this priceisright dude out, who said he'd drop his price/g down to $80 later on today. Will let y'all know how it is when I receive.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on May 14, 2013, 11:38 pm
Quote from: Suidone on May 14, 2013, 03:48 pm
I've gotta comment on my earlier statement bout ItalianMaffiaBrussels cocaine. I bought some local cocaine today and it seems that i'm also feeling much less than usual. So any implications from my earlier statement bout IBMs new coke should be disregarded. dunnno what's going on.

It should be getting better over time as the wellbutrins effects should stop fucking up my high.
Maybe i used to much nose spray which has constricted my blood vessels and as a result blocks the absorption of the cocaine. Anyone familiar with adverse effects of certain nose sprays (avamys or dexarhinospray(Tramazoline).

Ow yeah, it's freaking difficult to wake up last couple of days when i'm out of coke or stimulants.
I did receive my klonopins today so i can finally get in bed on time.

btw thanks for the support guys  :-*

bro, glad to hear that your getting better and your coming off the wellbutrin - it certainly does fuck with your cocaine high, so your brain gets all kinds of confusing signals you really have a hard time enjoying the pure cocaine high... it just takes time for your body / brain to reset itself once it learns that it is no longer receiving the wellbutrin on a daily / weekly basis... i went through the same thing with anti-depressant years ago so be patient and give it time for your body to 'reset' and as far as the antihistamines blocking the action of the coke, nope they have no interaction. coke works on the dopamine system, the anthistamines, as you already know, work on the histamine receptors in your body.

glad you have the klonopins today, those really do help you sleep at night, nothing is worse than going to bed at 10pm, and waking up at 2am, 3am, 4am and not able to go back to sleep....
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on May 15, 2013, 06:44 am
Hello everyone, hows your day or night been> I think its very early morning in the USA now, so i can picture MB and Studio and the other regs all asleep on the other side of the planet.

Its raining hard right now....but hearing the rain i love.

Funny reading about tolerance before, if i had just one bump now i'd be flying. :P

I'd love to meet some of you if i ever flew over for a whirlwind trip.

Or we just meet in the EU somewhere....i have a perfect place for a meet.....summer days, blue sky and festivals.

Johnny is in a very heightened state of mind right now...just wanted to let you know that i thought of you all, i wonder what you all look like, sound like, etc.

I hope you all are well, in mind, body and spirit.

I would love it if someone would kindly rail a nice line for me.

I like them narrow, not fat, and the length of the razor blade, around 50-55mm.

Chopped on glass or black marble with a fresh new blade. Snorter on the side. ;) :P

Love you all. Long live the late show. (Quote from the talk show host himself, Marlon Brando)
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 15, 2013, 09:12 am
Alright, did some researching and started also thinking about things so I came to a couple of conclusions (dunno if they're correct, but it's possible).

So I blew another G through my nose yesterday without really feeling any positive effects; however the paranoia is always present and my pupils are dilated. So there was definitely cocaine in my system.
Because of my hay fever and doing so much coke I overused dexa rhino spray, which most likely did fuck up my nose and closes my mucus membranes to absorb the cocaine to a certain extent. This nasal spray did work great to get my nose unclogged, but it thus appears that over usage is really bad. Did some researching and found that some corticosteroids nasal sprays are the best treatment to relieve me from this hindrance for joy. Luckily I happen to have some of those also for my hay fever. This will take a while, but my nose is already feeling better and i'm also using some saline solution throughout the day for better recovery.

This couldn't however been the main reason why I couldn't get remotely high, because I tried plugging the cocaine yesterday evening and again, no effects except pupil dilation and increased heartbeat. but non positive effects whatsoever. Luckily I had my klonnies to get to sleep and at 2AM I finally slept; this morning I woke up kinda fine and immediately took my concerta (methylphenidate) which I have been taking daily for years except last couple of weeks. I kinda think that concerta counters any withdrawal effects from the cocaine.

Now the actual reason why I couldn't get high anymore is most likely mentioned by one of u guys: I've been using way too much cocaine non stop for maybe 2 weeks consecutive, barely sleeping and last but not least, my diet has been SHIT. I haven't eaten any fruits or getting vitamines whatsoever. I think I had diner 3 times last 10 days. Never had breakfast except for a bottle of chocolate milk. Finally had 2-3 times lunch past 10 days which consisted of 2 times mcdonalds and one time some sandwiches. Haven't been exercising either etc..

so if you take all the above mentioned shit together it prolly ain't that much of a surprise that I wasn't responding fine. And today I actually felt pretty good.  Wake up, eat some fruit, got some multivitamins. Took the concerta, no paranoia, i'm awake, no cravings and nose is already starting to get better :D 

So I'm definitely gonna stay of the coke for a couple of days/ a week and start getting healthy again.

I was a little surprised though because when I was about 16-17 years old I also used daily for months and never experienced any troubles. The difference with back then is that I was young, eating  better since I still lived at home, got more sleep and I was in the prime of my life as I was competing on international level at some sport.

Talk to ya later in couple of days :D
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on May 15, 2013, 09:47 am
Yep you've reached your peak and just experiencing toxicity from it all.

Thank your body for all the pleasure it has given you in the past, and start eating right.
If you can be somewhere without driving, then walk if you can.

Drink lots of water.

Eat some fish, and vegetables, steak, pasta, etc.

Then after a good week or two, your next line should and will be much more enjoyable. :P ;D
Take care of you. +1. ;)
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: ozymandias2013 on May 15, 2013, 03:14 pm
Quote from: Suidone on May 15, 2013, 09:12 am

So I'm definitely gonna stay of the coke for a couple of days/ a week and start getting healthy again.


Suidone--sending good vibes your way! jnemonic makes a great point--walking does wonders... and just being in the sun in general (Vitamin D is only available in obscure foods; we get most of it when contact with the sun synthesizes it... Vit. D deficiency can cause low moods among other things).

Anyway, mad props to you. It's not easy to pull back if we've been going full force for a while; I've been there. You'll be amazed at how letting your appetite come back and eating properly will help :) Eating and sleeping and moving around... three things humans were built to do... it's natural that our bodies would feel weird if we're missing any of these.

Keep us updated and take care of yourself!
~ozy
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: ilovethecolour on May 15, 2013, 03:23 pm
Everyday for two weeks is way too much in my opinion

You enjoy coke more when you have a little every now and then

My definition of every now and then is once every couple of weeks but lately ive been having it once a week and i sometimes feel thats also too much

It suppresses appetite and you loose sleep which i think is the most harmful part of it

If you can learn to exercise, eat well and have enough sleep then you will enjoy your coke more

Dont let it take control of you

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 16, 2013, 01:11 am
Traveled bout 12 hours today to get some a couple of coke samples tested at the lab; now they told me it's possible that it won't get tested due to financial restrictions  :o I really hope my samples get tested !!! i'm not spilling 12 hours to get nothing in return.

Again, similar to last week, I arrived late due to public transportation; some bus driver dropped me off at the wrong place. As I couldn't really see where I was and where I had to go I asked some guy who also got of the bus if he could gimme directions to this particular street. He told me I was way off course. Next he asked me what I was doing here and I simply told him that I wanted to get my coke tested (he was between 25-30 years old, non Caucasian male and there didn't seem anything wrong with him so why not ;))  ::) He couldn't really explain which route I had to take, but he was friendly enough to get his cell and look for it on his navigation system app. I only had like 10 minutes left to get there and I would never make it by foot. By chance his car was parked nearby and he immediately gave me a ride to my actual destination (which really wasn't close). GOOD PEOPLE DO EXIST !  8) !!!! I expressed eternal gratitude to this very kind man. I wanted to give him some money but only had a 200 note on me and was in a hurry so couldn't really give em that :p

btw when I told him about that I was getting my coke tested, he asked me whether I was a Jehovah witness ??? lol: didn't really understand why he asked me this (I look very regular :D ) anyone sees a connection between jehovas withnesses and drugs ? :D

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: onionologist on May 16, 2013, 08:41 pm
@Suidone- Glad your getting back on track bro...i was honestly worried but I didn't want to intervene as that's your choice bro. There is compassion in this thread, and great words of wisdom from experiences. I didn't consume nearly what you have and I felt the need for a break. I maybe consumed 2 grams over 3 weeks, or so. No night-long binges, and nothing more than say 20mg per toot. You're on the right track brotha! Get well, and then have fun! There's great harmony when all is aligned. :) Best of luck bro!

@Murderface- Well...what do you really say about or two mr. face? hehe Your a cool character, and I'm glad we have had many convo's! I hope your near-death experience will prove to be positive and beneficial to your life from here on out. You always have a good story or advice bro! I look forward to many convo's to come!

@Studio54- Whassup whassup!? Thanks for all your advice on the PM side bro! Much appreciated. You, as with Murder, always have some good things to say and contribute to this thread. I am grateful to have you homies available to spew my typing to!

@Jnemonic- There's a handful of peeps who make this thread happen, and your on that list buddy. We haven't had any private chats but I always look forward to your comments and input in the threads! Thanks for keepin it real bro, and thanks for all your contributions! I too reside in the states, so I feel ya when coming on here and wondering/thinking where the others are in their parts of the planet.

@OzY- Yo yo...you know where I stand with you brotha man! Always a well written response with thought and consideration coming from you. We have a good set of heads here, and I really enjoy bringing discussion to the table for you all to analyze and give feedback/contributions to!

Didn't seen anything recent from MB, hope all's well for you bro!

As I told a few of you, I am taking a break from my fine white friend for a few days or longer. It felt needed, and I have developed an extreme paranoia of the face-dying levamisole.. Very...disturbing shit. Indeed. I now base everything off this...if it had 20% leva in it...that's 200mg per gram that is that nasty shit. Granted this isn't the best, most positive, or most accurate approach, but it's how I see things now..

I'll see what you folks have to say about that. I am not too concerned, I am just taking a break...but I am still here and enjoying my other substances!

Holla! Peace and Respect to you all!

-onion-

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 18, 2013, 04:44 pm
Still haven't taken a break yet, but I'll have a clean break from tomorrow off for at least a full week ! HAHA, sound familiar :p  but i'm serious now !
btw: dunno if u follow pineapples thread about the coke test results and read about Bungee54 results announced yesterday  :o (by me and Pineapple)


Now I'm a really skeptical person and I'm always suspicious of reviews on SR and those in the cocaine thread. I practically never trust what people say, unless they are really highly respected, and even then I have problems trusting their statements unless maybe supported by numerous other respected members. The regulars keeping this thread alive though and chit chatting bout all other shit, I do have more faith in. So GO GO MB coke talk show.

Now about those results from Bungee54s cocaine; his cocaine was tested by agreement by Pineapple and by me (anonymous).
So his " Peruvian ... cocaine " tested at 87 % purity, which is the highest quality seen by me since i've been reading this forum and I didn't really believed that this was possible in retail. There were other + 80 % results some while back, but those were tested by agreement so that's something I'd never trust :D

And okay, there was always the possibility that Pineapple was affiliated or funded by some vendor to post fake results etc.. But I couldn't really find any indications for this to be true. But now I had the product tested myself and Pineapple had same results, which are both unbelievably high. I've also been talking with Pineapple cuz he wanted to make sure that I didn't cheat myself with the results I posted and I'm pretty convinced now that he's a stand up guy.

In this case I dropped it off at the lab, so when I would get the results, i'd be 100 % sure of what I actually bought (coke/cuts/etc.). When I actually heard them I was kinda confused/shocked as I would never had expected this. It was really hard to believe; in particular because we've been getting some real shitty results lately and after a while you kinda lose hope.
All I can say now is try Bungee54s coke. It's expensive indeed, but if he doesn't start cutting his product it's really worth it; I'd recommend to order just one gram and then you can tell for yourself. If you buy larger amounts than you will be really saving lots of money actually. I kinda hate that I now sound like I'm getting paid or working for Bungee54 himself, cus when I read people saying what I just said, I'd be very suspicious haha :D

You guys are probably starting to get an idea what kind of person I am, and cus I blow a lot through my nose I really want quality and his bulk prices are very reasonable for this quality. That's all why I'm doing this for !

If u didn't read the test result thread, i tell u guys in here; The cocaine Bungee has is a new batch since couple of weeks, so I was one of the first buyers of this new batch. As a result, there's always the possibility that he first sends his uncut product and afterwards starts cutting when results come back. I'm certainly not accusing Bungee54 that such practices will happen, but u never know. Therefore I will have his coke tested again by various SR accounts AND concurrently larger orders in order to make sure that he also doesn't start cutting the product when people buy 5/10/20/... grams.

Finally :D as I'm kinda of a blabbermouth there is a possibility that he knows who had his product tested, so he could keep sending his uncut product to whoever I am. Therefore future test results will be ordered by 1) other SR accounts 2) larger quantities and 3) but also different addresses in various EU countries.

I think this is the best way to ensure we really get what we should get and that's motherfucking HQ cocaine :D

And although I'm totally anonymous here and nothing can happen to me (except neg. rep :D), I am NOT badmouthing or accusing Bungee54 of future scamming or cutting his product now the results came in. All I want to is have a steady HQ cocaine supplier. So I apologize if U feel offended by all measures I am taking and announcing on here to prevent me (and others :p) to get scammed or get lower quality.

Since some might perceive what I'm saying as quite negative (except for the results), I'd like to stress the following (in quotes as can't seem to get something in bold)

Quote
I only had positive experiences with this vendor and I'm extremely thankful that he provides such a cocaine; so right now all I can do is recommend him and say he is a top vendor, with probably the best cocaine

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: ozymandias2013 on May 19, 2013, 05:32 am
Suidone - I wish the U.S. had testing centers so I could go on mad adventures like yours, running around taking trains to get coke tested! That is so awesome! Can you keep us updated on Bungee's product? I don't know if I'll ever think of ordering outside North America... but...

@onion - Thanks for the shout-out homie! I imagine you're doing your bongers and coronas? :( I wish I still smoked. I guess I may just pop a lil cheeba chew in a bit :)

To all - Finally! I'm posting on Late Night while doing some lines! The night is quiet; I'm a grad student and all my friends are holed up writing final papers. I am too... but with a little extracurricular activity on the side :)

Had a question for you all--just got some blow that actually burns a little going up. What does this mean? I haven't had any in a week so it's not my nose. I've done all the other basic tests and the gear passes the tests well. Can some of you more experienced vets share your thoughts? Other than the initial quick burn, the product seems........ fucking great. I'm breaking my rule of not posting while high just because I think that's the whole point of this thread right :) And I'm in no way trying to write any kind of review of product. Holla back at me!

~ozy

PS - Last question: What do you all think of EZ-tests and all those other tests out there? Does one just buy them online? Is it worth it? Or should we just use our noses to tell us what we like and don't like?

In other news...got another little treat from bcpltd today. Decent batch. Seems a whole bunch of cola vendors are going on vacay. Nod, bcpltd (soon), and MarloStanfield. I find it...somewhat weird that the day that the highest price H and cola vendor goes into stealth (Nod), DragonCove comes back (also really pricy H and cola). Who knows how the vendors work things out in their little roundtable.

It's nice to see a whole crop of new C vendors emerging though... priceisright, Jean Ralphio, and CannaConnection (murda and I will be getting samples from Canna). Also PureOrganx... and then some dude who took a product photo with a fucking Mario action figure. \(o_O)/ Kind of awesome, haha.

Good to see some better price points, too. Just for shits and giggles I ordered a .50g from Jean Ralphio. Gonna get some from priceisright too just to see. Lastly, waiting on some gear from Marlo... decent price... $140 for 1.7g.

Happy days ahead! Hope you are all well in mind, body, and soul. Sounds fucking cheesy but I mean it.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on May 23, 2013, 04:37 pm
*Reaches shore, kneels down and kisses ground*

"I made it, on solid ground again and ready to start running. Where is this place I've become stranded on?" I have come upon the dream, the holy moley. The snow capped mountains are made of cocaine, the hanging coconuts are full of liquor and sweet dreams. The weeds are weed and the sandy beach is molly beneath your feet. I feel that I may have gone to heaven but I know that is untrue, for I am still alive and breathing and no, I am not dreaming.

I landed lost and unsure, nervous of demons and those who lurk in the dark, but I've found light and am shining the bright white into cracks and crevices showing those who follow or who care to look that we are safe here. We have found our own heaven our own nirvana. We are living Buddha that need not search for enlightenment for it is right here, and we control it how we want.

For we are on SR and SR is our place of peace. We are anonymous but strong and courageous when we work together to help others in their search for peace. You are not alone, you are one of us. So take off your inhibitions and shed your fears. Welcome to your oasis, you may now relax.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on May 23, 2013, 09:43 pm
Quote from: Marlon Brando on May 23, 2013, 04:37 pm
*Reaches shore, kneels down and kisses ground*

"I made it, on solid ground again and ready to start running. Where is this place I've become stranded on?" I have come upon the dream, the holy moley. The snow capped mountains are made of cocaine, the hanging coconuts are full of liquor and sweet dreams. The weeds are weed and the sandy beach is molly beneath your feet. I feel that I may have gone to heaven but I know that is untrue, for I am still alive and breathing and no, I am not dreaming.

I landed lost and unsure, nervous of demons and those who lurk in the dark, but I've found light and am shining the bright white into cracks and crevices showing those who follow or who care to look that we are safe here. We have found our own heaven our own nirvana. We are living Buddha that need not search for enlightenment for it is right here, and we control it how we want.

For we are on SR and SR is our place of peace. We are anonymous but strong and courageous when we work together to help others in their search for peace. You are not alone, you are one of us. So take off your inhibitions and shed your fears. Welcome to your oasis, you may now relax.


Good to see you back Marlon....this beach sounds amazing. 8)

Surrounded by cola capped mountains and sassy sand is my idea of an oasis.  ;D
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on May 24, 2013, 12:52 am

*Reaches shore, kneels down and kisses ground*

The snow capped mountains are made of cocaine, the hanging coconuts are full of liquor and sweet dreams. The weeds are weed and the sandy beach is molly beneath your feet. Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 24, 2013, 12:35 pm
I'm officially OFF for at least a week or maybe two. Yesterday I had some blow from bungee54 (which was tested at 87 %) and except for 100mg to get tested again, I put it all up my nose and NOTHING, NADA.
So, it really would be a waste to try and get high while I definitely can't. Also went to visit my psychiatrist today and I asked him some stuff about what was going on but clearly did not have expertise in this field.
I told him that in the beginning it's prolly the bupropion that was blocking my high and he said that's impossible, however some user experiences online and including myself contradicted otherwise. When you consult ' drug interaction posts' on some drug forum it does say that bupropion shouldn't infere; so okay still got faith in the man (I've always thought him really intelligent compared to my previous psychiatrist). Continuing our conversation, I told him it was like SSRI's and XTC; that they don't go together either and that you won't experience any real high. AGAIN he says that's not true;; WTFFF, everyone knows this and I tried to roll on an SSRI like 10 times and never got any high. I thought he would be the man to answer my questions why I can't get high anymore.

But what's going on now, that i don't get high anymore at all, doesn't have anything to do with the wellbutrin as that was a month ago. I think I just fucked up my brains even more. Anyone any suggestions what to do ? (I know stay off coke)( but some other suggestions, prolly something that restores dopamine .... )

cuz i can still roll on XTC now, so it's gotta be dopamine or something else, not serotonin right ?

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: lady meth on May 24, 2013, 11:29 pm
ive been doing the meth  thing, but its not what  i really want, i really want to smoke coke, so when i re up, im gonna go for de cola. im gonna cook it myself, and i cant wait!!!! but ill be up all the time hopin to talk to you guys, the meth thread  seems difficult to break into, , anyway , i enjoyed  reading both threads, and im hopin theres lots of folks who are up all nite all the time like me, looking for someone to talk to.  the nights get so long when im here smokin my pipe and  scrollin thru the internet.   maybe someone else out there is doin the same. im jammin some music, but not to loud, so i can hear :D, and when i come off this im gonna settle down with some of elvis's dmt, damn good shit, cuz that eases me out of the blues. ive been smokin on my 200 mgs for a minute, and ive still got half of it left. perfect comedown.  its all good!
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: goochihuh on May 24, 2013, 11:51 pm
Quote from: Suidone on May 24, 2013, 12:35 pm
I'm officially OFF for at least a week or maybe two. Yesterday I had some blow from bungee54 (which was tested at 87 %) and except for 100mg to get tested again, I put it all up my nose and NOTHING, NADA.
So, it really would be a waste to try and get high while I definitely can't. Also went to visit my psychiatrist today and I asked him some stuff about what was going on but clearly did not have expertise in this field.
I told him that in the beginning it's prolly the bupropion that was blocking my high and he said that's impossible, however some user experiences online and including myself contradicted otherwise. When you consult ' drug interaction posts' on some drug forum it does say that bupropion shouldn't infere; so okay still got faith in the man (I've always thought him really intelligent compared to my previous psychiatrist). Continuing our conversation, I told him it was like SSRI's and XTC; that they don't go together either and that you won't experience any real high. AGAIN he says that's not true;; WTFFF, everyone knows this and I tried to roll on an SSRI like 10 times and never got any high. I thought he would be the man to answer my questions why I can't get high anymore.

But what's going on now, that i don't get high anymore at all, doesn't have anything to do with the wellbutrin as that was a month ago. I think I just fucked up my brains even more. Anyone any suggestions what to do ? (I know stay off coke)( but some other suggestions, prolly something that restores dopamine .... )

cuz i can still roll on XTC now, so it's gotta be dopamine or something else, not serotonin right ?

That is crazy man. Not getting high is insane. Now I would not tell my doctors anything anymore about any recreational drug. Do not trust them , they judge like crazy and will feed you garbage as you said "THEY HAVE NO EXPERIENCE". I take Cabergoline low dose to keep prolactin levels down and it is also a dopamine agonist but i take low enough doses to not really interfere with dopamine so meth still works and so does yayo IF the quality is good.

My recomendation is IF you want to get high off yayo again I would not take any anti depressant or mind altering supplement , after ceasing use try some yayo 7 days after. OR the yayo could be completely garbage or your tolerance is so high you need gram lines to get you going.

What is more enjoyable , doing yayo or being on a anti depressant to function? You must make the decision. Also doing yayo and Welbutrin would raise your risk of seizures significantly. This could be a blessing in disguise to stop you from using yayo or if you want to keep using considering dropping the anti d as stated. Asking doctors will not get you anywhere.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on May 24, 2013, 11:55 pm
Quote from: Suidone on May 24, 2013, 12:35 pm
I'm officially OFF for at least a week or maybe two. Yesterday I had some blow from bungee54 (which was tested at 87 %) and except for 100mg to get tested again, I put it all up my nose and NOTHING, NADA.
So, it really would be a waste to try and get high while I definitely can't. Also went to visit my psychiatrist today and I asked him some stuff about what was going on but clearly did not have expertise in this field.
I told him that in the beginning it's prolly the bupropion that was blocking my high and he said that's impossible, however some user experiences online and including myself contradicted otherwise. When you consult ' drug interaction posts' on some drug forum it does say that bupropion shouldn't infere; so okay still got faith in the man (I've always thought him really intelligent compared to my previous psychiatrist). Continuing our conversation, I told him it was like SSRI's and XTC; that they don't go together either and that you won't experience any real high. AGAIN he says that's not true;; WTFFF, everyone knows this and I tried to roll on an SSRI like 10 times and never got any high. I thought he would be the man to answer my questions why I can't get high anymore.

But what's going on now, that i don't get high anymore at all, doesn't have anything to do with the wellbutrin as that was a month ago. I think I just fucked up my brains even more. Anyone any suggestions what to do ? (I know stay off coke)( but some other suggestions, prolly something that restores dopamine .... )

cuz i can still roll on XTC now, so it's gotta be dopamine or something else, not serotonin right ?

I can't really answer your question with knowledge to do with your circumstance and what you take outside of illegal drugs but as hard as it is to do, maybe you gotta try going dry for at least a month or more and then try it again and if you are still in the same boat after that then at least you've ruled out the over using scenario and it has to be something else in relation to your medication.

Different drug but a friend of mine was over doing it with Ecstasy and I kept telling him to cut down or it would be ruined for him in the long run. He kept at it and eventually started getting headaches for days after rolling so he finally gave them a break for a while and when he got back to it he still got the headaches so had to give up for longer again and when he tried them after a long break, he seemed to get "the magic" back without the headaches.

I'm sure someone will have a better plan idea than mine which is the obvious response but worth a try and I hope you'd be able to do it! All the best!!!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 26, 2013, 10:54 pm
Quote
That is crazy man. Not getting high is insane. Now I would not tell my doctors anything anymore about any recreational drug. Do not trust them , they judge like crazy and will feed you garbage as you said "THEY HAVE NO EXPERIENCE". I take Cabergoline low dose to keep prolactin levels down and it is also a dopamine agonist but i take low enough doses to not really interfere with dopamine so meth still works and so does yayo IF the quality is good.

My recomendation is IF you want to get high off yayo again I would not take any anti depressant or mind altering supplement , after ceasing use try some yayo 7 days after. OR the yayo could be completely garbage or your tolerance is so high you need gram lines to get you going.

What is more enjoyable , doing yayo or being on a anti depressant to function? You must make the decision. Also doing yayo and Welbutrin would raise your risk of seizures significantly. This could be a blessing in disguise to stop you from using yayo or if you want to keep using considering dropping the anti d as stated. Asking doctors will not get you anywhere.

I'm completely off any other medication except for methylphenidate which I have been on for years, but didn't even use that last couple of weeks.
I'm already off anti psychotics for more than 6 months and off the wellbutrin (antidepressant) for a month and a half. I'm trying to find a doctor/specialist who really knows stuff bout this, but not successful so far.

I just got out of my depression, so the wellbutrin wasn't necessary anymore. It's my first stable/normal period in like 3 years. We finally found my base line, when I'm not depressed nor manic. It's good to feel normal again, although (hypo)manic is also lots of fun :p

Now they tried to put me on lamictal to prevent any further depression and it shouldn't interfere with my highs it said, but already did some research and most likely it will kill my o so loved cocaine high.

The yayo isn't garbage btw, cuz i brought it to the test lab and it one returned as 87 % and the other as 89 % (max. = 89 % ) so this is stuff most people never really touch and prolly double the quality I was buying of the streets.

Quote
I can't really answer your question with knowledge to do with your circumstance and what you take outside of illegal drugs but as hard as it is to do, maybe you gotta try going dry for at least a month or more and then try it again and if you are still in the same boat after that then at least you've ruled out the over using scenario and it has to be something else in relation to your medication.

Different drug but a friend of mine was over doing it with Ecstasy and I kept telling him to cut down or it would be ruined for him in the long run. He kept at it and eventually started getting headaches for days after rolling so he finally gave them a break for a while and when he got back to it he still got the headaches so had to give up for longer again and when he tried them after a long break, he seemed to get "the magic" back without the headaches.

I'm sure someone will have a better plan idea than mine which is the obvious response but worth a try and I hope you'd be able to do it! All the best!!!


As mentioned above, i'm on no other medication so can't see anything there. I'm going to stay off for at least another whole week and maybe a little longer; then i'll just try and see what it gives. Hopefully I'm restored else  me = sad and i'll have to hop on the opiate boat :D and do some Xtc more;

btw I had the same thing with XTC couple of years ago. Always bought in bulk for my own use, but couldn't keep my hands off. Some serious shit happened one night after binging for quite some time. But with XTC you know that you'll run out of serotonin after maybe day 2 or 3; i just tried to get the magic back. Unfortunately I can't disclose what actually happened but it's really one of the craziest events in my life and one hell of a story lol. Maybe more important is that it was that event that caused me to quit on all drugs, alcohol and even cigarettes. I fell off the boat again just recently but doesn't really matter.

I guess lots of people have experienced crazy shit though cuz that what happens when u use drugs :D Still when taking into account all the people I know, I've prolly crossed the line too many times and much too far when it comes to drugs; which isn't really something to be proud of actually.

Quote
It sounds like you have severely depleted all your neurotransmitters .... but there is a way to fix this  .. using amino acids and other supplements

m m  m motek

yeah, I really think that must be it; i'll read your book these days ! thanks for the link.

Since friday I started to eat frequently and healthy again so that's a good start for sure. I'm always hungry and often wake up with chocolate cookies in my mouth and all over my sheets  ;D

Did some powertraining for the first time in months. Damn I lost almost all my strength; which isn't that surprising I suppose


Anyways, thanks again for the support and the advice guys.

I'm working on something that'll be released for a certain audience within the first weeks of july, so if I'm still have access to the forums and aren't stuck in the loony bin again or something like that, maybe i post parts of it here too. still haven't figured it all out yet but it'll give you a glimpse of the life of a bipolar young adult :D

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: goochihuh on May 27, 2013, 02:49 pm
Suidone , I have seen so many doctors , phsychatrists , physchologists , mental health doctors in hospitals for assistance regarding depression. Only thing that helped was Prozac then it pooped. Now I use recreational drugs they help and when I am not on them thinking about using them gets me excited and motivated.

Ok apply cream to your eyes so you don't get bags under your eyes from continued use. Buy fish oil , Multi vitamin and coq10 which are all good supplements and will improve your physical and mental health and your appearance. Now the nose bleeding (I think I read that) is a real concern considering you state you are using good quality gear. You may just need a break man.

I don't know , get some good quality sleep , good supplements even a calcium and vitamin D supp if you lack sun exposure. If meth heads can get high and stay up for 7 days , sleep for 3 then repeat with rubbish nutrition and horrible self care procedures but still get high (they just have to up there dose in relation to tolerance which is normal) then something is wrong man.

Doctors in my experience judge you , they think you will be violent , they are cautious writing out scripts and will always be suss about you. Heres hoping to show significant improvement soon.

PM me if you need help regarding depression , been suffering since I was 17. Know a lot about pharmaecueticals and what they do as well. By looking healthier on the outside means the inside is better and the high should be better.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 27, 2013, 06:54 pm
Quote from: goochihuh on May 27, 2013, 02:49 pm
Suidone , I have seen so many doctors , phsychatrists , physchologists , mental health doctors in hospitals for assistance regarding depression. Only thing that helped was Prozac then it pooped. Now I use recreational drugs they help and when I am not on them thinking about using them gets me excited and motivated.

Ok apply cream to your eyes so you don't get bags under your eyes from continued use. Buy fish oil , Multi vitamin and coq10 which are all good supplements and will improve your physical and mental health and your appearance. Now the nose bleeding (I think I read that) is a real concern considering you state you are using good quality gear. You may just need a break man.

I don't know , get some good quality sleep , good supplements even a calcium and vitamin D supp if you lack sun exposure. If meth heads can get high and stay up for 7 days , sleep for 3 then repeat with rubbish nutrition and horrible self care procedures but still get high (they just have to up there dose in relation to tolerance which is normal) then something is wrong man.

Doctors in my experience judge you , they think you will be violent , they are cautious writing out scripts and will always be suss about you. Heres hoping to show significant improvement soon.

PM me if you need help regarding depression , been suffering since I was 17. Know a lot about pharmaecueticals and what they do as well. By looking healthier on the outside means the inside is better and the high should be better.

Just bought a good multivitamin, omega 3-6 caps and some high dose vit. C. Also got me a lot of salmon and am using my diet again from when I was a powerlifter, only added more fruit now. The nosebleeds are insignificant cuz they were from using local cocaine. Bungee54s and IBMs cocaine are really a treat for the nose. Goes really smooth up the nose, no clogging of any kind etc..

Unfortunately I don't think there's much to be done bout my depression. Although I'm out of it now, it will return without a doubt. My wellbutrin did the job quite good, cuz I didn't really felt depressed but I wasn't functioning as good as when not depressed(concentration, motivation to sport...). SSRI's are in general out of the question cuz i've got to much adverse effects from them. Bupropion is a stimulant, while SSRIs or SNRIs in general keep me in bed all day. I've also been on lithium, but wasn't fit either; Abilify (Aripiprazol = atypical antipsychotic) helped with the hypomania, but that's the fun part of the disorder so being bipolar kinda sicks. So soon I'll try the lamictal which should prevent future depressions. Some people respond great and can almost function completely normal, others are in the middle and others are just fucked for life. still bipolar sucks in any case unless you're the type that has more and longer (hypo)manic episodes than depressions.

I'm almost 3 days off but still have trouble getting to sleep before 2 A.M even when taking xanax or clonazepam; but i'm gonna try to quit those too while i'm off cocaine. We'll see how it works out.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jda6130 on May 27, 2013, 09:00 pm
Quote from: HitTheRoad on April 25, 2013, 11:40 pm
Just doing a bit of coke with friends tonight and one of them used a method to crush the little rocks that I hadn't seen in years.

He stretched a currency note over the little pile and rubbed a credit card end over the note backwards and forwards a few times hard enough to break the rocks and then chopped it up with a blade.

Any of you ever use this little method?


I tried this method for the past couple days and it works remarkably well. I had mixed feelings about trying it thinking coke would stick to the bill or fly out and onto the floor, but it worked extremely well. I slightly altered the method where I used a large snuffer to rub across the bill and flatten the rocks as opposed to a credit card. Thanks for the tip!

yea.. ummm   :-\

it was nothing..
my name, soc sec #, credit card #'s (all in collections haha), and old addy were found written down at some pad they raided.. she just wanted to know if my bank account was right and my credit was the same.. i fucking laughed!! did they take the whole $10!! lol
she's emailing me a statement to fill out..
fuckers!! getting me stressed for nothing!!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: goochihuh on May 31, 2013, 02:58 am
"Symbious" UK vendor has good charlie. Took some today (fri morn) now had to take some mephedrone orally so I can at least be productive for the rest of the day to override the comedown. Coke really isn't getting old. Inconsistant product , expensive and totally non functional. How do people use this when they go out? Run away every 45 mins to top up with a line? How counter productive. At least low dose amphet you can get things done. I don't mind the depression with coke comedown it is the CNS fatigue that follows which makes me completely useless , I lay there tired , depressed and unable to do anything :(

Just took some mephedrone orally , at least it will get me through the day , first experience with it.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on May 31, 2013, 05:56 am
Just do coke in a social setting at someones house while bumping lines and chatting/sipping drinks. At the end of the night when you know you might crash and burn, pop some xanax and get zonked out, you completely miss the whole come down thing of it.

Some may say mixing them all together is dangerous and not for everyone, but I find for me, It's best If I don't have anything else to indulge in, that I like to fall asleep quickly after my last rail, that way I wake up feeling like a new man and without the hassle of the depressing crash.

Also try to take smaller lines or just go with "bumps" throughout the night, that way you don't coke-overide the system and your body is just pleasantly high instead of fiending for line after line. It's a more enjoyable high if you start off right and don't completely waste it by trying to chase some mythical feeling of euphoria.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on May 31, 2013, 11:57 am
Get them tested at a test center, but I guess that's not possible in ur case; what a luxury  8)

I just did some coke again after a week being clean and apparently are my neurotransmitters/dopamine shitty brain still fried. It has improved, but not much. As a result I'm forced to stay clean for a longer period of time :(

I also got an answer from an expert doctor to the question why I wasn't getting the usual high the first couple of weeks I started using again and he actually reiteritated what someone else commented in this topic. The bupropion has affected my dopamine system and it can take a while before it returns to its natural state. Dunno who it was, but someone inhere also used bupropion and said that it could take up to 2 or 3 months

ARGHHH  >:(
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: ozymandias2013 on May 31, 2013, 05:42 pm
Quote from: Suidone on May 31, 2013, 11:57 am
Get them tested at a test center, but I guess that's not possible in ur case; what a luxury  8)

I just did some coke again after a week being clean and apparently are my neurotransmitters/dopamine shitty brain still fried. It has improved, but not much. As a result I'm forced to stay clean for a longer period of time :(

I also got an answer from an expert doctor to the question why I wasn't getting the usual high the first couple of weeks I started using again and he actually reiteritated what someone else commented in this topic. The bupropion has affected my dopamine system and it can take a while before it returns to its natural state. Dunno who it was, but someone inhere also used bupropion and said that it could take up to 2 or 3 months

ARGHHH  >:(

Whatever underlying issues you face physically and neurochemically may find some benefit in exercise, which is proven to encourage neuronal healing, increase neuroplasticity, and promotes the creation of new neurons in a way that cannot be duplicated otherwise. Furthermore, the stress from rigorous exercise forces the various bodily systems to work and communicate together (renal, hepatic, etc. etc.) in a way that is almost a "rehearsal" for dealing with stress when you're *not* exercising. I speak from my own experience, as I also suffer from depression, and regular exercise is one of the cornerstones of keeping myself healthy.

Like I've said earlier in this thread--I always find that working out rigorously promotes and potentiates my being able to get high as fuck off drugs in general, be it cannabis, cocaine, heroin, etc.

And, at the end of the day... evolutionarily speaking--we were born to move, baby :)

Good luck, Suidone!

And best wishes to all of you on this thread... hope you all have a great weekend. It's fucking going to be 105 degrees in my neck of the woods this weekend. Time for morning runs, afternoon poolside margaritas, and nighttime RAILS :)

Good luck Suidone.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: motek on June 01, 2013, 04:50 am
Buprion is very very similar to ampphetamine in it's structure ...  and molecules like these can be/are manipulated bt the body in a variety of ways, adding atoms and chopping others off!  Taking any drug of this type for any extended period is gonna fuck up how other 'similar' drugs feel!  I was taking tramal for ages and I could hardly feel mdma unless it was very good in a high dose i.e. 200mgs+!

check it out ..... https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bupropion

                         https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amphetamine

@murderface he he bro the ole 'cocaine new identity' problem (basically, coz the coke always runs out!)  you know  "the first snort/shot of coke makes you feel like a 'new man' and the first thing the 'new man' wants .... is another one!"


m m m motek ;)

Post by: lady meth on June 01, 2013, 04:29 pm

last time, and i question this, but i think so, was 10 or 12 days between power naps, cuz i scored on the 3rd, and the next time i said what day is it, we're halfway thru the shit, it was may 16...lulz.....i fucked around and scored some coke from round town last nite,,, my head is aching to prove it,    nasty ass shit i didnt get from the road

10-12 days? damn... my last time with meth i was up for almost 2 days.. im like, fuck, i just want to come down already.. sorry charlie, the ride will end when it ends....





dude, i try to get enough to last all month, but run out at three weeks regularly!...lol...and im givin niggas shit over here over there, steady hittin pipes, and runnin all night for weeks.  i go hang in another state for a week, come back home,   hang for a week, leave for a week, then i fall down, til payday. plus i have several other addictions im babyin along all month as well....lol.   but i dont let that come down get anywhere near me til im to fukn exhausted to fight on anymore.   then i find some other chemical to avoid that bullshit, and ease on down.  i keep a supply of psychedelics for coming off the pipe with, cause i just dig that. everybody collapses, and i get one more night trippin balls, blastin music, online!  im in no shape for facing anyone, but i can find lots o fun surfin if im by myself,..... if im with someone, the internets out.  ;)

dude, i dont be droppin no acid, that wouldnt ease me down...lol.., but tyler durden has a cornucopia of different trips that are easy breezy, no mind fuck, good-ass visuals and some nice erotic vibes too.  lately i been comin off the pipe with elvis and his very fine dmt. i been smokin on that 200 mgs for a minute;    i forget all about the sour comedown, because, everything is beeayoutiful and i blast my sounds and chill.  ...i like lookin up all the different trips available and trying this and that.  its just a thang i do cuz nobodys gonna be around probly, and i cant be facing the comedown alone without bending my mind. im not into benzos, i dont want to add to any depression that tries to hit me, and, im no drinker.  so i gotta have a lil sumpthin sumpthin to comfort me.   im movin on tho. ...lol...this time, imma smoke a quarter oz o shards until they is gone, but , this time, t h i s  t y m e, imma sprinkle some sweet sweet , just a dusting, of deezletime's sweet come down powder in my last bowl, then imma see what the fuk is up wit that shit! maaaaaaaan, im coppin a nod just thinkin bout it.....awwwww yeah!
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: tango on June 02, 2013, 10:33 am
Quote from: Marlon Brando on May 31, 2013, 05:56 am
Just do coke in a social setting at someones house while bumping lines and chatting/sipping drinks. At the end of the night when you know you might crash and burn, pop some xanax and get zonked out, you completely miss the whole come down thing of it.

Some may say mixing them all together is dangerous and not for everyone, but I find for me, It's best If I don't have anything else to indulge in, that I like to fall asleep quickly after my last rail, that way I wake up feeling like a new man and without the hassle of the depressing crash.

Also try to take smaller lines or just go with "bumps" throughout the night, that way you don't coke-overide the system and your body is just pleasantly high instead of fiending for line after line. It's a more enjoyable high if you start off right and don't completely waste it by trying to chase some mythical feeling of euphoria.

Good advice!
+1

I also have a 50g bag of ghb I probably will never touch...I think i've heard you rattling on about it Mr. Studio....maybe you can help me consume safely. It's the whole...3 hour's of possible sleeping death that scares me! haha! I don't like potential dying with use of substances....even if it can be avoided...the potential is still there! AHHHHHHHH  :P It's blue giraffes goodies too, so Should be legit shit! I just...am afraid of it!

Anywho...how's that for a crazy rant of miscellaneous topics!

@Studio- Holla at me!
@Murda- Whassssusuuuuuppp you crazy cracka!
@Lady Meth- You cray!
@Motek- Whassup m m m MO tek! :)

Peace all!

Crazy onionologist!!!!!   8) ::) :P

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on June 03, 2013, 04:15 am
Quote from: lady meth on June 01, 2013, 04:29 pm
Quote from: Studio54 on May 28, 2013, 09:22 pm
Quote from: lady meth on May 28, 2013, 04:17 pm
last time, and i question this, but i think so, was 10 or 12 days between power naps, cuz i scored on the 3rd, and the next time i said what day is it, we're halfway thru the shit, it was may 16...lulz.....i fucked around and scored some coke from round town last nite,,, my head is aching to prove it,    nasty ass shit i didnt get from the road

10-12 days? damn... my last time with meth i was up for almost 2 days.. im like, fuck, i just want to come down already.. sorry charlie, the ride will end when it ends....

dude, i try to get enough to last all month, but run out at three weeks regularly!...lol...and im givin niggas shit over here over there, steady hittin pipes, and runnin all night for weeks.  i go hang in another state for a week, come back home,   hang for a week, leave for a week, then i fall down, til payday. plus i have several other addictions im babyin along all month as well....lol.   but i dont let that come down get anywhere near me til im to fukn exhausted to fight on anymore.   then i find some other chemical to avoid that bullshit, and ease on down.  i keep a supply of psychedelics for coming off the pipe with, cause i just dig that. everybody collapses, and i get one more night trippin balls, blastin music, online!  im in no shape for facing anyone, but i can find lots o fun surfin if im by myself,..... if im with someone, the internets out.  ;)


damn girl you would be very difficult to keep up with
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: goochihuh on June 03, 2013, 06:17 am
Quote from: Studio54 on June 01, 2013, 08:13 pm
Quote from: goochihuh on June 01, 2013, 09:34 am
Pretty much over coke due to the inconsistancy. Who else confesses they get more of a dopamine hit setting up the yayo then actually the drug itself? Price doesn't justify it's regular use.

goochihuh---im sorry to hear that you are disappointed with the inconsistency, have you been buying from SR cocaine vendors?
what is it you are missing in the drug that you are not finding?

sorry for the questions, but just had to ask amigo..

Yeah always SR vendors , can not get locally here , only can get meth locally which is very cheap and no comedown as I eat right and do the right things only get tired next day due to no sleep as do not have sleep aids at the moment.

I used to get off tetravort (SR LEGEND) that yay was the best experience known the mankind. Also a few local vendors here on SR sold decent yay but price is crazy so I ventured OS more recently and got off a well known US vendor and a UK vendor. 2G's of US yay and 1g of UK yay which should have lasted me ages if it is good. I mean 1g of tetravorts lasted me 2 weeks.....1 line would keep you buzzing for a good hour with NO comedown I mean you just float back to baseline and continue life even the fatigue due to CNS being so stimulated was so minute.

Got through the 2g's of the US stuff in 1 night , smelt great but that is about it. I ended up doing monster lines and even smoked some off alfoil to get where I wanted all i got was a fuckd up nose and hard time to sleep but it was pretty cheap considering AUS prices so I wasn't that angry and the vendor is a gentleman I just put it down to inconsistancy of yay and perhaps I expect to much when some of us have had the luxury to experience some life altering mind blowing cocaine?

1g of UK stuff was ok but I won't be in a rush to purchase again. Just underwhelmed by it all the best thing about coke should be such the short duration. Start taking about 6pm for 3-4 hours then pop a benzo or oxy if you are lucky then go off to sleep and I never have a hangover or depression from coke unlike other stuff just a bit of a stuffy nose and dark eyes.

So yeah...that is my experience but you know what...I will prob again purchase in due course just because there is that slight chance I may get that experience I have felt with tetravorts and a few others which is the most pleasurable feeling as a human being you can have.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on June 03, 2013, 07:40 am
When I first discoverd SR, it I thought of it as a magical place. Since I was primarly searching for coke, it didn't take too long before I got disappointed. Prices were way to high for the quality of the product; We did stumble upon a couple of exceptional high quality, uncut cocaine. Now that kinda sucked, cus it'd never pay over 100 euro/ gram (130 $).

However when you order a somewhat larger quantity (+20 gram) you actually
Quote
save
money compared to when you buy your cocaine on the streets (this depends of course what the average quality and price is in your region. Belgiums cocaine price is always 50 euro; average quality is between 40-60 % ( so lets say 50 % )

Bungee54 or IMB sell 1 oz for about 75 euro/gram (100 dollar); now I noticed last couple of times I bought from the street that most dealers only give between 0.65-0.75gr.  So 30 gram bought via SR is actually 40 gram on the street (30/0,75); if you make the math, you only pay 250 euro extra when buying via SR.

Furthermore , the quality is almost or maybe double than the street cocaine ( if the respective SR vendors keep providing +80(resp. 87/89) % cocaine )

So by buying bulk from the good vendors:
1. You're acually cheaper off
2. the cocaine is uncut, which is SOOOOOOOOOO much better for the nose; The difference is really insane (at least in my case); Note however that Bungee54s and IMBs cocaine al already very fine powder so you don't really have to chop it anymore, so maybe this also helps in keeping the nose " healthy"

This is actually freaking great, but on two conditions I guess.
1. you're EU/UK customer; US et. al. prolly wouldn't be a problem either but there seems to be a major stumbling block for US customers to order cocaine (and certainly +1 Oz) internationally; which I think is unfounded because a lot more a larger amounts of MDMA do get ordered by US customers from EU buyers.
2. You have control over your usage or have external controls so that you don't blow it all up ur nose in 2 weeks.


Now I got my hands on a larger amount than usual and I know myself good enough that I'm not strong enough to stay of the shit. So I planned to leave my whole stash at a place which I can't access in normal circumstances. My 'plan' could only start today.

This means I had quite some coke at hands since Friday. Because I have practically no control, certainly not over cocaine, I'm still awake since Friday 8 AM and it's now Monday 9 AM. What is actually more stupid is, that I don't really feel the coke  :-[ I can definitely feel the cocaine in my body, but there's just no euphoria or I'm the king of the world feeling: can't explain what I feel but it feels more like it's therapeutical, but just a little better (like methylphenidate) I feel a little better ofcourse, but since my dopamine levels/system shot, the amounts I take are also way more than a normal person woluld do. In total I consumed about 5 grams since Friday afternoon until this morning. That's not extremely much, but since it's bout double the quality compared to our local cocain, it's really freaking much (for me). I didn't have the equipment to here to get my blood pressure checked, and I had the feeling ir was through the roof (cuz my had this typical high blood pressure headache).

Just took 4mg klonopin and 4 mg xanax cus i'm already experiencing signs of sleep deprivation (bugsssssss everywhereee!);

So to conclude; my stash will be safe for at least 2-3 weeks :D

Post by: goochihuh on June 03, 2013, 01:03 pm
As soon as I vent my disgust with the coca scene as a whole here I am on a Monday night having a serious appetite for some cola. I swear preparing the stuff is just as addictive as the high that you "sometimes" get with good yay. Just like how people who IV they say they love preparing there "rig" for the shoot and when they "register" a vein how good that feels.

Similar thing just not as detailed due to different procedure.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: onionologist on June 03, 2013, 01:34 pm
@Studio- Yo yo yo ! PDS in the hizouse bitches!  8) Take a rip or two for Mr. Onion! It's been since last Thursday since I've had a toot, and it was probably less than 30mg that day.  :-[

Working on obtaining some more Pure Disco Shit....Ball should be rolling today.

I also want to try KotT. As everybody seems to speak highly of his product. I will tell you I did not enjoy the last of 10Toes, or GodofAll's, product. They were super jittery, making my heart pound, and leaving crusty whites in my nostrils!

I highly doubt I'll purchase from any vendor twice, as the best I have had, the PDS, has been sourced other than the road, but I like to get a good idea of contrasting products as to know what is good and what isn't, and what I like, and what effects me negatively.

Sometimes I'm just sitting at my desk and I'll catch a wiff of what should be a line sitting in front of me. MmmMMm That smell is goodness indeed. I'd swing for a brick if I knew the exchange was safe!!

Always Cola-Cola!  *singing coke jingle*

-onion-

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: CallmeBruce on June 04, 2013, 07:14 am
Hi late-night cocaine bothers, sisters and those whom resent any form of sex-based categorization.

Another share for you all.

The following story is true, only the names dates and places have been changed to protect the identity of the stupid ie me.

First.. Hi everyone. My name is Bruce and I am a drug user.

Its mid-week around lunch time and I have been slipping away from work on 'errands'. Which is a euphemism for dashing home to check the mailbox for a package. Joy of joys, its arrived. I do the responsible thing and immediately rip into it. Well.... I need to finalize and provide quality feedback, don't I?

Couple of quick rails..... yum.... then back into the car for my return trip to work. A quick check in the rear view mirror.  You handsome brute!

Then I see it. I tip my head back for a better look and there it is. A solid plug of powder in my nostril.
No way I am going to blow it out so I slip my finger in and try to.. I actually don't know what I am trying to do but end up in a frantic snot eating session.

Problem is no matter how much I try, I can't clear all the specks.  Thank god the traffic is moving but I am getting close to work and the panic sets in. So eventually I decide  to blow it out....

Shit, no tissues. Into my hand it goes, followed by some random discarded food wrapper.

Check the mirror. Still handsome and plug is gone. OK all is good. Get to work late, dash into office for my 1:30pm meeting. Swing past bathroom to wash up but, the person that I am meeting is in the hallway.

Hi Bruce, good to see you.

and puts out his hand to shake..........

I'm sure there is a moral there somewhere but I can't be fragged thinking of one.

Has anyone else discovered, too late, that their face carries evidence of their wicked habit?
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: goochihuh on June 04, 2013, 08:25 am

and puts out his hand to shake..........

I'm sure there is a moral there somewhere but I can't be fragged thinking of one.

Has anyone else discovered, too late, that their face carries evidence of their wicked habit?

That is why I don't do it out in public at all. Constant running back and fourth to do more lines and then the inevitable depression and fatigue just hits you like a bulldozer , you become so fatigued it is a absolute struggle to even muster a few words together without wanting to totally just walk away.

Happens to often , use by self , come down by self , deal with it all by yourself which makes it easier for everyone. I can imagine causing severe harm to a person I am coming down with if that living organism made me angry.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: CallmeBruce on June 05, 2013, 05:56 am

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on June 05, 2013, 01:46 pm
Quote from: CallmeBruce on June 05, 2013, 05:56 am
Quote from: Studio54 on June 04, 2013, 07:26 pm
welcome to the party Bruce.....
it always pays to have one of these $5 items on hand when going out to party
http://cdn100.iofferphoto.com/img/item/127/925/397/blue-snuff-bullet-rocket-snorter-a1553.jpg

Ooh I've seen those before but never tried. Can you adjust the amount that goes into the snort chamber? As you know the strength of cola can vary greatly from batch to batch. Sometimes you only need a little, other times a lot. Do you grind up the powder before putting it in?

Quote from: CallmeBruce on June 05, 2013, 05:56 am
Can you adjust the amount that goes into the snort chamber?

Response ** Sadly, no, its a fixed size amount you can sniff at one time, usually about 50mg on average


Quote from: CallmeBruce on June 05, 2013, 05:56 am
As you know the strength of cola can vary greatly from batch to batch. Sometimes you only need a little, other times a lot.

Response ** that's only true if your buying from most of the cola vendors on SR who make up this "good batch vs bad batch* excuse.. I get same quality cola every time...and its always excellent


Quote from: CallmeBruce on June 05, 2013, 05:56 am
Do you grind up the powder before putting it in?

Response ** yes, you'll have to grind it down into a very fine powder then fill this up and put the cap on. then put it in your pocket for your evening out..
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: onionologist on June 05, 2013, 02:24 pm
Quote from: Studio54 on June 05, 2013, 01:46 pm

Response ** that's only true if your buying from most of the cola vendors on SR who make up this "good batch vs bad batch* excuse.. I get same quality cola every time...and its always excellent


INDEED! Not to compare our drug with others, but if this was LSD, we would be knocking vendors off their "podiums" real quick like...I spent the first few months of my time on the road in the avengers thread, as well as some MJ threads. I can tell you that SHITTY product is not tolerated when it comes to those two items. I am sure this holds true to some other more predominant substances such as molly as well on here, but you get my drift. Point is, we as buyers, shouldn't tolerate inconsistency and shitty product. We should simply "sift" through the buyers with our strainer recommended by Studio, and get this market down to a few choice vendors who bring us our CHOICE product. Ya digg? I think if we all keep buying shit...they will only continue to sell shit. If product is moving, the vendor WILL NOT change their game. That's just my .02Btc worth tho...

Peace all. I only post with respect and integrity towards us as human beings and creatures of love.

-onion-
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on June 05, 2013, 03:09 pm
Quote from: onionologist on June 05, 2013, 02:24 pm
Quote from: Studio54 on June 05, 2013, 01:46 pm

Response ** that's only true if your buying from most of the cola vendors on SR who make up this "good batch vs bad batch* excuse.. I get same quality cola every time...and its always excellent


Point is, we as buyers, shouldn't tolerate inconsistency and shitty product. We should simply "sift" through the buyers with our strainer recommended by Studio, and get this market down to a few choice vendors who bring us our CHOICE product. I think if we all keep buying shit...they will only continue to sell shit. If product is moving, the vendor WILL NOT change their game.

So True Big O
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: springseed23 on June 06, 2013, 12:47 am
Quote from: Studio54 on June 04, 2013, 07:26 pm
Quote from: CallmeBruce on June 04, 2013, 07:14 am
Hi late-night cocaine bothers, sisters and those whom resent any form of sex-based categorization.

Another share for you all.

The following story is true, only the names dates and places have been changed to protect the identity of the stupid ie me.

First.. Hi everyone. My name is Bruce and I am a drug user.

Its mid-week around lunch time and I have been slipping away from work on 'errands'. Which is a euphemism for dashing home to check the mailbox for a package. Joy of joys, its arrived. I do the responsible thing and immediately rip into it. Well.... I need to finalize and provide quality feedback, don't I?

Couple of quick rails..... yum.... then back into the car for my return trip to work. A quick check in the rear view mirror.  You handsome brute!

Then I see it. I tip my head back for a better look and there it is. A solid plug of powder in my nostril.
No way I am going to blow it out so I slip my finger in and try to.. I actually don't know what I am trying to do but end up in a frantic snot eating session.

Problem is no matter how much I try, I can't clear all the specks.  Thank god the traffic is moving but I am getting close to work and the panic sets in. So eventually I decide  to blow it out....

Shit, no tissues. Into my hand it goes, followed by some random discarded food wrapper.

Check the mirror. Still handsome and plug is gone. OK all is good. Get to work late, dash into office for my 1:30pm meeting. Swing past bathroom to wash up but, the person that I am meeting is in the hallway.

Hi Bruce, good to see you.

and puts out his hand to shake..........

I'm sure there is a moral there somewhere but I can't be fragged thinking of one.

Has anyone else discovered, too late, that their face carries evidence of their wicked habit?


welcome to the party Bruce.....

it always pays to have one of these $5 items on hand when going out to party

http://cdn100.iofferphoto.com/img/item/127/925/397/blue-snuff-bullet-rocket-snorter-a1553.jpg

To settled in personal pain right now too find original post---sorry studio-----

This post is the first thing that made me laugh in a couple days!!!   Thanks for that--------laughter and a smile is worth more than any meds!!!

That is some funny deja vu shit!!!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

welcome to the party Bruce.....
it always pays to have one of these $5 items on hand when going out to party
http://cdn100.iofferphoto.com/img/item/127/925/397/blue-snuff-bullet-rocket-snorter-a1553.jpg

Ooh I've seen those before but never tried. Can you adjust the amount that goes into the snort chamber? As you know the strength of cola can vary greatly from batch to batch. Sometimes you only need a little, other times a lot. Do you grind up the powder before putting it in?

Quote from: CallmeBruce on June 05, 2013, 05:56 am
Can you adjust the amount that goes into the snort chamber?

Response ** Sadly, no, its a fixed size amount you can sniff at one time, usually about 50mg on average


Quote from: CallmeBruce on June 05, 2013, 05:56 am
As you know the strength of cola can vary greatly from batch to batch. Sometimes you only need a little, other times a lot.

Response ** that's only true if your buying from most of the cola vendors on SR who make up this "good batch vs bad batch* excuse.. I get same quality cola every time...and its always excellent


Quote from: CallmeBruce on June 05, 2013, 05:56 am
Do you grind up the powder before putting it in?

Response ** yes, you'll have to grind it down into a very fine powder then fill this up and put the cap on. then put it in your pocket for your evening out..
Hey thanks for all this good info Studio.  Who knew that being a deviant could be so technical?
