Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on June 08, 2013, 03:57 pm
Quote from: Strickland Cocaine on June 08, 2013, 03:20 am
Yo maddafackaz



quick questtiion.. I am going to have a sit down with b0sses soon regarding blowcaine.

A. I am going to find out what they, or their bosses, are using to cut it.

B. I am going to find out if they or their bosses will stop cutting it.

C. In your opinion, what should I ask them/tell them in regards to the whole process of supplying? They need to understand that we are not some street level joeys...

ok wait... so i understand what your asking here..

you <personally> are going to sit down with Cocaine dealers who carry a lot of weight? as in they move a lot of product in your area?

then your going to ask them what they are using to cut the cocaine with (question)

then your going to ask them to stop cutting it. (question)

then you want to know what you should ask them/tell them in regards to the whole process of supplying?


from experience i can tell you, that if your close as in your friends with someone who's a "boss" meaning he has people under him that sell and distribute the cocaine on his behalf.. bosses dont run out to meet a customer at a gas station to sell them a $50 gram bag ya know :)

its very unlikely they are going to tell you what they cut the cocaine with <sorry its a trade secret> and its even more unlikely they are going to "stop" cutting it and sell it to you in the raw form they receive it..

your asking them to basically take a pay cut... now some will simply say "ok, if you want it off the brick then its going to be X amount of $$$ per gram" -- i dont know at what price your currently paying now for a gram of the cocaine your getting from the people... but dealers arent likely to stop cutting cocaine, and sell the raw form to you at the same price your currently buying at...

but its worth a try to at least sit down with them and see what you can negotiate.. i mean, they are holding all the cards, unless your a dude that can bring $2000 of cash to the table per week and buy same amount each week ..

im just trying to figure out your goal here:::::::::: is it to buy un-cut / off the brick cocaine from your local cocaine supplier?

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: beastpiss77 on June 09, 2013, 06:02 am
Pure Disco Shit, I'm loving it, and I'm enjoying some right now! Actual disco enthusiast here too, specifically the more esoteric shit, or at least the shit that people my age (mid-30's) aren't even supposed to know about - Sylvester, Bohannon, Cerrone, Gino Soccio, Change, North End, etc etc etc. Love it. I'm one of those douchebags that's nostalgic for a time that I never actually experienced. Now if only I could get ahold of some Ludes! I've seen 'em on the road, but of course only from overseas, possibly-sketchy vendors. With my luck though, they'd probably just knock me the fuck out and I wouldn't get any of that orgiastic experience my parents and 50+ year old friends tell me about. One such friend tells me her favorite combination back in the day was "quaaludes, champagne, and cocaine." Perfect!

Anyway, the blow that I'm currently enjoying is from PureOrganx. Just thought I'd mention it, since I haven't seen much talk about his cola on here at all, and it's definitely worth mentioning! One of the 2 best I've ever had, up there with SpaceWrangler, who unfortunately went rogue. So if you were wondering about PO's stuff, it's PDS for sure. That is all!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on June 09, 2013, 06:41 pm
Quote from: acidicmonkey on June 09, 2013, 04:55 am
COLUMBIANS??? Bolivia is where its at!!!

Bolivia is one of the poorest countries in South America.. sadly the only place that is nice to stay is in the city of La Paz (been there)
Everything outside the city is either beautiful mountains or small villages of poor people who have homes made of 2x4's and tin roofs and dirt floors.

If you wanted to see more, do more things in South America you can always go to Santiago Chile, or Cartagena Colombia... but Cartagena vs Bolivia? I'll take Columbia anyday. Plus i think the cocaine was better in Columbia than when i was in Bolivia..... just my .2cents.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: PuretyAboveAll on June 10, 2013, 04:42 pm
Here is a home made joke for you, that I just thought of. It is funny because it is true.

I am from the EU, but have worked in many countries around the world. China, various EU countries and the U.S. But do you know what country I liked working in the most?

China.

Because it was the only country I ever heard this sentence: "Avvv you to bigaaaa" (Said with a Chinese accent) *If you know what I mean*

Why I never heard that sentence in Europe is beyond me............ ;)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on June 10, 2013, 11:55 pm
Quote from: PuretyAboveAll on June 10, 2013, 04:42 pm
Here is a home made joke for you, that I just thought of. It is funny because it is true.

I am from the EU, but have worked in many countries around the world. China, various EU countries and the U.S. But do you know what country I liked working in the most?

China.

Because it was the only country I ever heard this sentence: "Avvv you to bigaaaa" (Said with a Chinese accent) *If you know what I mean*

Why I never heard that sentence in Europe is beyond me............ ;)

I use to work with a guy from China ... we would meet in Germany 3-4x per year. The Germans love Beer, or as they spell it Bier.... he'd get drunk off 2 beers, in America we say "cheers" --- in German you make a toast by saying "prost" --- so we told the guy from China that we have a special way of making a toast in America, we would raise our glasses and say "Gang Bang" --- he didnt know what that meant so it just stuck, so every time we were in Germany we would all make a toast by saying "Gang Bang" !!! funny shit man...

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: beastpiss77 on June 11, 2013, 04:37 am
I have to work tomorrow, but here I am doing some lines and eating leftover Thai food. Am I the only one who does some blow and then eats afterward? Is that weird? It's not that it makes me hungry, it's that I was already hungry beforehand. I can also do a few lines and then go to bed shortly thereafter, without any other pharmaceutical intervention, except maybe booze.

As a chronic over-sharer, I often find myself wishing I could post my random coke-related musings on Facebook. But I guess this is the next best thing, so here are a couple status updates...

I always make sure to put my coke-piled mirror out of the reach of my cat's wandering tail. He's always knocking over the vaporizer whip, which is annoying enough, but what a disaster it would be if he swept all my blow off the coffee table! One of these days I'm gonna forget...

Thank the gods for that Simply Saline nasal mist. Not only is it good for keeping things moist in there, but after a night of snorting shit that accumulates in my abundant forest of nose hair, a couple squirts of saline up each nostril is like doing a big extra bump. It washes all the trapped coke up to where it should be, and I'm high all over again! Brilliant!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: CallmeBruce on June 12, 2013, 06:17 am
Quote from: beastpiss77 on June 11, 2013, 04:37 am
I have to work tomorrow, but here I am doing some lines and eating leftover Thai food. Am I the only one who does some blow and then eats afterward? Is that weird? It's not that it makes me hungry, it's that I was already hungry beforehand. I can also do a few lines and then go to bed shortly thereafter, without any other pharmaceutical intervention, except maybe booze.

As a chronic over-sharer, I often find myself wishing I could post my random coke-related musings on Facebook. But I guess this is the next best thing, so here are a couple status updates...

I always make sure to put my coke-piled mirror out of the reach of my cat's wandering tail. He's always knocking over the vaporizer whip, which is annoying enough, but what a disaster it would be if he swept all my blow off the coffee table! One of these days I'm gonna forget...

Thank the gods for that Simply Saline nasal mist. Not only is it good for keeping things moist in there, but after a night of snorting shit that accumulates in my abundant forest of nose hair, a couple squirts of saline up each nostril is like doing a big extra bump. It washes all the trapped coke up to where it should be, and I'm high all over again! Brilliant!

Likewise, I like a little liquid mist up the old shnozzer after some good rails. Saline? never tried it but it makes perfect sense. Going to try it next time.

So much to learn from sharing.

For example, I sometimes pop a diazepam at the end of a big binge to ease me into sleep, but I find myself a little sluggish in the morning. (which of course makes me crave for more rails). It gets worse if I do it on successive days. But the other day I tried some medical marijuana to come down and I didn't feel nearly as crap in the morning.

How do you guys/gals come down. (Or do you never come down) :)
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: beastpiss77 on June 12, 2013, 06:35 am
Yeah, I usually pop a little Xanax or Valium to come down, but that can make it next to impossible to wake up in the morning if I have to be somewhere. And Valium makes me feel sluggish too, and kinda depressed for a whole day after I take it. Xanax is much nicer. I will vaporize a little weed which sometimes helps, but sometimes gets my heart racing even more. My friend makes a cannabis tincture that makes me sleep like a benzo would, but without the grogginess in the morning.

And now for my Cokebook status update of the day:

I should always remember to blow my chronically runny nose before doing a line, otherwise I end up snorting back a loogie that makes my throat so numb I can't swallow properly for 20-30 minutes. That really sucked.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on June 12, 2013, 06:52 am
When I'm running low I like to plan my next move a couple lines in advance so I know I am working towards an end goal, so I'll systematically pick a movie that makes sense at the times, then I make my warm ginger tea and get out a benzo. I'll spread a little weed butter on my toast and sit down to get ready for the ride back down to earth. Finish the budbutter toast and follow it with a benzo and some tea and make sure to enjoy the evening and everything life has to offer.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on June 12, 2013, 01:50 pm
A MUST READ REVIEW !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

http://dkn255hz262ypmii.onion/index.php?topic=27925.9660

Thank you b0lixtrader for taking the time to write up a very detailed and honest review !!!! you can click on the link or just read the review here !!!!

Quote from: b0lixtrader on June 12, 2013, 05:22 am
So I got to sample some amazing PURE DISCO SHIT cocaine that I have not had in way too long.

This is not from a vendor but a free .5 rock sample from my man and veteran member Studio54.

He wanted me to test out his product and give a review on it to help him see if it would be worth it to start vending on here and give him my thoughts.  I must say, this is by far the best shit Ive had in a year.  Amazing product and also EPIC packaging skills.  Also the best packaging Ive seen in a long time.

Studio 54s review for PureDiscoShit Cocaine

Packaging:  10/10 
    This level of ingenuity and clean packaging will fool anyone for sure especially for domestic shipping. Multiple layers of protection and cant not feel, see, smell anything suspicious.  Probably one of the Top 3 best packaging Ive seen through on SR.  Simply amazing.

Product appearance/bag appeal: 
    This stuff was beautiful.  It looked like some of the best shit Ive had since the last stuff I got from NorthernDancer a year ago.  Scaley flakes of shiney goodness.  Makes me want to cream my pants.

Product smell: 
    As soon as I opened up the vacuum seal bag I got hit with that kick of herbal coca+light gasoline smell on the nose.  I opened up the baggie and took a big whiff, missed that smell man.  Smells not too strong, but it's not weak either.  Has that sour/pungent smell of the cocaine alkaloids, I love that smell.

Product texture: 
     A little hard when in a cool dry room but as soon as I took it out on my balcony to do a line in this humid ass weather and smoke a cigarette it became a bit moist when I was cutting it up.  Good sign!
Also became slick and melts instantly when rubbed between fingers.  Also another very good sign.

Product taste:  Classic cocaine taste.   Bitter taste of herbal coca alkaloids but not too bitter that it was off putting. 

Product effects: 

    WARNING:  This stuff is potent.  Cocaine is a stimulant and when doing big lines of high purity cocaine you will feel the similar characteristic effects of ANY stimulant. Please if you happen to get some, do half of what you do for the first line and wait a good hour too see how your tolerance reacts to the potency of this coke.
 
    I did two lines of 50mg each nostril. Beautiful clean slowly soaring high.  Clear headed, not even close to being jittery compared to 90% of other stuff on SR.   Goes up the nose very smooth with almost no burn at all.  And the drip is not overpowering that it will make you feel sick.
The euphoria that worked its way up after 5-10minutes of snorting lasted a good 40-45minutes.  I was doing 50-70mg lines every hour or so.  I loved it so much.  I did not have coke this clean in too long.
The coke numbed the four front teeth after the first few lines and the inside the nose cavity.  Its a sensation that I get from all very good cocaine. 
Another great sign is that once I start crashing you get that sudden sense of sleepiness, great sign of good coke.  At least then you know it is not cut with any other real junk like speed, methylphenidate, pseudo/ephederine, etc(all serious stims).  Still take it slow and easy on this stuff, high purity cocaine will cause an increase in heart rate and rise in blood pressure if done in large amounts for anyone.

Oh and no nose clogging.  Another amazing plus of this product.
Product rating: 9/10

I hope Studio54 really starts vending here so our US members can get a taste of what good stuff is.

Here are some pictures:

http://xqz3u5drneuzhaeo.onion/users/qicpic/files/1o2.jpg

http://xqz3u5drneuzhaeo.onion/users/qicpic/files/1o5.jpg

Enjoy guys :)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Suidone on June 12, 2013, 04:56 pm
I already can confirm that Studio54s PDS is great stuff. It seems to be up there with Bungee and IMBs coke.
I've noticed the same characteristics with HQ cocaine:
- goes very smooth up the nose with little to no burning;
- no real nose clogging unless doing massive amounts :p
- a 100 mg line of pure coke looks double the amount of street cocaine; this is probably because it's all real powdery.
- Good taste, but not what I was used to. I thought good coke had this particular strong taste and numbing, but it seems that it's more subtle;
- doing massive amounts of pure coke makes your heart race and your blood pressure can go through the roof :D

Oh and no nose clogging.  Another amazing plus of this product.
Product rating: 9/10

I hope Studio54 really starts vending here so our US members can get a taste of what good stuff is.

Here are some pictures:

http://xqz3u5drneuzhaeo.onion/users/qicpic/files/1o2.jpg

http://xqz3u5drneuzhaeo.onion/users/qicpic/files/1o5.jpg

Enjoy guys :)

I also had the same opportunity to get a taste from Studio54s 'pure disco shit' and must say it was pleasurable experience. I'm not a real elaborate reviewer but what I can say is that its good news for you Americans.  Since I recently experienced uncut cocaine (87% / 89 % ) from Bungee54 and IMB I can compare and Studio54s stuff  is up there with these guys. Same nice clean taste, powdery and very smooth up the nose. So for all the US domestic consumers who don't like to take the risk to order overseas from Bungee or IMB, you guys prolly get lucky once he starts vending. 

It's already been brought to the lab for testing so results will be announced next week. I'm pretty sure it'll be + 80 % cuz it tasted and felt even better than bungees stuff. Since 89 % is the max purity, it can't be that much better (than 87 %) and I doubt you can really notice a couple % purity; All three vendors cocaine tasted differently and the first two (Bungee/IMB) were only 2 % different in terms of purity; So i'm really curious for the result.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: beastpiss77 on June 13, 2013, 03:31 am
Quote from: tango on June 12, 2013, 09:39 am
Do you guys pretty much do coke most nights?

Lately I've been having the urge to do some mid week, but I am afraid if I give in, then it might slowly/eventually develop into a sneaky line after work everyday...
then nek minnit addict.

Yeah, I find myself doing it most nights now. I'm currently trying to fight the urge tonight, trying to have 2-3 nights a week of "being good." The craving is STRONG right now though, mostly because I'm bored, injured, and not able to do the other, more healthy activities that I love.

I'm also going on a short trip this weekend, and I keep going back and forth about whether I should bring some coke with me. If I don't have it with me, then I'll have no choice but to be "good" for 3 days straight. I already got it ready for the flight though, emptying out a capsule of my regular medication and filling it with the good stuff. I think this is a pretty foolproof way of getting it through airport security, unless they have drug dogs. If I don't take it with me on this trip, I definitely want to take some on another trip later this year. Anyone have experience bringing drugs on a plane? What are some methods you've used?

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Chopper on June 17, 2013, 08:53 pm
I ordered 1g of PDS last week from Studio54 which arrived today. Here's my initial feedback:

5/5 Shipped on Friday received Monday. Initial communications were very good, I was informed exactly when it was shipped and the expected delivery date. Arrived the day Studio54 expected it to arrive. Packaging was extremely professional and stealth was perfect. It could easily have been opened by a family member or nosy housemate and they would have no idea what was inside even after poking through it. Easily good enough for international orders in my opinion. Once I got to it through several layers I can honestly say it looks fantastic! Shinny, flaky and scaly just how I love it, mainly large chunks. It smells good, I tasted a tiny bit of dust from the side of the pack and it tastes very strong. It had nice bit of numbing but not too much. I can't wait for a line as I can already tell it's going to be amazing! Fingers crossed Studio54 continues to provide the same product and service. I hope he'll have a good supply of this stuff otherwise he'll find himself constantly sold out. Get some when you can!!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: beastpiss77 on July 03, 2013, 05:30 am
So I was expecting a package of some cola today, and I was totally sure it would be waiting for me in my mailbox when I got home. I was REALLY hoping for it, because I used the last of my stash last night, and I have a day off tomorrow. So I get home after work, and I look in my mailbox... EMPTY! So disappointed. But there was a glimmer of hope that maybe the mailman left it in front of my apartment door, which they sometimes do. I get up to my floor, look in front of my door. Nothing! I was so fuckin' bummed, I was like, what am I gonna DO tonight?

I get in my apartment, set my bike against the wall, turn the light on, feeling all bummed... start putting my stuff down, and then I look behind me and there's an envelope sitting there on the floor. That's it! They slipped it under my door! I went from bummed to psyched real quick! That little surprise pretty much made my night. And it's some of my favorite shit, too, from PureOrganix.

Now the only question is what to do while I'm doing it...

For the first time in my life I decided to be sensible and try and save :(

Damn, I just don't know how you folks manage to actually save cocaine. I can keep hold of it untouched for ages sometimes but once start I just can't stop. It makes me laugh when people talk about high quality not being fiendish as I find quite the opposite!

Am gonna have to learn how to limit myself or am gonna have to knock the consumption of my favourite substance on the head for good before the year is out. Recovery time is getting longer and longer. A good session takes me out for 3-4 days lately and I just cannot reconcile that as being ok at this point.

The end is nigh, Sigh.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Chopper on July 10, 2013, 01:11 pm
Quote from: Intraterrestrial on July 10, 2013, 12:53 pm
Damn, I just don't know how you folks manage to actually save cocaine. I can keep hold of it untouched for ages sometimes but once start I just can't stop. It makes me laugh when people talk about high quality not being fiendish as I find quite the opposite!

Am gonna have to learn how to limit myself or am gonna have to knock the consumption of my favourite substance on the head for good before the year is out. Recovery time is getting longer and longer. A good session takes me out for 3-4 days lately and I just cannot reconcile that as being ok at this point.

The end is nigh, Sigh.

Up until 2-3 years ago I never used to be able to control myself, but I did earn several times more than I do now and worked with a importer/dealer so I got an unlimited supply of A+++ uncut stuff for a peanuts. We'd start on a Monday and finish on a Friday with the weekend to recover. We'd be out all night sometimes without going home between leaving work and going back in the morning. You can imagine how pissed I was when I changed jobs, moved away etc. and lost contact with everyone from back then! Now, when I think about it I feel extremely lucky to have experienced the best years of my life and actually survived the whole thing. I'm quite sure I'd either be dead or made myself quite ill by now if I'd have carried on sniffing the amounts I was doing...

Oh, what I'd do to find a new local contact like that again....

Tough enough to do because it would be on my mind a lot!!!  :)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

it sure is good to be back home and relaxing after such a long time traveling, so many miles so many countries, shit man, every country i hit, i had to go through customs, padded down, take your shoes off, go through your luggage, answer all these bullshit questions, get on air plane fly 9 hours, then go through all that shit all over again... i tell you what, only a moron would try to body pack drugs into some of the countries i was in, some places had 2-3 check points of security just to get thru customs....

so while im relaxing, im gonna take a good long hit of this PDS and mellow out the rest of the weekend..
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

Crazy to think that some middle east countries will lock you up for having codeine or even a product containing codeine. Enough for a joint means prison too! Can't think of the guys name but a big name DJ was passing through Bahrain (might have that part wrong) and had a small nugget of hash in his pocket and did about 3 years for it!

On a lighter note, welcome back Studio and enjoy the few lines of PDS!  :)

yeah man, hash almost anywhere is a pretty bad offense and chances are if they catch you with it, either on your persons or in your suitcase there is a 110% chance you are NOT going to get on that airplane or through customs --- so check, double check then re-check everything on you and in your luggage to make sure there isnt even the smallest little pellet or even an empty bag with cocaine reside in it... even that shit will get your ass in lot of trouble..

Good to hear your home safe and sound Studio. ;) Would love to know which countries had the tightest security? :P

hola jnemonic, i sent you a PM here on the forums so check it when you can...

id say the toughest airports in terms of many multiple check points from the time you walk in, till you get to the terminal and then again before you get on the plane would be: and in this order and this just isnt in Europe but this list includes all the places ive traveled to in the last 2 years.

#1- Tel Aviv's Ben Gurion Airport  (if you look like a muslim trying to get on an airplane then you can bet there is a 100% chance you'll be pulled aside
taken into a private room, searched, and asked 100 questions)

#2 - Bogot Columbia - El Dorado International Airport  ( if your a white american traveling with a suitcase, then 95% of the time you'll go through additional screening, body pat downs and then an x-ray machine to make sure your not 'body packing')

#3 - Medellin Columbia - Jos Mara Crdova International Airport (same thing as Bogot)

#4 - Amsterdam Airport Schiphol ( you do NOT want to fuck up here and you dont want to have any food or cookies or candy in your pocket when you go through security b/c they WILL take it from you and throw it in the trash, no questions asked) If you checked your luggage and you are given a luggage claim tag, then before you go through the last security check point they ask "do you have any checked luggage"? and if you say "yes i do" they will ask to see the luggage claim tag... if you cannot produce that tag to the security agent, then you got a problem, prepare to be held up while they search for your 'luggage' you wont be able to get on that plane until the checked bag has been found and located.

#5 - Frankfut Germany - Rhein-Main-Flughafen-  Multiple security check points, doesnt matter what you look like, 1 out of every 3rd person is pulled aside, padded down, asked questions, where you going, where you coming from what is your purpose for coming to Germany.

#6 - Dsseldorf International Airport, Germany --- I only list this one as a very difficult airport to navigate if you have a problem trying to find a terminal or ask someone for help, you might have a hard time communicating with someone if you dont speak German...

but Dsseldorf International Airport security is pretty good but not as many check points as they do in Frankfut,... if you fly into Frankfut, its a fucking nightmare if you cannot speak / read in German.... With 56 million passengers passing through last year, it's the third busiest airport in Europe and claims to serve more international destinations than any other airport in the world...

there are many others i left off the list that are pretty tight on security:
Panama
Nicaragua
Miami International Airport (coming into Miami from Columbia, your funneled in to a completely separate lane of customs that only handles those people coming from Columbia....) yeah because they think 99% of everyone is smuggling kilo's of cocaine on them..

it sure is good to be back home and relaxing after such a long time traveling, so many miles so many countries, shit man, every country i hit, i had to go through customs, padded down, take your shoes off, go through your luggage, answer all these bullshit questions, get on air plane fly 9 hours, then go through all that shit all over again... i tell you what, only a moron would try to body pack drugs into some of the countries i was in, some places had 2-3 check points of security just to get thru customs....

so while im relaxing, im gonna take a good long hit of this PDS and mellow out the rest of the weekend..

Good to hear your home safe and sound Studio. ;) Would love to know which countries had the tightest security? :P

hola jnemonic, i sent you a PM here on the forums so check it when you can...

id say the toughest airports in terms of many multiple check points from the time you walk in, till you get to the terminal and then again before you get on the plane would be: and in this order and this just isnt in Europe but this list includes all the places ive traveled to in the last 2 years.

#1- Tel Aviv's Ben Gurion Airport  (if you look like a muslim trying to get on an airplane then you can bet there is a 100% chance you'll be pulled aside
taken into a private room, searched, and asked 100 questions)

#2 - Bogot Columbia - El Dorado International Airport  ( if your a white american traveling with a suitcase, then 95% of the time you'll go through additional screening, body pat downs and then an x-ray machine to make sure your not 'body packing')

#3 - Medellin Columbia - Jos Mara Crdova International Airport (same thing as Bogot)

#4 - Amsterdam Airport Schiphol ( you do NOT want to fuck up here and you dont want to have any food or cookies or candy in your pocket when you go through security b/c they WILL take it from you and throw it in the trash, no questions asked) If you checked your luggage and you are given a luggage claim tag, then before you go through the last security check point they ask "do you have any checked luggage"? and if you say "yes i do" they will ask to see the luggage claim tag... if you cannot produce that tag to the security agent, then you got a problem, prepare to be held up while they search for your 'luggage' you wont be able to get on that plane until the checked bag has been found and located.

#5 - Frankfut Germany - Rhein-Main-Flughafen-  Multiple security check points, doesnt matter what you look like, 1 out of every 3rd person is pulled aside, padded down, asked questions, where you going, where you coming from what is your purpose for coming to Germany.

#6 - Dsseldorf International Airport, Germany --- I only list this one as a very difficult airport to navigate if you have a problem trying to find a terminal or ask someone for help, you might have a hard time communicating with someone if you dont speak German...

but Dsseldorf International Airport security is pretty good but not as many check points as they do in Frankfut,... if you fly into Frankfut, its a fucking nightmare if you cannot speak / read in German.... With 56 million passengers passing through last year, it's the third busiest airport in Europe and claims to serve more international destinations than any other airport in the world...

there are many others i left off the list that are pretty tight on security:
Panama
Nicaragua
Miami International Airport (coming into Miami from Columbia, your funneled in to a completely separate lane of customs that only handles those people coming from Columbia....) yeah because they think 99% of everyone is smuggling kilo's of cocaine on them..

Thats an awesome run down Studio, thank you. ;) Cant believe Frankfut/Germany is so tight. :o

My hopes of bringing back some cola from Colombia are crushed. :'( :P He he.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on July 18, 2013, 12:58 am
Have been thinking this lately for the safety of the coke when I read of coke attracting moisture etc. so I keep mine in a moisture barrier bag that one of my orders arrived in within a dark press. Some that I haven't opened yet I leave the way they arrived to try keep the freshness

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

LOL  some how cocaine and captain morgan dark rum use to always get me in trouble... meaning that id start at 11pm, and the next thing i realize its 5am and i had to be at work at 7am.... uhh i hated those days..

but i guess more and more i was around it and the more cocaine i had the temptation got less and less.. i could have 10g's sitting in my lock box and not touch it for a week or even think about it < now >

i feel ya, i use to be the same way, i could never save a gram or even half a gram, no matter where i hid it...... i would find myself always creeping into that little blue box to pull out that baggie that had the left overs from the weekend and just end up slamming down rails on a tuesday night at 11pm.. LOL  some how cocaine and captain morgan dark rum use to always get me in trouble... meaning that id start at 11pm, and the next thing i realize its 5am and i had to be at work at 7am.... uhh i hated those days..

but i guess more and more i was around it and the more cocaine i had the temptation got less and less.. i could have 10g's sitting in my lock box and not touch it for a week or even think about it < now >

hahaha
out of sight, out of mind.. i wish!!
interesting though.. cuz with me and weed, the more herbals i have, the less i smoke.. ???
but, i do NOT want to find out if I'm the same way with cola.. i have a funny feeling that if you put 10 grams in front of me, i'm aiming for a world record!! lol

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on July 25, 2013, 06:00 pm
Quote from: Fusion 3 on July 25, 2013, 01:49 am
I got 2g's of coke locally today have a question if somebody can help me please, the coke is very sticky when i try chop lines up it kinda sticks to itself anyone know what the problem is?

Can't say what the problem is other than maybe it took in too much moisture as coke does according to the pros.!

Have you tried drying it out?

If you don't know how to do that, heat a plate in a microwave until it's hottish and then chop your coke on the hot plate or if you don't have a micro. boil a kettle and pour a cup of boiling water, put a plate on top of it with your coke on the plate and the steam underneath will heat the plate dry it out to chop it.

But currently I feel amazing and just wondering if it's too early to start again tonight ;D  I partied for about 8 hours straight then at the end of the evening downed a Xanax and another Vodka then woke up at 3:00PM this afternoon feeling fantastic. I don't think I've ever felt so good after such a long night (or slept so well after a shit load of Coke). Obviously the, err, SR prescribed medication I was on ;)

Reminds me of my previous life when I used to party like this before moving away.

And Studio, I finished the evening(morning) off with some PDS2. I can confirm batch 2 is well and truly FIRE and well worthy of the PDS name!! You are da man Studio! I'll post a full review tomorrow or early next week as I don't plan to be able to write anything legible too soon...

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: CallmeBruce on August 01, 2013, 02:35 am
Hey people, or as murderface says... hey droogies. (can I have this line too? Its sooo good)
Hope you are all having some fun rails.
Just wanted to share my appreciation for advice given in this thread.

Quote from: beastpiss77 on June 11, 2013, 04:37 am
I have to work tomorrow, but here I am doing some lines and eating leftover Thai food. Am I the only one who does some blow and then eats afterward? Is that weird? It's not that it makes me hungry, it's that I was already hungry beforehand. I can also do a few lines and then go to bed shortly thereafter, without any other pharmaceutical intervention, except maybe booze.

As a chronic over-sharer, I often find myself wishing I could post my random coke-related musings on Facebook. But I guess this is the next best thing, so here are a couple status updates...

I always make sure to put my coke-piled mirror out of the reach of my cat's wandering tail. He's always knocking over the vaporizer whip, which is annoying enough, but what a disaster it would be if he swept all my blow off the coffee table! One of these days I'm gonna forget...

Thank the gods for that Simply Saline nasal mist. Not only is it good for keeping things moist in there, but after a night of snorting shit that accumulates in my abundant forest of nose hair, a couple squirts of saline up each nostril is like doing a big extra bump. It washes all the trapped coke up to where it should be, and I'm high all over again! Brilliant!

+1
beastpiss77
Since adopting a saline nose spray method, my shnoggin is loving it.  Reduced irritation and absolutely no blood spots, even after a heavy night on it. I'm finding myself spraying like 6 times between rails and lots more at the end of the evening. Now I can abuse my body to a greater degree than before. :)

also.....

I suffer hay-fever from time to time which is a real impediment to my coke habit.
(refer to post Bruce's Plugging Odyssey)
http://dkn255hz262ypmii.onion/index.php?topic=138473.msg1118551#msg1118551

So I have got onto a hay-fever nose spray. Even though I am not suffering at the moment, I tried using the spray before a big session and it was amazing. Whatever is in that spray that stops pollen from itching me, also stopped my nose from reacting to the coke.

Give it a go!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: uncfan420 on August 01, 2013, 01:30 pm
Really fucked up on a gram of some good coke I just finished off. Best shit I've gotten on the street in awhile and the shit was only $80 for a gram. Shit looks like it came right off the brick. Ran a test kit on it, cocaine was the only substance that came up on the regnant test, which I found odd and wonder if my buddy hit the jackpot on a local cola connect. If you've never tried street coke get out there and try some its getting better in my area and cheaper. Could be my town but I doubt it I don't live in a big town. Anyways my review of this bomb ass coke is over and I'll come back with a sober review. Also how much do you need to test? I got a little shake left and was thinking about washing it to see how pure it really is.

I apologize in advance if none of this makes sense or is hard to understand I haven't done coke in awhile and its taken me for a ride still and I'm suppose to be asleep for work later tonight haha.

If I had access to what you have I'd be at it all the time to be honest!

I'm not rich enough to hammer coke all the time and it might be better for me that way in the long run but at the end of the day, I'm a fiend for it!!!  :D

Fair play man keep it that way, i have seen many of people loose everything trying to clear there bills with dealers haha, but its a hell of a drug i must say i would like it morning noon and night haha i might try cut down on it give that vacuum a break :)

WD's Buddy 8)

Quote from: murderface2012 on July 31, 2013, 09:31 pm
hahahaha
iiiiiii'm baaaack!!

**Review time!!**

the creme de la creme rests soley with Studio54!!
his communication goes far beyond any other vendor here.. he'll PM you telling you an estimated drop date, you can ask him for powder or rock, and he answers PM's faster than a telemarketer!!

shipping and packaging.. umm, can i get an amen?!? delivery has never been more than 3 days.. 2 days on average!! my first delivery from Studio, i didn't even know it was it!! I'm talking a professional label on the exterior.. then when opened, the contents match the exterior label!! there would be NO reason for pesky porkers or nosey postal workers to dig any further!!
but, it gets better.. the interior packaging includes A zippy bag inside a vac sealed mylar inside a MBB!! i can't divulge any more, but Studio54 is what i call a stealth ninja!!

the product.. oooweee the product!! Wow, where to start?? the first time i got to try some PDS.. it took me back a loooong time ago.. the smell, taste, er something!!
I've received multiple orders from Studio.. and EVERY batch has been utterly fan fucking tastic!!
the smell is powerful, yet subtle.. taste test was lovely!! followed by a slight numbing on the tounge.. since it came as a 3.5g fatty ass rock, it looked fucking beautiful!! flaky layers that glistened in the sun!! when i was finally able to play with it, i took a knife and cut a corner off.. it flaked off with ease.. so i cut some little pieces off the corner.. little sparkly flakes that cut up super easy!! cola remnants left on my fingers when rolled around completely vanished into nothing, leaving a semi sticky spot
from only a 100mg line you feel the euphoria.. lasts a good while without the crazy feeling to re-dose!! tasty as hell drip.. smoooth high with absolutely no jitters!! and the absolute best part.. the most mellow comedown from coke i have ever experienced!!
for the price, there is NO other!! don't even bother with those $200/g vendors!! there is MUCH better, for much cheaper elsewhere!!
seriously, next time Studio gives a 24 hr heads up.. i highly recommend coining up!!

thanks again Studio!! you the man!!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Studio54 on August 13, 2013, 12:36 am
Quote from: DanDanTheIceCreamMan on August 12, 2013, 04:15 pm
Quote from: murderface2012 on August 12, 2013, 02:47 am

ooooooh i gotta get me one of them bullets!!
good times!!

You've never used a bullet before? Those are definitely the way to go. They are 10 times faster to use and 5 times more discreet than the traditional way(those are scientifically accurate numbers :D). Just turn the know and take a wiff, put it back in your pocket and no one is the wiser. The first time I saw one was in Scarface at the beginning when the the two dudes in the care ask Tony if he wants to meet up with some Columbians ;)

yeah, "bullets" are certainly the way to go if you are heading out to the bar or club and want to bring some cocaine along with you, its quick and easy to load, and it gives you about a 50mg bump (rather small) but if your like me you need prob 3-4 hits before your feeling it, ya know ? plus they are much easier than trying to pull a plastic baggie out of your pocket and scoop up some cocaine with a pen cap or your finger nail (IMHO) cause its late at night, your buzzed on alcohol and coke you can tear a baggie and dump the whole bag of coke in the toilet (trust me, ive had this happen to me before)

but the ones they used in the movie scarface at the beginning you cant find cause they arent made anymore...

if you go to your local head shop you cant say the word "bullet" you have to use the word "snuff jar" --- saying the word "bullet" is like walking into a head store and saying "uh yeah, cant i get that bong on the top shelf" --- 99% of the time they throw you out b/c of local laws -- you cant say certain words..

but me personally i use a "Clear glass snuff vial w/ black spoon top" those to me are better than the bullets cause i can load up that spoon with huge amounts of coke and sniff 8) 8) 8)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: gtgeorgz on August 18, 2013, 10:55 pm
I have two fat rocks of some very beautiful pure white cocaine I've acquired from HollyMolly here with me. Trying so desperately hard to save it for use in a couple weeks but it is ever so hard. Whiskey on the rocks and some lines of delicious fishscale, damn...
I do have about 4g of other cocaine but the quality just doesn't compare, it's ever so speedy.
Think I've become a cocaine snob since using SR, I now pretty much refuse cocaine unless it's pure lol.

Really want to try studio's PDS everyone is bangin about, I wonder if it compares with hollymolly's cocaine.. By the look of all the glowing reviews it certainly does. Anyone tried both and able to compare? If not, anybody able to compare PDS to Koltbiz's purified cocaine?
That was also some very nice cocaine..

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on August 19, 2013, 08:23 pm
Quote from: gtgeorgz on August 18, 2013, 10:55 pm
I have two fat rocks of some very beautiful pure white cocaine I've acquired from HollyMolly here with me. Trying so desperately hard to save it for use in a couple weeks but it is ever so hard. Whiskey on the rocks and some lines of delicious fishscale, damn...
I do have about 4g of other cocaine but the quality just doesn't compare, it's ever so speedy.
Think I've become a cocaine snob since using SR, I now pretty much refuse cocaine unless it's pure lol.

Really want to try studio's PDS everyone is bangin about, I wonder if it compares with hollymolly's cocaine.. By the look of all the glowing reviews it certainly does. Anyone tried both and able to compare? If not, anybody able to compare PDS to Koltbiz's purified cocaine?
That was also some very nice cocaine..

Would love to try Holly Molly's but they only do large orders I believe? I would use them because their stealth seems to be one of their top selling points for me!

I've tried Kolbiz's and now Studio's PDS and the same with both, I only tried them after a binge on other stuff (of course I wasn't going to touch it and wanted to keep them for another occasion but after a binge I got desperate!) so couldn't really judge them properly but then one night I tried Koltbiz's again after a small break to see if maybe I was wrong to not see the hype about it and it hit me with it's real identity and I found it really really nice, strong, clean and euphoric which is the way I feel on a smaller scale this evening with Studio's which would be more I'm sure if I hadn't been on other stuff at the weekend!

I would rather try Studio's another time after a small break because I find my tolerance is affected if using with hardly any days apart and I don't get the same bang I should. I still have 2 nice lines to do tonight with 2 X .25's put away for another night so will gladly test it again properly! Always a great sign for me when you've hit it a couple of nights and still have half a gram left from a gram! :-)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on August 19, 2013, 10:01 pm
Bought from CloudSurfer and it blew me away!  :) A pro.!

I have the same tolerance with MDMA, I don't do it two nights in a row anymore because I find I'm chasing the night befores great feeling and don't get it so feel it's a waste.

Since finding the Road I do a lot more coke with a few weeks break from it now and then but the odd time, if it's near me, I'll do 3 - 4 evenings of it which is when the tolerance is high and by the 4th night, even the 3rd, I feel it's wasted on me or just not enjoyed as much as it should be!

Have my eye on HollyMolly all the time for their MDMA. Hopefully they stay around!!!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on August 19, 2013, 10:44 pm
I'm the same with coke myself, I'd rather be with mates in a gaff or on my own which is the opposite of the way coke should make you feel but I like the comfort of not having to be in and out of a toilet and mostly I find it unsociable to be honest!

If the coke is strong and I was on my own, for example, I did .3 of Bungee's recently and it took me the whole night to get through it and that included a few lines to a mate. A couple of weeks before that I did .25 of the same stuff a lot quicker! I try to keep my stash where I can't access it and try to take out .25 for the night. The plan half works!  :)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Chopper on August 20, 2013, 02:47 pm
Ha, ha, how are we all doing on this fine Tuesday (I think ??? ) my finest droogie friends  ;D ?

Studio, MurderF, HitTR, gtg, and everyone jnem, Bruce, did I mention everybody?
I've been quiet lately trying to give my nose (and wallet) a well deserved holiday but it just doesn't work...

And then I found a lovely surprise yesterday at my drop I honestly wasn't expecting (well not as soon)...

A few weeks ago, I was surprisingly lucky enough to be selected by HollyMolly to receive a 1 gram sample of their new Colombian coke. As mentioned by everyone else, their stealth is a work of art. I don't know how they have the time to package orders. I think in total there EIGHT layers from the outside of the packaging to where the coke was hidden buried deep inside. From the outside, it looks like a perfectly legitimate online purchase which millions of people make every day. The coke itself is bright white flaky soft chunks. It was mainly 3 chunks and some loose flakes in the bag due to it being crushed slightly by the vacuum seal but clearly off the brick and not cut or re-rocked. I've now had maybe 3 or 4 small bumps since yesterday and it's sooo smooth. You don't feel a thing when it goes up the nose and the onset and comedown are just as smooth. Although I don't think it's the strongest coke I've had, it's still stronger than a lot on the Road and my estimate (completely unscientific for that it's worth!) is that it's around mid-80%. I know they only deal in bulk orders but I think anyone already considering purchasing one of HM's listings would be pleasantly suprised.

Oh, and not that I am complaining but I think HM really needs to recalibrate their scales before they put themselves out of business; the 1 gram sample weighed over 1.3 grams  ;) !

And, in the interest of trying to help you guys as much as possible (not because I want to  ;) ) I'm working through it as I typing here to get you guys a more thorough review... It's a hard job but somebody has to do it  ;D !

A choppin' and a sniffin' la la......

Kudos to you Studio. I await your international shipping with anticipation.

Started on some lovely devil's dandruff today in work which is a first and really enjoyed it and the whole sneaking around through the day to my little snorting place!

Took what was left home and finished it about an hour ago thankfully but damn I'd kill now for a big white juicy line right now!!! Hopefully one of you Late Nighter's is up to it and if you are, have one for me!!!  :)

Vodka + tonic for me until bed time, have a good one y'all!!!  :)

Yo HitTheRoad - I'm er HittingTheCoke at this very moment  ;D .....
I know exactly what you mean having a sneaky one at work  ;) +1 for today's effort  ;D .

Enjoy Chopper!  :)

I thought it was a very small amount I had left, guessing .2 of a gram and started at about 11AM and it took me till about 8 this evening to finish it!

I was so anxious on the way home to get the next line into me that I nearly pulled into the hard shoulder to do a line and had to give myself a lecture in my mind not to!!!  :)

Thoroughly enjoyed it and glad it's gone but only because I won't end up on it all night tonight with work in the morning  ;D

Mine was some old Budworx stuff, you on the PDS???

That's hilarious! I can just picture it now, parked at the side of the road doing a big fat line  ;D ;D ;D .

Nope, I have some of the legend which is PDS stashed away but I'm currently on HollyMolly's Columbian.
I have to say it's very very nice, but not as strong as PDS. I'm really enjoying it but I'm finding I am going through it quicker than I usually would. I'm also getting a little bit of a blocked nose as well but that could well be the fact I was doing it for about 8 hours straight yesterday then another 5/6 hours again today, ooops  :-[ .

You should have seen me on my way to a festival a while ago stopping off every couple of miles to "treat myself to a line" because I took a corner or roundabout well!!! I stopped at a house to ask for directions and got back into my car and did a big line before heading off again with the woman of the house looking out through the curtains!!! Ha Ha  :) And that's only a small part of the journey! He He  :)
I suffer badly with my sinuses when doing coke no matter how clean it is reported as being! It's a curse!!!

Damn noses! As I'm sure you're aware there are other places you can stick coke with extremely good results  ;) . I've only ever done it twice but the effects were pretty amazing  8) . I'm sure you get the idea :-X ...

Decisions, the congestion is gone and I can now breath again. So, do I want another fat line or sleep? Line or sleep? Line or sleep?

Doh...

I know what you mean about the other method and gotta try it one day! Everyone loves the process of chopping and snorting a line with all the different tools and methods!

The congestion is a killer especially when you want to get a line in  ::) Was on my way to a friends to do more coke and wanted to get another line in for the road but was blocked up badly so to get around that, I boiled the kettle and made up a hot water bottle and put it over my face (it has a cloth cover so not to burn) and after a minute or two I was unblocked and hoovered up a line and went on my merry way!!!  :)

Another one is cover your head with a jumper and breath in and out to warm up the area surrounding your nose. Worked for me!

I sound like a right junkie but these are the things ya gotta do from time to time!!!  ;D

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: CallmeBruce on August 22, 2013, 11:48 pm

Yeah I have the same trouble. As I mentioned in an earlier thread, using a hay-fever nose spray before your first line, and then lots of saline nose spray after does wonders. Not sure if supressing your bodies natural alergic reaction to toxic chemicals is sensible, but then again, is doing drugs sensible?

Hey everyone. wishing you all a great, powdery weekend.
I myself am nicely stocked but....... no plans  :-\
Do I have your permission to do rails at home, on my own, for no particular reason?
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: phunky on August 23, 2013, 09:12 am
Do the saline packets cause anyone else's nose to get majorly stuffed up, to the point of uncomfortable pressure, shortly after using them?

I noticed the saline spray bottles only have sodium chloride, but the netty pot packets have sodium chloride & sodium bicarbonate.  With the bottles it does not happen but they're bloody expensive compared to netty pot packets.  I know it's important to use sterilized stuff unless you want the brain eating amoebas... can I just boil up some salt water and keep it in a jug in the fridge?
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on August 23, 2013, 09:34 pm
Not mad on the bottles. I feel the neti pot gives a full clean out getting right in there.

Can't wait to wash it out but the funny thing is, I keep going back for more even though it's not great stuff, doh!  ::)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: bluedev1 on August 25, 2013, 08:58 am
heya
got some "ultra clean cocaine" from a vendor, wondering about it though.   have i just never had coke this clean before?  it came as all powder, extremely very soft and fine, no pebbles whatsoever.  kind of sticks to itself but remains very soft.  it does not seem to absorb moisture when left out, nor does it dry up at all into crunchier stuff when put under a heat lamp - it just stays really soft.   it has pretty much no smell except going up the nose it kind of smells like faint overcooked "something", not sure how to describe it.  nothing like anything ive smelt before, no hint of acetone or anything like that.  put some on the tip of the tongue and gets it numb after about 4 minutes. 
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Hornswaggled on August 25, 2013, 08:55 pm
Quote from: bluedev1 on August 25, 2013, 08:58 am
heya
got some "ultra clean cocaine" from a vendor, wondering about it though.   have i just never had coke this clean before?  it came as all powder, extremely very soft and fine, no pebbles whatsoever.  kind of sticks to itself but remains very soft.  it does not seem to absorb moisture when left out, nor does it dry up at all into crunchier stuff when put under a heat lamp - it just stays really soft.   it has pretty much no smell except going up the nose it kind of smells like faint overcooked "something", not sure how to describe it.  nothing like anything ive smelt before, no hint of acetone or anything like that.  put some on the tip of the tongue and gets it numb after about 4 minutes.

Put some up your nose. See what happens.

I'm assuming this is from a reputable vendor?
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

Quote from: HitTheRoad on August 21, 2013, 08:14 pm
God damn cocaine!

Started on some lovely devil's dandruff today in work which is a first and really enjoyed it and the whole sneaking around through the day to my little snorting place!

Took what was left home and finished it about an hour ago thankfully but damn I'd kill now for a big white juicy line right now!!! Hopefully one of you Late Nighter's is up to it and if you are, have one for me!!!  :)

Vodka + tonic for me until bed time, have a good one y'all!!!  :)

Yo HitTheRoad - I'm er HittingTheCoke at this very moment  ;D .....
I know exactly what you mean having a sneaky one at work  ;) +1 for today's effort  ;D .

Enjoy Chopper!  :)

I thought it was a very small amount I had left, guessing .2 of a gram and started at about 11AM and it took me till about 8 this evening to finish it!

I was so anxious on the way home to get the next line into me that I nearly pulled into the hard shoulder to do a line and had to give myself a lecture in my mind not to!!!  :)

Thoroughly enjoyed it and glad it's gone but only because I won't end up on it all night tonight with work in the morning  ;D

Mine was some old Budworx stuff, you on the PDS???

That's hilarious! I can just picture it now, parked at the side of the road doing a big fat line  ;D ;D ;D .

Nope, I have some of the legend which is PDS stashed away but I'm currently on HollyMolly's Columbian.
I have to say it's very very nice, but not as strong as PDS. I'm really enjoying it but I'm finding I am going through it quicker than I usually would. I'm also getting a little bit of a blocked nose as well but that could well be the fact I was doing it for about 8 hours straight yesterday then another 5/6 hours again today, ooops  :-[ .

You should have seen me on my way to a festival a while ago stopping off every couple of miles to "treat myself to a line" because I took a corner or roundabout well!!! I stopped at a house to ask for directions and got back into my car and did a big line before heading off again with the woman of the house looking out through the curtains!!! Ha Ha  :) And that's only a small part of the journey! He He  :)
I suffer badly with my sinuses when doing coke no matter how clean it is reported as being! It's a curse!!!

I hope you had a nice trail of white powder down your nose when you knocked on her door  ;D . Sounds like a fun journey; glad to hear you made it there OK though, LOL...

Damn noses! As I'm sure you're aware there are other places you can stick coke with extremely good results  ;) . I've only ever done it twice but the effects were pretty amazing  8) . I'm sure you get the idea :-X ...

Decisions, the congestion is gone and I can now breath again. So, do I want another fat line or sleep? Line or sleep? Line or sleep?

Doh...

She probably thought "fucking weirdo" as I left her front door with my wired up head  :)

I know what you mean about the other method and gotta try it one day!

Can someone tell me what method they're talking about?

yeah, please explain LOL

Sheesh. It's some kind of mystery, cos I've asked twice, and you are as bemused as me, and you supply the stuff!!
I'm using my imagination now and all I can think is: putting it on your dick would be a waste of time unless you were a major loose cannon getting lucky and wanted some staying power, but it wouldn't get you high. Plugging.. I dunno.. Thats usually to make drugs milder but longer lasing (like mdma) isnt it? What else is there? You ain't gonna rub it in your eyes lol (reminds me of people who misunderstood the term "eyeballing" with regard to measuring doses). I'd love to know how to get a better buzz from coke without basing/smoking crack, or injecting. I'm not sure there is anything else though?
Maybe I didn't pick up on the subtly of the phase : there are other places to "stick" coke?? Do they mean IV?
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: murderface2012 on August 26, 2013, 02:59 am

well,
actually.. ;)
the scientist that first isolated the active alkaloid within the coca leaf during the 18th century fought nail and tooth to convince the scientific community of it's awesome properties, only to be scoffed at.. until again, in front of everyone important, he took a vial of liquid cocaine, flooded his eye, and proceeded to stick a fairly large needle into his eye and remove it with no discomfort!! and wham bam.. cocaine was born!!
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: bluedev1 on August 26, 2013, 05:08 am
Quote from: Hornswaggled on August 25, 2013, 08:55 pm
Quote from: bluedev1 on August 25, 2013, 08:58 am
heya
got some "ultra clean cocaine" from a vendor, wondering about it though.   have i just never had coke this clean before?  it came as all powder, extremely very soft and fine, no pebbles whatsoever.  kind of sticks to itself but remains very soft.  it does not seem to absorb moisture when left out, nor does it dry up at all into crunchier stuff when put under a heat lamp - it just stays really soft.   it has pretty much no smell except going up the nose it kind of smells like faint overcooked "something", not sure how to describe it.  nothing like anything ive smelt before, no hint of acetone or anything like that.  put some on the tip of the tongue and gets it numb after about 4 minutes.

Put some up your nose. See what happens.

I'm assuming this is from a reputable vendor?

Yeah.  If I can't figure out the answers to my questions I guess I will eventually start polling here and seeing who has gotten the stuff from the same vendor recently and if it is the same as what I got.  I'm not naming them yet because I don't want to start a rumor.  It was my first order from them though so I'm always expecting the shadier vendors to try and pull one on the first order to see if they can keep sending you their "dumbass" batch and milk you for your money.

It has some kind of effect but not the motivated/talkative energy I'm used to.  It makes me feel good, but for how numbing it is, that feeling is barely noticeable.   Plus the unseen-before qualities of it make me suspicious of it.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: holamigo on August 29, 2013, 09:08 pm
Well sticking it up my butt hasn't done much for me!

Having said that, I'm not convinced there is actually that much C in the 5gr that I just bought anyway :(

Generally speaking, as much as I can't stop doing the stuff, I never really get this euphoria that people talk of! I do love it dribbling down my throat though, but this stuff tastes and smells a bit funny and doesn't give that nice dribble :(

It's missing that sharpness and almost smells like there's a slight spicy element to it. It's also much more fluffy and flour-like than I would expect. Hmmm.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Chopper on August 29, 2013, 09:21 pm
Quote from: holamigo on August 29, 2013, 09:08 pm
Well sticking it up my butt hasn't done much for me!

Having said that, I'm not convinced there is actually that much C in the 5gr that I just bought anyway :(

Generally speaking, as much as I can't stop doing the stuff, I never really get this euphoria that people talk of! I do love it dribbling down my throat though, but this stuff tastes and smells a bit funny and doesn't give that nice dribble :(

It's missing that sharpness and almost smells like there's a slight spicy element to it. It's also much more fluffy and flour-like than I would expect. Hmmm.

Do you mind sharing who you bought it from  :( ?

Hit refresh a 1000 times a second on Friday after 5PM EST and grab yourself a gram of PDS and I'm positive it'll be good which ever way you choose to administer it! If you don't love it, it may be that coke is just not for you.

I've bought from 5 different people in the last month (3 on SR, 2 in real life) so have a fair idea for comparison, and have a good amount of prior experience of C anyway.

Yo Big O - you know what it's like once you have a line or three and you can't stop going on and on.... and on and on and on....  :P

Your own mind will trick you into convincing yourself you are having another line no matter how much you try to tell yourself it was your last one, it's a curse!!!

Talkin to a friend at the weekend and he would have a gram before turning on the shower, another gram before actually having the shower and another to get dressed and wouldn't even move out of his house. He installed brand new sofa's, a TV,and a cooker oven he never even used  he was in such a bad place with it! He'd sell 8 grams and do 20 with his boss knocking down his door to find him while he was locked away with coke everywhere.He's well out of it now but thought I'd throw that story in showing the high end scale of hopping off blow!
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Chopper on August 30, 2013, 02:09 am
Studio you are THE fucking man and PDS IS THE FUCKING SHIT!

Why? Last night I'd had a break from coke for a few days and decided it was time for a line or two. Had some from another vendor with 'claimed' ultra high purity percentages (supposedly higher than PDS!). I had a big bump, felt a little bit but not much, had another bigger bump, felt a little more and so on till I had just under 0.5g. By the end of it, I was tired and had a headache. I didn't even want to finish the small amount I had left! So I took some pain killers and went to bed. I just put it down to tolerance.

Tonight, I had a very small bump of PDS and felt amazing euphoria within minutes! Had another very bump or 3 and I'm mashed! I've probably gone thought less than half the amount of PDS and have way more pleasure, suppressed appetite, euphoria etc. etc.

So, it wasn't tolerance which fucked it all up last night, it was shit coke!

I know everyone keeps banging on about PDS but it is seriously THE BEST COKE I've bought off SR, if not the best coke I've have had (and definitely the best I've from the USA).

I think Studio charges $148 (maybe?) per gram but it's a lot more pleasurable and lasts 2/3 times longer than coke from a lot if other vendors so you can't just compare price per gram between vendors. If a $100 gram from another vendor lasts one night but the $148 gram of PDS lasts 2 nights how is the other vendor any cheaper???

And on top of all that, he's a fucking fantastic trustworthy guy to speak to and deal with!

Blah, blah, chop, sniff, blah... Hmm, maybe just one more bump...

I had a friends B'day Sat night, had around 3 hours sleep before i had a family gathering on the Sunday.

After some magic disco powder was consumed....i was back on top of the world....again. : )
Took my sister to the car who hasn't had charlie in a long time....it was her birthday a few days earlier also, she had 2 small lines and was quite the conversationalist during the night. :)

Much love my Late Show amigo's....i will now be railing a line in everyone's honor.....especially for one, high ranking, much loved, and very special individual.

ahh yeah, that is great to hear !! i am glad to hear that others are enjoying the product. 2 small lines should put you right up there in the clouds, (ahhhhh)

Howdy Danb15 !

I hate looking at pics of any kind of coke because it makes my mouth water and gets my mind going thinking about the great stuff and I wanna have a small break for a while!  :)

@ Chopper,

The weekend went great! The MDMA/MDA capsules I made were maybe a small bit too strong at between 190mg-200mg with a splash of MDA but holy moly they were nice!!!  :) Bliss with a bump of ket on the comedown which I'm not used to but done in small doses is a perfect comedown tool after MDMA  ;) A bit of sleep and beer and coke for the rest of the day. All in all I partied for 5 nights which is a lot, two of which were quite and that's why I'm takin a break.

Hope y'all havin' a good start to the weekend, enjoy folks!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on September 07, 2013, 03:20 am
How's the night going everyone? I'd imagine some people are knee deep in lines, some are just figuring out what to do with their lines, while others are trying to get some sleep and not think about lines.

You all keep this thread what it is today and that's awesome. Keep it up, and Studio - it's awesome to see someone take the SilkRoad to heart and spread the love. From online poster to needed vendor, you've made leaps and bounds. Good job my fellow forum friend.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: tiger1157 on September 07, 2013, 05:49 am
I haven't done any cola in 3 months, and I've had a super hectic last month of work, so I finally decided to let loose and enjoy myself!  Picked up some cola locally (actually really good stuff!) and am having a blast on it.  To be honest, it's the first time I've done cola solo, and it's actually a much better experience than I thought.  Usually I like cola in social settings like parties and bars, but I'm finding a shitload of good music and just enjoying this nice night.

Marlon I've gotta agree with you, it's great seeing a vendor (such as Studio54) that has a great forum presence and friendly demeanor.  Although I've never dealt with S54 in the past, just the fact that he seems to be an honest, nice person would make me want to do business.   Oh, and I forgot to mention all the bomb reviews that have been coming in for quite some time. 

Next time I buy some cola from the road it's going to be from you Studio!  Cheers everyone!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: onionologist on September 11, 2013, 08:43 pm
Quote from: Chopper on September 11, 2013, 04:42 pm
Here is a HUGE HELLO to my fellow late nighters  ;D !
I've been offline for the last week or so it's great to back catching up.

So, what did I miss in the last week??
Chop, chop, chop'n...

CHOP CHOPPA! Whassssuuuuppp homie!?!?!? How are you my man?!? Well I hope!?!?
I think it's been a week of decisions, intense conversations, people calling out our beloved Studio and his PDS. Drama bro...Drama! Bunch of BULLSHIT. It was a little less than a year ago I stumbled upon the road...and a month or so after I got on the forums. Loved it...lots of good people...lots of good product. It seems it wig-wags back from good to bad to worse to better to awful to tolerable...(you get my gist).
I've personally decided to stop purchasing goods from SR...I had some good times, some bad times, and some mediocre times. Get out while the getting is good is my motto...as well as too much of a good thing is not a good thing!!! I will take with me some good conversations I had with many good people...and although I won't be purchasing and consuming as I was, I will still be around this thread (if any) because there are too many cool cats here I simply can't imagine not having conversations with!

Hope you've got some nummy nums to chop up and enjoy!! I am waiting on my personal source, funding, etc, before I can enjoy my own nom noms! hehe

All's well that ends well brotha...

Another layer from the onion-

-O-

Nice update, thanks!
Haha, so it's been quite an eventful week then. I feel like I need a few days just try and go through all the unread posts on here. I need more time...



Oh, and I nearly forgot, I went to check my drop today for the first time in a while. I've not been checking it as I wasn't expecting anything but surprisingly found a letter  ??? . Looked at the shipping country, was confused. What's this I thought? Read the customs declaration, more confused. Opened it up, dug through some stealth and found a MBB. Had no knife so took ages to get it open, finally got it ripped apart and found another MBB  >:( . Arghhhh!!!! F'ing MBB's  :P ! WTF! Finally, got in and found a vacuum sealed bag of rather tasty looking (and smelling  :) ) M-39 weed from Bang4Bucks I'd completely forgotten about! Yeah, can't wait  ;D .....

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Chopper on September 12, 2013, 12:33 pm
Quote from: HitTheRoad on September 12, 2013, 03:48 am
Quote from: Chopper on September 12, 2013, 01:39 am
Well, just wasted nearly an hour of my life reading complete crap  >:( >:( >:( !
I've just finished reading the SR Cocaine Vendors review thread and it was about 7/8 pages of people bitching at each other and talking shit... I wish I hadn't of bothered... Where the hell does SR find these people FFS!

Maybe I should do something more productive; like another line.

Know what ya mean! Truth is, I added to it but felt I had to stick up for a seller I thought provided a quality service who was being slammed but I do think the bitchin should be kept on the seellers profile if a buyer has a problem and the coke thread should be kept to reports on quality/experience and not arguments between seller/buyer!

I always want to post something when I see this sort of thing bu I try to keep out of it.

The problem is you can try and reason with some people as much as you want but they will never listen. If they decide to start a personal vendetta against a vendor, no matter what you say, they will continue to drag as many people in to it as possible. Any potential buyers should hopefully realize that 1 complaint against hundreds of positive reviews is not worth the consideration.

The problem is when everyone loves a product, the moment one person complains, everyone else starts as well and it all goes down hill from there. If people just ignore him, hopefully it will go away...

Title: Good Times- Blowin' Lines!
Post by: onionologist on September 12, 2013, 05:14 pm
This is the peoples talk show guys...

Marlon started this shit for us to gather with like-minds, and fun-times. I think we should make a rule to keep any negative bullshit, bad karma action, etc, out of this thread and stick to only good times while blowin' lines.

Good times, blowin' lines...

Good times....blowin' Lines....

Say it with me.... "GOOD TIMES.....BLOWING LINES!" Yes! Now repeat it to yourself...type it back in response...let's keep this vibe positive, mature, respectful, and enjoyable. We have a network of people here whom stick to this thread and post consistently, we need to keep it that way. Our inner circle must not be broken by drugs, thugs, or drama.

Leave the HUMAN, in Humanity people.

Much respect from y'alls fav. onion.

GOOD TIMES BLOWIN' LINES!

-o-

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on September 13, 2013, 03:32 am
Hey HTR....yeah i enjoyed a lovely mid-week hoot....soon as it reached midday, out came the vial..tap tap tap.....and chop, rack and rail. : )

Had the last of the disco magic last night. So now it's time to re-establish the temples upper and inner interiors....and get the dance floor ready for the next time, for their will be candy in my heels he he.

Hell yeah Chopper...i got a new razor blade and everything....must say, my snorter is looking very choked full of cola....should really clean that thing out.

Do you guys ever keep all the bags that your cola comes in? When i receive mine, i throw it into glass vials straight away, and leave the bags stacked at the bottom of my pandora's box. Yesterday, i pulled these bags out, there weren't many, but i managed another 3 beautiful lines, that on top of the last rock i chopped was fantastic.

Awesome Onion, your layers are golden. : )

 "For my late night show cocaine cowboy motherfuckers, i know your all now with me....for we are all here, having good times....and blowin mad lines, for we are always busy.....yeah its cola in, and then its cola out, and good things in between.....oh you better be ready my late night show homies....for next weeks late show scene...

Hell no it aint just gonna be another dream, like a wide eyed latino, sucking you like ice cream...hell no uh uh, johnny's just saying, wouldn't it be better if you were just sailing.....

"Welcome Late Show audience....may i please have your attention........for i just have something to say.....and yeah i just wanna mention....for there aint nothing better than the LNS crew railing this disco potion....so to all my late night show audience peeps lets's get this train in motion....for the wheels are turning and the engines warmed up for yeah we leaving for Tranzcentral.....it's already 3am, you know what to do, get your ticket and lets get mental...Studio, Onion and Murder to, those late show motherfuckers will look after you....along with the man, with many many layers, Onionologist and our homie Hit the Road, you know their fucking players.....as we all are, and as we all know....oh yeah....its the fucking late show...so what the fuck you gonna do? Don't be cheeky boy, for MurderFace will get you! It doesnt matter who you are, for you simply can't get with this...for we're so outer space right now motherfuckers, i'm pretty sure you just went by and missed us. So one last shout, to my Late Night homies.......and let's be thankful to our creator.....he deserves the biggest shout of all...for he simply just aint a spectator.....Marlon Brando....for all you know, he opened up.....this late night studio....since then it's been sky high ratings.....HBO be ringing-"Oh please Marlon, can we please have you on our station?" "Oh hell no bitch.....didn't you know this is a private channel...i'm pretty sure your regular audience just wouldn't be able to handle.....but hey while i got you on the line, we could do with another girl, for need another racker and railer to hand out those white pearls....."GOOD TIMES BLOWIN LINES GOOD TIMES BLOWIN LINES......still feeling it from yesterday my LNS homies......could have really gone off on a tangent there lol...

Much love to you guys. Stay safe, stay strong, chin's up, and shoulders back....and heads down.....UP....and back down again....everything rosy? : ))

I realized when you read this you dont have the tune on my head, so it might look jumbled, but with the tune it works..: )





Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on September 13, 2013, 06:40 pm
Quote from: jnemonic on September 13, 2013, 03:32 am
Hey HTR....yeah i enjoyed a lovely mid-week hoot....soon as it reached midday, out came the vial..tap tap tap.....and chop, rack and rail. : )

Had the last of the disco magic last night. So now it's time to re-establish the temples upper and inner interiors....and get the dance floor ready for the next time, for their will be candy in my heels he he.

Hell yeah Chopper...i got a new razor blade and everything....must say, my snorter is looking very choked full of cola....should really clean that thing out.

Do you guys ever keep all the bags that your cola comes in? When i receive mine, i throw it into glass vials straight away, and leave the bags stacked at the bottom of my pandora's box. Yesterday, i pulled these bags out, there weren't many, but i managed another 3 beautiful lines, that on top of the last rock i chopped was fantastic.

Awesome Onion, your layers are golden. : )
