Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Chopper on September 14, 2013, 12:34 am
Quote from: onionologist on September 12, 2013, 05:14 pm
This is the peoples talk show guys...

Marlon started this shit for us to gather with like-minds, and fun-times. I think we should make a rule to keep any negative bullshit, bad karma action, etc, out of this thread and stick to only good times while blowin' lines.

Good times, blowin' lines...

Good times....blowin' Lines....

Say it with me.... "GOOD TIMES.....BLOWING LINES!" Yes! Now repeat it to yourself...type it back in response...let's keep this vibe positive, mature, respectful, and enjoyable. We have a network of people here whom stick to this thread and post consistently, we need to keep it that way. Our inner circle must not be broken by drugs, thugs, or drama.

Leave the HUMAN, in Humanity people.

Much respect from y'alls fav. onion.

GOOD TIMES BLOWIN' LINES!

-o-

^^^ THIS 100%!!

Guys - it's Friday night and time to PARTY ;D!
Love you all, and having a line for each and everyone of you! I hope this is the beginning of a fantastic weekend for you all!

Quote from: HitTheRoad on August 21, 2013, 08:14 pm
God damn cocaine!

Started on some lovely devil's dandruff today in work which is a first and really enjoyed it and the whole sneaking around through the day to my little snorting place!

Took what was left home and finished it about an hour ago thankfully but damn I'd kill now for a big white juicy line right now!!! Hopefully one of you Late Nighter's is up to it and if you are, have one for me!!!  :)

Vodka + tonic for me until bed time, have a good one y'all!!!  :)

Yo HitTheRoad - I'm er HittingTheCoke at this very moment  ;D .....
I know exactly what you mean having a sneaky one at work  ;) +1 for today's effort  ;D .

Enjoy Chopper!  :)

I thought it was a very small amount I had left, guessing .2 of a gram and started at about 11AM and it took me till about 8 this evening to finish it!

I was so anxious on the way home to get the next line into me that I nearly pulled into the hard shoulder to do a line and had to give myself a lecture in my mind not to!!!  :)

Thoroughly enjoyed it and glad it's gone but only because I won't end up on it all night tonight with work in the morning  ;D

Mine was some old Budworx stuff, you on the PDS???

That's hilarious! I can just picture it now, parked at the side of the road doing a big fat line  ;D ;D ;D .

Nope, I have some of the legend which is PDS stashed away but I'm currently on HollyMolly's Columbian.
I have to say it's very very nice, but not as strong as PDS. I'm really enjoying it but I'm finding I am going through it quicker than I usually would. I'm also getting a little bit of a blocked nose as well but that could well be the fact I was doing it for about 8 hours straight yesterday then another 5/6 hours again today, ooops  :-[ .

You should have seen me on my way to a festival a while ago stopping off every couple of miles to "treat myself to a line" because I took a corner or roundabout well!!! I stopped at a house to ask for directions and got back into my car and did a big line before heading off again with the woman of the house looking out through the curtains!!! Ha Ha  :) And that's only a small part of the journey! He He  :)
I suffer badly with my sinuses when doing coke no matter how clean it is reported as being! It's a curse!!!

Damn noses! As I'm sure you're aware there are other places you can stick coke with extremely good results  ;) . I've only ever done it twice but the effects were pretty amazing  8) . I'm sure you get the idea :-X ...


Dare I ask? I'm fine with plugging (but for cocaine?). I'll never touch a vein though, and I'd rather not get into smoking it since I'd be freebasing before I knew it - I'm a sucker for addiction but I value pulling my weight in the real world.

Yes, I was referring to plugging, not the most pleasant thing to do but it's worth it as the effects are pretty damn good!
I've never injected anything and I don't plan on ever doing so...

@chopper..

check listing for the new picture that we have upload.

And pm us on the market your details..

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on September 19, 2013, 11:28 am
Quote from: onionologist on September 18, 2013, 04:43 pm

@Late Night Show Crew- Peace be with you all. Hope everything is good in your worlds. Life is good. Don't let stupid shit get you down. Peace, Love and Respect to all you peeps.

Ah Onion, i had one of those days when stupid shit nearly got me down, but pulled through well.

Now yesterday, i was going through my pandoras box, and although my cola vials were well and truly empty, and the Dyson cleaned, i looked at my main funnel, which slides into either one of my other three long and very narrow funnels which i use to fill caps and vials....der. : ))

There was always a few times when your throwing a gram or two of charlie through your funnel and you would get the odd rock or two stuck in there.
My stuff is always air tight when not in use, and i looked at my funnels...and thought-"I wonder if there might be any charlie in there...?"

Well fuck me twice, i managed to rack up 2 lovely banana boats........i was like-"La la la!"


"Hope your all well LNS crew, audience, sponsors and special guests!"

"On this weeks show, we welcome the creator, the visionary, the one and only Late Night Show talk host................Marlon Brando!"

 "That's right you Late Night Show mother fuckers, you know where it's at.....aiiiiight!" Marlon will soon be giving a review on the you know what, and the you know where!"

'THUNDEROUS APPLAUSE FROM CROWD!!!!'

"Here come those banana boats"


"YOU KNOW, THIS BOOGIE IS FOR REAL! SO MUCH CANDY IN MY HEELS YEAH! (Jamiroquai)

Oh, new, but really not so new cocaine track which i just love, pulled it out the other day, looked at my old cd collection, and played this other JK track...

Traveling Without Moving.

I love this track, rail 2 nice, perfectly straight and even lines, that's right, make it fucking special...and play this track.

Oh don't you just love finding those little unexpected bonuses  ;) .  I find the effects are always so much better and more enjoyable than if it was all purchased and planned for.

Man, I'm flying HIGH! I had a little bag with what would probably normally last me a day of small bumps, emptied too out and thought F*#K IT! I sniffed the lot in one go. Crap, it was intense but started leveling off 10 minutes later so I just completely emptied the bag and finished it.  Wow.........  ;D ;D ;D ;D That was about 30 mins ago and I'm buzzing like crazy.. Chopp'in  ;D

@Late Night Show Crew- Peace be with you all. Hope everything is good in your worlds. Life is good. Don't let stupid shit get you down. Peace, Love and Respect to all you peeps.

There was always a few times when your throwing a gram or two of charlie through your funnel and you would get the odd rock or two stuck in there.
My stuff is always air tight when not in use, and i looked at my funnels...and thought-"I wonder if there might be any charlie in there...?"

Well fuck me twice, i managed to rack up 2 lovely banana boats........i was like-"La la la!"


This made me laugh sitting here on my couch!

I know that feeling looking and hoping for a bag left somewhere you forgot about (NEVER happens to me because I keep such a tight ship for fear of evidence lying around) and scraping straws and blades and plates and chopping boards etc. etc. etc.

I remember doing it in my early days smoking hash, scraping pipes and using buts of other joints etc. etc. etc.

Ah Onion, i had one of those days when stupid shit nearly got me down, but pulled through well.

Now yesterday, i was going through my pandoras box, and although my cola vials were well and truly empty, and the Dyson cleaned, i looked at my main funnel, which slides into either one of my other three long and very narrow funnels which i use to fill caps and vials....der. : ))

There was always a few times when your throwing a gram or two of charlie through your funnel and you would get the odd rock or two stuck in there.
My stuff is always air tight when not in use, and i looked at my funnels...and thought-"I wonder if there might be any charlie in there...?"

Well fuck me twice, i managed to rack up 2 lovely banana boats........i was like-"La la la!"


"Hope your all well LNS crew, audience, sponsors and special guests!"

"On this weeks show, we welcome the creator, the visionary, the one and only Late Night Show talk host................Marlon Brando!"

 "That's right you Late Night Show mother fuckers, you know where it's at.....aiiiiight!" Marlon will soon be giving a review on the you know what, and the you know where!"

"Here come those banana boats"


"YOU KNOW, THIS BOOGIE IS FOR REAL! SO MUCH CANDY IN MY HEELS YEAH! (Jamiroquai)

Traveling Without Moving.

I love this track, rail 2 nice, perfectly straight and even lines, that's right, make it fucking special...and play this track.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on September 20, 2013, 06:57 pm
Just a tidbit of thought for the reviewers out there. I know I like to write reviews while on the product being tested but I think as a group or as a reviewer we should put a disclaimer that we are writing while high. I know there a lot of a good testers out there that give great in depth reports and after reports which I think should be done as to give the potential buyer more of an idea of the product.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: phunky on September 20, 2013, 08:23 pm
Bash me all you want.  I tested what I got, provided proof that I at least have the tests, there is no doubt that I in fact bought the product I said I did, beyond that I'm not sure what else I could really provide.

Meanwhile, you're content with labelling me a scammer yet do not even have a single shred of evidence to back that up other than your own projections about SR and the fact that some buyers on SR are scammers.

Need I remind you Rails actually offered me free product as a resolution and I turned it down ?  What kind of scammer would do that?    The fact of the matter is what I got was cut with meth and this was my issue, why the fuck would I want more product cut with meth?   

Maybe I'm expecting too much intelligence from some of you folks, or maybe the thought that what I've said is true absolutely INFURIATES you and you simply refuse to believe it because that would mean you've been played for a fool for a long, long time by some of these vendors.  I can understand.  Have some self-compassion, learn, forgive, move on.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

No, phunky had no such control kit. Here's the latest review of SR vendors coke, of course i only posted Studio's here...and guess what?

Quote from: redalloverthelandguyhere on September 20, 2013, 11:02 pm
A few EZ test results for the Road.

Symboisis, EZ test active cut detected. Coke purity test put it at maybe 60% - 70%. Never used that one and would sooner bin a gram than snort some active cuts. Got a 40% refund but I think, with my stats, it should have been 100% and no question. In future I'd go to resolution and if I got a refund stat it would have been 2% for the gram of coke. EZ test does not lie. Symboisis was over-flamboyant with his description, but thats water under the bridge and maybe the new batch is better. Feedback is hardly flattering though, on the discussion page I mean.

Dr Col, EZ test pass, not the greatest coke ever but looks like 80%.

Studio54 EZ test passes for no active cuts and as high a reading as I see for cocaine. Excellent yayo indeed and highly reccomended, especially if your American!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on September 23, 2013, 08:37 pm
@ CallmeBruce,

Have to agree with holding off for tolerance and enjoyment reasons!

For me, I feel I'm wasting good coke if I do it a few nights in a row because I just don't feel I get the same buzz as the first night. If only I could control my self control I'd be laughing!!!  :)

Enjoyed two nights of it over the w'end and another package arrived today which I had to try but can't judge it well due to tolerance but I'm sure it will be nicer once I take a small break!

Anyway, outside of that, weather was good and had a nice weekend! Hope all you fellow LNTS folk had a good one too!!!  :)
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on September 23, 2013, 09:12 pm
So I was curious as to what you listeners like to do as preventive measures (if any) while doing your snow white. This could be anything from taking a multi-vitamin to having a nasal wash. I'd like to hear what the others like to do to take caution and enjoy themselves without harm. If you have any science or pseudo-science might as well throw that in as well, I'm all ears.

Myself, I take multi-vitamins with a few other supplements daily so I don't have any ones that I specifically take to help out but I feel that this eases the wear and tear on the body. I also have a nasal wash, or a bottle you fill with water the solution and spray up your nose. It's great for cleaning out your nose during/after a night but once your nose is clogged isn't that much of a help.


Thoughts/ideas/suggestions. Let's get discussing.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on September 23, 2013, 09:35 pm
I use multi vitamins on a coke night too, Solgar VM-75 I think. A good brand!

I lately started using a neti-pot with boiled water that's cooled down until slightly warm with Himalayan neti-pot salt and find it does a better job than a spray as it gets right in and through your nasal system to clear it out before bed after coking it up.

A swim in the sea is great for me too and that really clears your nasal system out properly!!!

I always have had a healthy diet and after a coke binge I'll take that even more seriously and drill myself full of goodness.

As I get a bit older I think it is very important to look after myself with my lifestyle without sounding like a nerdy health freak!!! Ha Ha  :)
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on September 23, 2013, 10:36 pm
I dont do vitamins....but its just self induced breaks and eating well, also living so fucking far away like i do, i dont or rather dont have the temptation like you guys have over there...because we dont have a quality coke supply over here, too many people just jump on everything, and its just not worth it.

If i could get good cola domestically, then it would be different i'm sure.

But with cocaine...i have to be careful...it really has its time and place for me. : )

Does anyone have the tendency to be a little fussy on cocaine?

People who walk slow or procrastinate can really make it feel as though TIME is standing still for me. 

Whilst driving, if i'm high, and someone drives like an idiot, all over the road, i'm like-"What fucking drugs are you on....damn."

I was out a couple of weeks ago, surrounded by people, and there was this one guy, staring at everyone, he couldn't sit still, kept craning that fucking neck of his...he was leering at the girls, and then i caught him looking at me when i was looking at something else....i said to myself-"I bet that fucker is staring at me, sure enough, his eyes were locked on....unbelievable....so, i spoke up and drilled this mother fucker....

"Hey...." I said.

He turns around, and looks at me, he said 'Excuse me?"

I said-"Would you like my camera?"

He just stares at me.....i said again-"Would you like my camera?"

Everyone is staring now....

Still he just stares....

"Well here, i pull my camera out..."Now how about you take that, take some pictures of everyone here, and then you can stop twisting and turning in your seat without having the need to stare at everyone?"

This guy turned round, head down and didn't fucking move or stare at anyone from then on.

I love my cola. : ))
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

Coke is an addictive drug let me tell ya haha, i got a nice few chunks of Full Escrow Friday morning and still hoovering this stuff up i need to check into rehab or something.... Anyone else go on long binges when they got a decent stash? have a good one fellas
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: HitTheRoad on September 24, 2013, 12:19 am

Danb,

I was just about to come in here to ask my fellow LNTS friends if they have any good advice on giving it up (for a while at least!). I've been on it Friday, Saturday into Sunday morning and with the arrival of a new order today I had to tuck in despite the battle in my mind saying don't! The coke is more powerful than me at the moment but I will beat it (for a while), trust me!!! Ha Ha  :)

I have work in 5.5 hours and even after taking a valium, I've gone for another line and cracked open a couple of beers!

I really need a break, just for a few weeks.

My plan that usually kind of works is to stash it where I can't access it while I'm at home. If you have it at home it will call you and beat you in mind battles!!! Ha Ha  :)

Hopefully I get to bed and asleep by 2am! I can sneak off in my job to sleep in my car for half an hour which is a bonus  :)

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on September 24, 2013, 01:12 am
A good system that works for me is to delete TOR and put your local connection #'s away somewhere. You have to make the conscious decision to WANT to be away from SR and buying in general. Once you leave this place for a while you soon start to forget it and it becomes a distant memory (it's also nice because when you come back it's a whole new ball game for you to figure out/explore).

Also this is something you have to want to do, if you don't make any effort you won't see any reward. I tend to just change one addiction to the next, that doesn't have to be one drug to another. It can be anything that eats up time and becomes a habit you can get into. After that you start to want that hobby/habit like it was coke and it makes you happy to finish a book or paint a model train/plane. Really whatever floats your boat.

Cocaine is an amazing drug but it's something we all need to respect and take with pride. It's not something you should be scrounging pennies for or buying small amounts just for a "fix" It's a drug about good times whether that be by yourself once in a while or while partying with friends. It's never something you should be consumed by. If you can't hold off on doing it then it's time to put it down for a bit. If you can be one of the few who can take a bump like they do a morning coffee and be done with it for the day I highly commend you. But it's not something everyone is capable of.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: danb15 on September 24, 2013, 01:26 am

But ye it does need to be respected i have no respect for it since i started, all my buddies telling me to relax on the stuff you will be dead in a year or two, when i go out the weekend i am sure a few of you have been there before where your the one who buys and everyone else is like fly's on shit begging for another whiff, anyways coming from more experienced users like yourself think i should take the advice before i get deeper and respect and enjoy it once in a while...
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread

I'm a fiender so I'll never be able to do the bump the odd time and leave it at that so that's why I gotta completely kick it!

I feel a break on the way so rack up and enjoy one or two or three for me folks and enjoy!

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on September 24, 2013, 03:56 am
Coke can be funny like that, 2-3 weeks can suddenly vanish...

If your busy and out from the house, then your stash will last awhile.

Also if its good, then you dont need much, best you rail a few lines and just leave it alone for a few hours.

I'm normally a little to...hmm how can i say..actually i wont say it....you'll think i'm blowing sunshine up my arse so i wont...but i'm on fire enough without needing cocaine....

Best you don't order an 8-ball like i did recently, i made it last no problem...sold one to a friend for his birthday, and i had the other 2.5.

I cant do cocaine all night, its my before and after drug, never in between.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: jnemonic on September 24, 2013, 04:15 am

So many choices for you....but i bet the quality is still few and far between right?

With good cola, less is more. Sure i've had a day here and there, when i've really had a few more than i needed, but hey, you know what?

We only have one life, we could all fucking die tomorrow. Don't regret anything.....live and live well. No matter what they say...let it go...yeah can be very fucking hard when your charging down a snow capped mountain, fuck yeah it can...dodging banana boats, white fluffy ducks and rocketships...

Just make sure your head is screwed on tight...and know your limits. If you go over, then respect your body and have a little break.

I love you guys, i think if you often, other sides of the world dont mean shit. The energy is there and thats all that matters.

Now all this talk has me wanting a big line...but its simply not there. : ))
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: CallmeBruce on September 24, 2013, 04:22 am
Quote from: Marlon Brando on September 23, 2013, 09:12 pm
So I was curious as to what you listeners like to do as preventive measures (if any) while doing your snow white. This could be anything from taking a multi-vitamin to having a nasal wash. I'd like to hear what the others like to do to take caution and enjoy themselves without harm. If you have any science or pseudo-science might as well throw that in as well, I'm all ears.
Myself, I take multi-vitamins with a few other supplements daily so I don't have any ones that I specifically take to help out but I feel that this eases the wear and tear on the body. I also have a nasal wash, or a bottle you fill with water the solution and spray up your nose. It's great for cleaning out your nose during/after a night but once your nose is clogged isn't that much of a help.
Thoughts/ideas/suggestions. Let's get discussing.

SHNOOZLE......

(Wipes powder from nose)....

What coke? - Jokes. 
To control myself have loaded a bullet, sealed it in an envelope and marked... YOU WILL REGRET WASTING THIS.... on the front.

I'll let you know if it works.

Harm reduction? As I have mentioned in previous posts I have stumbled upon the idea of using an anti-allergy spray before rails and plenty of saline nose spray between sets. I try to keep well hydrated throughout the process and to keep track of how much alcohol I consume throughout the evening. As you know the lady dressed in white can negate the effects of alcohol so you can really damage yourself there. A shower before bed to really rinse it out and vitamins in the morning. Vitamin B (niacin) is my recovery pill. 
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on September 24, 2013, 04:22 am

I just know the time I had Kolbitz there was no smell and it went of the nose so easy, I then went on to type out a rant about who knows what on here and it wasn't even 8:30am. I even drank a cup of coffee after because it felt so good.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: titoprince on September 24, 2013, 02:14 pm
I'm a big fan of yayspray. I tend to take a lot of drugs up my nose, so occasionally I'll make the water soluble stuff into a spray with a bit of purified water, a drop of high proof vodka and a gram or so of whatever I'm using. I do this with both cocaine and ketamine and sometimes the two together. It works especially well with high quality coke and a good mister-type nasal spray bottle. Basically like doing a bump. You can also snort whatever liquid is left at the bottom of the bottle when you're done.

Another plus is that if you make it with very cut coke, a lot of the cuts wont dissolve, so you'll be getting a cleaner experience anyway.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: mctnguy on September 24, 2013, 11:01 pm
Hey cool thread idea, MB. I'm not a regular orderer from SR, but I should be. The blow around these parts is absolute garbage. I do remember MB from when I made my first couple of purchases, from the Teflon Don thread. I was one of the lucky ones I guess, I grabbed a gram off of him and he sent it, but then I had some extra coins left because the price skyrocketed since I bought and I ended up buying a half gram from him and it never arrived. The guy was a great con though, i messaged him a few times before i bought and he seemed like a really cool guy. It really surprised the hell out of me that he ended up scamming people. His coke was OK too, but nothing I would consider super great. It was better than most around here so it was a good treat. The gram last me and my wife from like 15 hours, but it sketched me out, kind of speedy shit.

So I am making another purchase this week and right now I am leaning towards rails. I want to get the best coke I have ever seen. I have been doing blow, mostly cooking up crack, for a long time, like 20 years or so. I considered it a problem for a number of those year like scraping up ever cent I could to get my next "hit". Anyway I have outgrown that thankfully. Now I want to do it from time to time, but when I do it I want to do it right. I could spend 250 bucks here and get an 8 ball that is something like 20-25% pure which is absolute bullshit, that's like paying 750 for 75% pure shit.

I like the road a lot, but damn it feels like a gamble to me now, especially since I got burned once by TD. Every dealer always says they got the best shit. So right now it's a toss up between Rails, and LexQ. There was another vendor named MeGrimlock or something like that, but I see his listings are down. Makes me wonder if he's a scammer. I have seen LexQ around for a long time so he seems legit, but I have read a lot of good things about rails. So I don't know what to do.

Anyway, just did a little puff of garbage and in the chatting mood, thought I would introduce myself. If anyone can help me make the decision of who to buy from, please do so. I am getting something in the next few days.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on September 24, 2013, 11:19 pm
Yah TeflonDon got me as well, it happens. You just need to brush off the dirt and educate others. But onto your question.

These three vendors in no particular order (domestic Canada)

Whiteyford
Rails
LexQ

Have been around a while, have proven themselves worthy by selling quality product and not displaying scamming principles. The choice is yours as to who to pick. I do know WhiteyFord is out of product for the moment and LexQ is backlogged with orders.

So your best bet is Rails. Go into this transaction with the thought of buying quality cocaine that is better than average. DO NOT go into this transaction expecting to be given a blowjob and a sandwich after (don't worry, it could happen) it's with high expectations that I find most buyers become disappointed with the hype. Just keep the excitement under control until you try it and you'll see for yourself what you are working with.


I also recommend trying more than one vendor out and finding out which style of cocaine (everyone likes something different) you enjoy best. The road is your oyster. Now go explore and let us know what you find.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: mctnguy on September 24, 2013, 11:39 pm
Quote from: Marlon Brando on September 24, 2013, 11:19 pm
DO NOT go into this transaction expecting to be given a blowjob and a sandwich after (don't worry, it could happen) it's with high expectations that I find most buyers become disappointed with the hype. Just keep the excitement under control until you try it and you'll see for yourself what you are working with.

This is exactly what I am afraid of. I am super excited. As I said I am a long time crackhead. When I started 20 years ago(I' rocked it exclusively for the first 10 years or so) it all tasted like candy. Something happened though, the taste changed, the effect changed. I started getting paranoid when doing it, super paranoid. I want to blame it on new people supplying my town cutting it with active cuts, and I am hoping that the paranoia is caused by the cuts as well. I have a feeling that no matter how pure the cocaine is I will get paranoid from it. What I do to control it lately is do small blasts. My normal blast, or shot, is .2 of a gram. **Now I will get 2 or 3 out of that. I don't get ringers anymore. Just super paranoia. The bigger the blast the more paranoid I get and it sucks big time. So I am putting good stuff on a pedestal, hoping I can feel a ringer again and no paranoia, or at least not until I'm sketched from doing it all night. With the little blasts I am doing of the crap I get, I think something without active cuts will get me going good.

I am waiting on a cheque to come in and for rails to put listings back up and I will report when I pick up. I have a feeling it won't be in my mailbox before the first.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on September 25, 2013, 12:43 am

This is exactly what I am afraid of. I am super excited. As I said I am a long time crackhead. I started getting paranoid when doing it, super paranoid. I have a feeling that no matter how pure the cocaine is I will get paranoid from it. What I do to control it lately is do small blasts. My normal blast, or shot, is .2 of a gram. **Now I will get 2 or 3 out of that. I don't get ringers anymore. Just super paranoia. The bigger the blast the more paranoid I get and it sucks big time. I am waiting on a cheque to come in and for rails to put listings back up and I will report when I pick up. I have a feeling it won't be in my mailbox before the first.


In my non science backed opinion I would say it's more so your bodies actually change to the drug then it is the actual drug being cut with additives.

I don't know if this is permanent or not but I would say a break is probably best and a reset button on your well being is needed.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: mctnguy on September 25, 2013, 02:09 am
Quote from: Marlon Brando on September 24, 2013, 11:19 pm

In my non science backed opinion I would say it's more so your bodies actually change to the drug then it is the actual drug being cut with additives.

I don't know if this is permanent or not but I would say a break is probably best and a reset button on your well being is needed.

Ya, I got so bad with paranoia when I was in the deepest of my addiction, a time where I was doing an oz+ a week, that I just said fuck it and quit. I could not justify spending so much money to crawl out of my skin like I did. The shit just was not doing it for me any more. The taste was bad, the buzz was bad and it took everything I owned. So I stopped and didn't touch blow for around 4 years. I took my first puff again in April of 2012. The stuff was worse than I remembered. The taste was not there(the taste of crack is one of the most addictive parts of it for me). Instead of being the nice sweet candy taste, it was sour. I didn't get a huge rush and the paranoia came back. I'm don't get near as paranoid as I used to, and I can kind of control it sometimes. When I just do little puffs then it's a lot easier to manage. Honestly after I try from a few more vendors from here I will probably quit. I do enjoy it again now because I can control the paranoia a bit, but it's not worth the money for me. I'm really hoping that I will get more euphoria with a more pure product. Blow around these parts is cut to shit, to the point that I would bet that it is under 20%, maybe even under 10%. I remember talking to folks around here who bought in bigger quantities and they used to brag about "the california comeback cut". I was given a few grams of cut before and I tried rocking it up. A gram of cut would come back to almost a gram of rock. It wasn't as hard as rocked blow, but when mixed with blow, it came back almost 100% and hard. I smoked the rocked up cut and that is where the taste and the speediness comes from. It had all the negative effects I have noticed since the change in blow years ago. I really hope that some purer blow that doesn't have active cuts in it will do it for me.
[/quote]

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: b0lixtrader on September 25, 2013, 06:17 am
You can also easily download David Lee's Handbook of Cocaine.

Very easy home tests you can do too see how pure it is.  Not a lot of coke is needed for each test. 

The water test, the bleach test, the foil test.  If you have a good micro scope you can even probably see what it has been cut with.

In the book it shows how the crystalline flakes look of each different cut looks like.
Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on September 25, 2013, 07:13 am
Quote from: b0lixtrader on September 25, 2013, 06:17 am
You can also easily download David Lee's Handbook of Cocaine.

Very easy home tests you can do too see how pure it is.  Not a lot of coke is needed for each test. 

The water test, the bleach test, the foil test.  If you have a good micro scope you can even probably see what it has been cut with.

In the book it shows how the crystalline flakes look of each different cut looks like.

Awesome read for anyone that was wanting to pick up a book. Gives some good pointers that some of us may not know or practice.

Right on bro.

Every coke user should own one and look through it.  David Lee went above and beyond showing all different types of coke although all of them being AMAZING quality obviously due to the time the book was written.  He shows great pictures of different purity(all high of course) and how fish scale they are.

Great info all through out.

Trust me (actually don't really trust me, I don't want to be blamed) Go with Rails. Their gear is amazing. Top notch quality good vibration cocaine. A sit back and relax cocaine. A cocaine that enhances your sense not over-rides them or takes over. You can think clearly and cleanly on this snow. It's awesome. Mind you I'm on it right now so that's why I could be saying this, but I can attest that I'm pleasantly high as a cocaine flying kite and it looks to be a smooth ride to baseline.

Give it a go, you'll be happy you did. I know I am.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: mctnguy on September 25, 2013, 09:51 pm
Quote from: Marlon Brando on September 25, 2013, 09:36 pm
I stick to sticking the white stuff up my nose. I haven't really had the urge to smoke it. I like my highs to play out. Plus I'd probably REALLY like smoking it...a little too much,

Smart move. Just about everyone who smokes it likes it too much., I want to get a few grams and have it last me a few nights, but I know me and it will be gone the same day I get it, unless I hide it some place I don't have easy access to. That is my plan anyway. There's nothing like the first and second puffs of the day, after that you're just chasing the buzz. That's when it's time to put it away, but it gives me(and a lot of other people) a very intense feeling of "I want another one". I usually rationalize and say "I'll just do one more", but I will say that 10 or 15 times until it's all gone.

Damn I can't wait till i get something good. I am giving up on local guys, everything I do will be from SR from now on. It just sucks that my income is temporarily fixed. I get a government cheque once a month because they are sponsoring me to go to school to upgrade my skills.I have until June then I should be back in the money. It will be a welcome relief after 2 years of a really low income.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: biologicalmadman on September 26, 2013, 10:23 pm
Hahaha @HitTheRoad...always been such a witty jerk off haha but that's why I like u...no homo (sorry man :/) lol But I literally just got my parcel from Rails! Shit is just as bomb as it was said to be...thanx Marlon bc I ordered after reading a suggestion from you on cola reviews thread. It's very similar to S54's PDS in regards to quality and everything besides the smell of it. It's a bit more alkaloid and kind of "earthy" smelling (to me anyway) But this is a good thing in my opinion and past use. It's Class A and it was produced in SA the correct way, no corners were cut and that's why I believe it smells as such and is so insanely high in % w/o any active cuts or adulterants. I love it! Rails and Studio are by far the best on the Road.

This is what I am doing tonight and I'm pissed off!

A part of the feedback left by another buyer:

"I tested with an EZ Test cocaine cut kit and it tested positive for phenacetin / paracetamol / aspirin (they are all the same colour). The colour change also hovered around benzocaine and lidocaine for a while too. The consistency of the mix was very poor too. Some lines were average, some were amazing, and others had no anesthetic"

This is why I usually don't like trying sellers I haven't used before and only do so when my reliable's are out

I did Friday, Saturday, Sunday and a small bit Monday and all was going good until this evening but going to have a break now for 3 weeks now before I go away for a mad weekend and looking forward to it. I get as good a buzz from taking a break and being a health freak as I do while coking it up! My problem is, some orders arrive and i can't resist testing!!!  :)

How ya getting on yourself?

P.S. Missed the special offer from Whitelady because I went for a walk and was going to order when I got back but they were gone so I put an order in for the 2 grams. Already in transit but I might try keep it for another time while "on my break" ha ha!!!  :)

Did you get in on the special price? Don't think they limited it to 1 gram per order

UKd

I use a piece I cut off a straw, preferably clear so I can see it going up! I'd rather not use handled notes to be honest but I've become very clean conscious when it comes to snooting!

After a night on coke I use a neti-pot to clean out my nasal system because it messes up my sinuses really bad even clean coke after abuse of it!

Trying to take it easy this weekend myself but enjoy the lines UKDom. and have a good night!!!

I got to start getting solely from SR. The blow situation in my area well, blows. Too bad the rock doesn't give you a buzz, tastes like shit  and leaves you sketchy as fuck.

I've got to just rely on the road for my shit and actually enjoy what I spend my hard earned cash on. I can accept the tolerance breaks, when you got good blow then it just makes it that much better when you do get to do it.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: Marlon Brando on October 01, 2013, 07:31 am
Like a great cup of coffee, a perfect rail can be just as good if not better, at starting off any day or night the right way. It's just has so many different and beautiful characteristics to the high that it synergies the mind and can lead to you being a damn good human being.

With that said, it's also only supposed to be used in small little bumps if you are going to be partaking in a sniff here and there. Worst is when you become public and it's a far walk back to where you feel comfortable.

That's just me  though, it's great hearing everyone else's ideas or stories of bringing your precious powder with you on your day to day dealings, or is this also so common with you folks that I seem like the weird one.


Let us know here in late night land so we can enjoy, discuss, and laugh at how hilarious our actions can be after the fact.

Just enough to feel that great feeling building up to give me the energy to get through the day. The problem is, once you have a line at that time, there's no stopping till bed time  ;D ...

I want to say to you all that although I haven't posted much I have read so many of these forum posts. I feel like I know a lot of you, at least partially and I really looked forward to reading more posts in this thread. I hope that another community such as SR can pop up again and I hope to bump into some of you (please use different user names, the feds have EXACT COPIES of this and the SR server, the less they can tie together the better).

Cheers, and I will be thinking of you guys when I'm hitting the pipe this week.

Title: Re: Marlon Brando's Late Night Cocaine Talk Show Thread
Post by: murderface2012 on October 03, 2013, 03:28 am

Hey everyone, I thought since a lot of us like to partake in the joys of cocaine and all the wonderful things it brings.. such as TALKING!


So I thought instead of users clogging up the review thread with banal small talk, I would create a space for all of us currently partaking in such cocaine related activities so we have a place to rant, rave, talk about anything.

Up late? only one home? need someone to talk too?

Hopefully you'll find all of that and more, right here in nose candy land.
